job_title: O365 Integration Engineer with Security Clearance
job_text: ['', ' Perform specific site and core system tests including installation test, deployment tests, functional test, and production release test and finally, acceptance testing for customer signoff', ' Experienced working with Extensible Messaging and Presence Protocol XMPP', ' Provide high level engineering and integration expertise for VoIP, Voice messaging, Video, Web conferencing, Chat, Presence, and other UC services', ' 6+ years industry experience in large scale UC and network transformation architecture, design and implementation encompassing all facets of IP and UC services ', ' Expert in UC services, including VoIP-PSTN integration, Video, Web conferencing, Chat, Presence, desktop sharing and Fixed-Mobile Convergence', ' Provide expert-level troubleshooting and configuration for multiple technologies associated with unified communications product and services.', ' Work to resolve any escalation issues from the NOC.', ' Support the design, test, and integration initiatives for US Army UC services', ' Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent work experience Desired Experience, Education, and Certifications: ', ' Other duties as required Required Experience, Education, and Certifications: ', 'Primary Duties And Responsibilities', ' Provide hands-on implementation, configuration and troubleshooting of Hybrid Skype for business solution, spanning across multiple datacenters and geographical locations globally.', ' Deep knowledge of Skype for business, and all suite of services of Office 365', ' Strategic IT Consulting experience desired', ' Hands-on experience in UC and network transformation in a large-scale production environment', ' Specific Infrastructure experience and certifications a Plus Required Clearance: Personnel shall possess a Secret Security Clearance', ' Knowledge of o365 with great emphasis on Skype for Business, both on premise and online and Azure technologies like AADConnect, Azure AD.', ' Provide high level engineering and integration expertise for VoIP, Voice messaging, Video, Web conferencing, Chat, Presence, and other UC services Support the design, test, and integration initiatives for US Army UC services Knowledge of o365 with great emphasis on Skype for Business, both on premise and online and Azure technologies like AADConnect, Azure AD. Provide hands-on implementation, configuration and troubleshooting of Hybrid Skype for business solution, spanning across multiple datacenters and geographical locations globally. Perform specific site and core system tests including installation test, deployment tests, functional test, and production release test and finally, acceptance testing for customer signoff Provide expert-level troubleshooting and configuration for multiple technologies associated with unified communications product and services. Knowledge of Microsoft Exchange and its integration capabilities with Skype for Business. Work to resolve any escalation issues from the NOC. Other duties as required Required Experience, Education, and Certifications:  Expert in UC services, including VoIP-PSTN integration, Video, Web conferencing, Chat, Presence, desktop sharing and Fixed-Mobile Convergence Deep knowledge of Skype for business, and all suite of services of Office 365 Hands-on experience in UC and network transformation in a large-scale production environment Experienced working with Extensible Messaging and Presence Protocol XMPP 6+ years industry experience in large scale UC and network transformation architecture, design and implementation encompassing all facets of IP and UC services  Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent work experience Desired Experience, Education, and Certifications:  Strategic IT Consulting experience desired Specific Infrastructure experience and certifications a Plus Required Clearance: Personnel shall possess a Secret Security Clearance', ' Knowledge of Microsoft Exchange and its integration capabilities with Skype for Business.']

job_title: Senior Systems Engineer - VDI - Top Secret Clearance
job_text: ['', ' Familiarity with basic Networking troubleshooting concepts and approaches. ', '  Shall have 7 or more years of progressive experience in a VDI systems engineering, or similar, role capturing requirements, designing, engineering, implementing, securing, and operating and maintaining enterprise-level VDI solutions for a globally dispersed IT enterprise.   Shall have 5 or more years of experience designing, engineering, implementing, and maintaining solutions in secure processing environments which must adhere to U.S. Government Information   Assurance and Security standards such as the Defense Information Systems Agency (DISA) Security Technical Implementation Guides (STIGs).   Shall have 3 or more years of proven hands-on experience performing O&M of VDI solutions that are using the Citrix XenDesktop 7 suite and Citrix NetScaler 11, or newer, to provide enterprise-level virtual desktop and application offerings.   Demonstrated experience with utilizing, supporting, and maintaining Windows Server 2012 R2 and/or Windows Server 2016 operating system (OS) as a VDI server platform and Windows 7 and/or   Windows 10 OS as a desktop platform in a VDI environment as part of an all-encompassing VDI solution.   Demonstrated experience implementing and supporting application virtualization through an assortment of technologies including Citrix XenApp, AppLayering, and/or Enterprise Layer Manager (ELM).   Demonstrated experience monitoring and assessing virtualization and storage infrastructure systems and solutions proactively for performance degradation and tuning and optimization opportunities.   Shall meet the Cyber IT/Cybersecurity Workforce (CSWF) Research and Development Specialist (661); Intermediate Level for SECNAV M-5239.2 compliance. (See Navy Cool WebSite)  ', 'Qualifications', ' Assurance and Security standards such as the Defense Information Systems Agency (DISA) Security Technical Implementation Guides (STIGs). ', ' Windows 10 OS as a desktop platform in a VDI environment as part of an all-encompassing VDI solution. ', ' Demonstrated experience operating and maintaining Citrix XenDesktop 7.15 Long-Term Service Release (LTSR) or newer. ', ' Shall meet the Cyber IT/Cybersecurity Workforce (CSWF) Research and Development Specialist (661); Intermediate Level for SECNAV M-5239.2 compliance. (See Navy Cool WebSite) ', ' Demonstrated experience operating and maintaining Citrix NetScaler 12.0 and later. Additionally, experience with supporting the unique nature of FIPS model NetScalers is also a plus. ', '  Strongly desired to be Citrix Certified Professional – Virtualization (CPP-V) and CCP – Networking (CPP-N) certified.   Technical certifications in enterprise-level virtualization and OS vendor technologies, such as Microsoft, Nutanix, and/or VMware are also a plus.   Demonstrated experience operating and maintaining Citrix XenDesktop 7.15 Long-Term Service Release (LTSR) or newer.   Demonstrated experience operating and maintaining Citrix NetScaler 12.0 and later. Additionally, experience with supporting the unique nature of FIPS model NetScalers is also a plus.   Demonstrated experience in the O&M of Citrix Machine Creation Services (MCS) and/or Provisioning Services (PVS) for desktop servicing.   Demonstrated experience in leveraging vendor and industry product documentation, to include best practices, and software-based tools to research, engineer, build, and deploy right-sized and properly tuned and configured VDI desktops.   Demonstrated experience in implementing, configuring, securing, and maintaining NetScaler Firewalls, High Availability (Active-Active, Active-Passive), Load Balancers (to include Global Service Load   Balancing (GSLB)), Logging, and Two-Factor Authentication through RADIUS integration.   Demonstrated experience utilizing, supporting, and maintaining Citrix monitoring products like Command Center, Director, Insight, and/or NetScaler Management and Analytics System (NMAS).   Demonstrated experience leveraging Microsoft PowerShell for the purposes of automating and orchestrating routine, as well as complex, administrative and operational tasking. Experience using   Microsoft PowerShell to support Infrastructure as Code (IAC) and Configuration as Code (CAC) in a production enterprise environment is a plus.   Familiarity with proactively monitoring VDI implementations for performance degradation and tuning and optimization opportunities.   Familiarity with Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) and Secure Socket Layer (SSL) certificate generation, use, and upkeep as it pertains to Citrix-based solutions.   Familiarity with hyper-converged infrastructure (HCI) technologies, such as the Nutanix Enterprise Cloud Platform, and their capabilities to offer scalable converged compute and storage for enterprise-level virtual workloads. Prior experience using Nutanix ECP as the Hosting platform for VDI solutions is a plus.   Familiarity with basic Networking troubleshooting concepts and approaches. ', ' Security Clearance ', ' Demonstrated experience monitoring and assessing virtualization and storage infrastructure systems and solutions proactively for performance degradation and tuning and optimization opportunities. Prior experience using Nutanix ECP as the Hosting platform for VDI solutions is a plus. ', ' Balancing (GSLB)), Logging, and Two-Factor Authentication through RADIUS integration. ['Required Skills:', 'Desired Skills:- \xa0Proficiency in three or more of the programming/scripting languages listed under required skills- \xa0Certifications such as SANS GXPN, GPYC, GCWN, Offensive Security OSEE, OSCE, OSWE, or other similar technical certifications', 'Required Skills:- \xa0Years of Experience: 5-7 years of software developer capable of developing cyber investigation tools.- \xa0Proficiency in two or more relevant programming languages: \xa0C, C++, Java, assembly, Python, Perl, Ruby, Bash, Node.js, Spark, Puppet, SALT, KAFKA, or HADOOP- \xa0Knowledge of x86/64, ARM, and MIPS instructions sets and architectures- \xa0Understanding of exploit development techniques such as arbitrary code execution, privilege execution, obfuscation techniques, etc. \xa0- \xa0Experience with cross-compile tools across architectures- \xa0Skilled at simulation/model development and prototyping- \xa0Familiarity with disassemblers/decompilers such as IDA Pro, Ghidra, Radare, or Binary Ninja- \xa0Proficiency with software debuggers such as WinDbg, OllyDbg, GDB, KGDB, NTSD, IDA Debugger, or similar', 'Desired Skills:']

['', 'Position Overview', 'Desired Skills and Experience', '  Position Overview:  Responsible for business analysis, application design, development, integration and delivery and application maintenance and support. Individuals in this position must be a self-directed professional, who will also bring leadership skills and quickly learn new technologies and programming languages.    ', "· Proposes, develops and supports world-class customer facing web applications using a range of technologies.  · Participates in the analysis of system and business requirements to provide hands-on solutions to meet or exceed our customers' expectations.  · Delivers high-quality code by defining and deploying best practices in unit testing and regression and testing frameworks.  · Performs integration and testing of software components across an entire team, as needed.  · Serves as the scrum master for a cross-disciplinary team on an as needed basis.  · Responsible for the delivery of discreet products and components, marshalling resources across a matrixed organization.  · Communicates with the Product Management and development teams to raise issues and identify potential barriers in a timely fashion.  · Participates in user-centered research through client focus groups, interviews, usage analysis, and rapid prototyping.  · Responsible for protecting our customers and brand by writing secure-by- design code.  · Leads, supervises, mentors, and trains other team members in order to develop a strong, best-in-class development bench.  · Directs the work of and provides technical guidance to less experienced staff.  · Participates in recruiting, hiring, onboarding and performance management of new team members.  · Participates in special projects and performs other duties as assigned.     Job Requirements:  · Demonstrated commitment to high quality user facing and back end code that is usable, maintainable and well thought out.  · Expert in backend tasks and technologies: data modeling, data architecture optimization in RDBMS database system (postgres), SQL queries, ETL best practices.  · Considerable hands-on experience and understanding with Hadoop ecosystem and distributed jobs, especially Spark, Spark-SQL, Hive, Yarn.  · Knowledgeable of best practices of both batch and streaming ETL data ingestion jobs. Familiar with streaming technologies such as Kafka and Kinesis  · Development experience in cloud environment such as AWS or GCP and familiar with related technologies such as S3, EC2, IAM policies.  · Eager to explore new technologies and grow skills with the team in areas of data platform technologies, Machine learning etc.  · Strong record of project execution and completion with experience using Scrum and agile development practices.  · Excels at working with multidisciplinary teams to develop great user experiences.  · Ability to work with and mentor other developers and engineers and lead by example to develop highly proficient and productive teams.  · Must be a self-directed and highly motivated individual who embraces modification of their work based on customer feedback and other business factors.  · Works closely with designers and other developers in a tightly knit, agile team.  · Ability to work both independently and collaboratively across team and organizational boundaries.  · Displays enthusiasm for the challenge of pushing the limits of the web platform to deliver disruptive, innovative solutions to the world that will delight our customers.  · Must be focused on front-loading quality into the development process, ensuring that quality tests are not failing.  · Familiarity with new and emerging technologies across the full stack.  · Familiarity with web application security topics such as SAML, AD, and SSL.  · Excellent written, verbal, and interpersonal communication skills including the ability to interact with all levels of employees and customers throughout the organization.       "]

job_title: Data Scientist Team Lead, TS/SCI & Poly required
job_text: ['Determine the appropriate analytics based on the data and the desired outcomes, using techniques including feature detection, statistics, data mining, predictive modeling, machine learning, natural language processing, and business intelligence* Interpret the validity of results and communicate the meaning of those results* Understand data wrangling, analytics, and visualization software and programming languages, including analytics methods for big data*Qualifications*', 'None*Potential for Remote Work:', '2020-12-03*Category:', 'Must have a current/activeTS/SCI with Polygraph\u202f', '3 or moreyears of experience in the Intelligence Community', "Description* SAIC has an immediate opening for a Data Scientist that is looking to be a Team Lead. The ideal candidate for this role is a skilled data scientist, engineer, or software developer with experience leading a team of data scientists and software developers to research and develop new analytical techniques and tools. The Team Lead should possess an exceptional degree of ingenuity, creativity, and resourcefulness since they will apply and/or develop highly advanced technologies, scientific principles, theories and concepts. If you are selected for this role, you will be responsible for working closely with Customer and Program Management to establish strategic plans and objectives in designing the project's overall machine learning, artificial intelligence, and software development strategy. Here are some other things you will do:* Manage and mentor team members to complete project tasks on time* Translate mission needs into an end-to-end analytical approach to achieve results* Collaborate with other scientists and domain experts on the team", "Minimum of20 years of overall relevant technical experience, or 15 years of experience plusa Master's Degree in a relevant field* Must haveminimum of 10 years of experience applying data science and engineeringpractices", 'No', 'Location:', 'Data Scientist*Schedule:', 'Ability toexercise strong analytical judgement in framing the problem and selecting theright tools, while avoiding unnecessary complexity. Ability to analyze,prioritize, and effectively problemsolve, synthesize large amounts of data/information', 'Date Posted:', 'Information Technology*Subcategory:', 'Day Job*Travel:', 'HERNDON , VA , US', 'TS/SCI with Poly*Clearance Level Must Be Able to Obtain:', 'Full-time*Shift:', 'Experiencedesigning and maintaining software applications and data storage in a cloudenvironment (AWS, Azure, or GCP) ', "Experiencewith agile/scrum project managementSAIC is a premier technology integrator solving our nation's modernization and readiness challenges. Our offerings across defense, space, civilian, and intelligence markets include high-end solutions in engineering, IT, and mission outcomes. We integrate the best components from our portfolio with our partner's ecosystem to deliver innovative and effective solutions. We are 25,500 strong; driven by mission, united by purpose, and inspired by opportunities. Headquartered in Reston, VA, SAIC has annual revenues of nearly $7.1 billion. For information, visit [saic.com](http://www.saic.com/) or [Working at SAIC](http://www.saic.com/careers/working-at-saic) for benefits details. SAIC is an Equal Opportunity Employer empowering people no matter their race, color, religion, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, or veteran status. We strive to create a diverse, inclusive and respectful work culture that values all.", 'Strongcommunication and briefing skills; ability to communicate technical informationto non-technical audiences', 'No*Minimum Clearance Required:', 'Experience\u202fcodingwith Python', 'Experience\u202fwritingtechnical intelligence reports', 'Experienceas a team lead or manager strongly preferred, but not required* Ability to multi-taskand successfully manage multiple projects and deadlines']

successful. You will work cross-functionally across our business, operations, and technical teams to drive change and impact business solutions for the Sales Operations, Analytics and Strategy team.', 'About HubSpot', 'Build out scalable data models to analyze key parts of the HubSpot business.\xa0', 'Ability to participate and contribute to code-management/version control tools like git Enterprise on several peer-reviews, feature branch, resolving conflicts and commits', 'We are looking for people who have:', 'Strong understanding and analytical skills related to both structured and unstructured datasetsExceptional ability to document technical design documents and organizational skillsHands-on experience with advanced SQL and\xa0cloud data warehouse like Snowflake\xa0and relational databases\xa0Experience with object-oriented scripting languages like Python and packages like Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib, ScikitLearn, TensorFlowExperience building user defined functions in either Python or SQLAbility to participate and contribute to code-management/version control tools like git Enterprise on several peer-reviews, feature branch, resolving conflicts and commitsConcept and working knowledge on LookML (views, explore), Looks and DashboardsFamiliarity with data science acumen and common ML algorithms and an eagerness to continue to explore ML implementation.Experience with JSON Flattening and extracting internal elements', 'Translating project requirements into a set of technical sub-tasks that build towards a final deliverable.', 'Support distributed operations teams as they utilize these foundational data models for management & sales reporting.', 'Experience with JSON Flattening and extracting internal elements', 'Exceptional ability to document technical design documents and organizational skills', 'Experience building user defined functions in either Python or SQL', "Confidence can sometimes hold us back from applying for a job. So however you identify and whatever background you bring with you, please apply if this is a role that would make you excited to come into work every day.", 'Concept and working knowledge on LookML (views, explore), Looks and Dashboards', 'Experience working with complex datasets with computer science fundamentals, including but not limited to the concepts of software development lifecycle (SDLC)Experience building and optimizing data pipeline, architecture and data sets and be able to present visuals utilizing LucidchartsUnderstanding of ETL, ELT with an ability to reverse engineer for existing technical projects to help optimize and provide recommendations with root cause analysis.Experience with script based analytic transformation tools like dbt with ability to build CTEsExposure to data pipeline and workflow management tools like Apache Airflow', 'Performs complex root cause analysis of problems and subsequently, make and implement recommendations to prevent future occurrences.', 'Work closely with central technical teams, Data Analysts, Business Managers, and leadership to collaboratively deliver on projects.', 'Experience working with complex datasets with computer science fundamentals, including but not limited to the concepts of software development lifecycle (SDLC)', 'Collaborate with both technical and non-technical areas of the business, bridging the gap between the business problem and the technical solution.\xa0', 'Working iteratively on projects as part of an Agile Scrum team of different functional roles.Translating project requirements into a set of technical sub-tasks that build towards a final deliverable.Participating in and leading the technical execution of business intelligence and analytics related projects of large scope and complexity.Hands on experience with bug tracking systems and project management, like Jira', 'Headquartered in Cambridge, Massachusetts, HubSpot was founded in 2006. Today, thousands of employees work across the globe remotely and in our offices. Visit our\xa0careers website\xa0to learn more about culture and opportunities at HubSpot.\xa0', 'You can find out more about our company culture in the HubSpot\xa0Culture Code, which has more than 5M views, and learn about\xa0our commitment to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace, too. Thanks to the work of every HubSpotter globally who has helped build our remarkable culture, HubSpot has been named a top workplace by Glassdoor, Fortune, Entrepreneur, and more.', 'Project Management', 'Participating in and leading the technical execution of business intelligence and analytics related projects of large scope and complexity.', 'Experience building and optimizing data pipeline, architecture and data sets and be able to present visuals utilizing Lucidcharts', 'Understanding of ETL, ELT with an ability to reverse engineer for existing technical projects to help optimize and provide recommendations with root cause analysis.', 'Familiarity with data science acumen and common ML algorithms and an eagerness to continue to explore ML implementation.', 'Analytics', 'Define/refine project requirements with business stakeholders.\xa0Participate in key touchpoints to keep stakeholders informed throughout projects and provide documentation to enable your deliverables to speak for themselves.', 'Hands on experience with bug tracking systems and project management, like Jira', 'If you like solving hard problems, become energized in high-pressure situations, and want to work with amazing peers - please apply and come help us make HubSpot an even more successful company.', 'HubSpot (NYSE: HUBS) is a leading customer relationship management (CRM) platform that provides software and support to help businesses grow better. We build marketing, sales, service, and website management products that start free and scale to meet our customers’ needs at any stage of growth. We’re also building a company culture that empowers people to do their best work through our core values of flexibility, autonomy, transparency, and belonging. If that sounds like something you’d like to be part of, we’d love to hear from you.', 'Exposure to data pipeline and workflow management tools like Apache Airflow']

job_title: Senior Azure SSIS Data Integration Developer
job_text: ['', ' Implement ETL and data movement solutions using Azure Data Factory and SSIS.', ' Implement end-to-end data solutions in Azure.', " Skill Required / Desired Amount of Experience SQL Server 2014 Development Skills Required 5 Years Azure Datalakes and Data Analysis Required 3 Years Azure SQL Databases, Azure SQL Tunings Required 3 Years Datalake tools, Databricks and Devops Required 3 Years SQL Server Integration Service (SSIS) Required 3 Years SSRS and SSAS Required 3 Years Source code and Team Management Software (TFS Preferred) Desired 2 Years Software Development Life cycle - Development and implementation Practices Required 3 Years Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or Information Systems Nice to have Importing and exporting large datasets from and to various sources. Required 3 Years Strong analytical skills to solve and model complex business requirements. Required 3 Years Experience in an Agile Scrum environment Required 3 Years Powershell Scripting Highly desired 3 Years Knowledge in Linux OS and Job Scheduling Desired 2 Years", ' Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues with data migration and transformation within the Microsoft Azure environment such as DataBricks, Data Factory, and other applications in the Development, UAT and Production environments.', ' Perform production deployments.', ' SQL Server Integration Service (SSIS) Required 3 Years', ' Implement end-to-end data solutions in Azure. Design, build and deploy effective SSIS packages, Azure Data Factory. Implement ETL and data movement solutions using Azure Data Factory and SSIS. Help business users analyze data as well as providing data insight to upper management. Collaborate with business stakeholders and understand reporting needs and develop/modify a data model in Azure SQL. Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues with data migration and transformation within the Microsoft Azure environment such as DataBricks, Data Factory, and other applications in the Development, UAT and Production environments. Perform production deployments. Experience working with transactional/relational data and SQL. They will work with the Teams which are working on Agile Development, DevOps and TFS. We will consider, if the candidate have any working knowledge/experience in those areas.', ' Importing and exporting large datasets from and to various sources. Required 3 Years', ' Powershell Scripting Highly desired 3 Years', ' Strong analytical skills to solve and model complex business requirements. Required 3 Years', ' SQL Server 2014 Development Skills Required 5 Years', ' Software Development Life cycle - Development and implementation Practices Required 3 Years', ' Datalake tools, Databricks and Devops Required 3 Years', ' Skill Required / Desired Amount of Experience', ' Help business users analyze data as well as providing data insight to upper management.', 'Responsibilities Include', ' Azure SQL Databases, Azure SQL Tunings Required 3 Years', " Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or Information Systems Nice to have", ' Experience working with transactional/relational data and SQL.', ' SSRS and SSAS Required 3 Years', 'Important To Note', ' Collaborate with business stakeholders and understand reporting needs and develop/modify a data model in Azure SQL.', ' Source code and Team Management Software (TFS Preferred) Desired 2 Years', 'Position Description', ' Azure Datalakes and Data Analysis Required 3 Years', ' Experience in an Agile Scrum environment Required 3 Years', ' Knowledge in Linux OS and Job Scheduling Desired 2 Years', ' They will work with the Teams which are working on Agile Development, DevOps and TFS. ['', 'Gain experience with different database technologies, ranging from traditional relational to the latest NoSQL products such as MongoDB and Redis.\xa0', '\xa0', 'Is coding as much art as it is science?', 'We are looking for Software Engineers to join our rapidly growing Technology Team. Cvent’s Technology Team is responsible for the design, development, and operation of the company’s suite of cloud-based software products. We are currently engaged in a major initiative to build our next-generation software platform, utilizing the most cutting edge tools and technologies.\xa0', 'If you answered yes to all the above, then you belong at Cvent!', 'Experience with one or more of the following databases: SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, MongoDB, Redis or other NoSQL technologies', '2+ years of programming experience in two or more of the following: C#, Java, C++, ASP.NET, MVC, PHP, Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, JQuery, Web Services and API development using REST or SOAP', 'The prerequisites for joining our development team are simple. We care more about your attitude and aptitude than the specific tools and technologies you have used in the past. You need to have a strong passion for software development and must take pride in your coding. You should also have great analytical skills and the ability to handle complex, modular software development in a collaborative team-based environment.\xa0', 'Work on Internet-scale applications, where performance, reliability, and scalability, are critical design goals –not after-thoughts.', 'Cvent is an exciting, fast-growing tech company that provides industry-leading software to event professionals around the world. Our suite of services - online event registration, venue selection, mobile apps, email marketing, web surveys, and targeted hotel advertising opportunities - have positioned us as a major player in the estimated $565 billion global meetings and events industry.', 'Need more reasons to consider us?\xa0We offer competitive salary packages, an extensive benefits package for all full-time employees, including medical, dental, vision, stock options, bonuses, 401K, gym\xa0membership discounts, and other great perks! If you would like to learn more about Cvent and our products, visit our website at www.cvent.com\xa0\xa0', 'Cvent maintains a drug-free workplace.', 'Skills/Qualifications we are seeking our Senior Software Engineers to have are:\xa0', '2+ years of programming experience in two or more of the following: C#, Java, C++, ASP.NET, MVC, PHP, Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, JQuery, Web Services and API development using REST or SOAPExperience with one or more of the following databases: SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, MongoDB, Redis or other NoSQL technologiesBS, MS or PhD in Computer Science OR related technical discipline\xa0', 'Cvent offers a fun, collegial work environment tailored to sharpening your technical skills and growing as a software professional. While we have evolved from startup to mid-sized company, our Technology Team has preserved an entrepreneurial and merit-driven culture where meaningful initiative and contribution are recognized and rewarded.\xa0', 'Create innovative mobile applications on a wide range of platforms including iOS, Android, and others.', 'At Cvent we celebrate, support and are committed to creating a diverse and inclusive environment. We’re proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, veteran status or any other legally protected characteristics.', 'Are you passionate about software?', 'BS, MS or PhD in Computer Science OR related technical discipline\xa0', 'Work on Internet-scale applications, where performance, reliability, and scalability, are critical design goals –not after-thoughts.Create beautiful, interactive, and easy-to-use web applications using rich client-side code and MVC based server-side code.Create innovative mobile applications on a wide range of platforms including iOS, Android, and others.Learn the nuts and bolts of Service-Oriented Architecture (SOA) and Event-Driven Architecture (EDA) in real-life applications.Gain experience with different database technologies, ranging from traditional relational to the latest NoSQL products such as MongoDB and Redis.\xa0', 'Do you like the challenge of building great products that are feature-rich –but also easy to use? Would you like to work in a collaborative environment where sharing knowledge and ideas is not only encouraged –but expected?', 'In addition to this, you will have a leg up if you also meet the following criteria:', 'Cvent’s Technology Team is a great opportunity for you to:\xa0', 'Learn the nuts and bolts of Service-Oriented Architecture (SOA) and Event-Driven Architecture (EDA) in real-life applications.', 'Create beautiful, interactive, and easy-to-use web applications using rich client-side code and MVC based server-side code.']

job_text: ['', ' Create and maintain GrabAds backend systems such as ads serving, logging, user datastore, personalization service, analytics pipelines, business dashboard, etc. ', ' Take initiatives to grow GrabAds business. ', 'itally important skills here:', ' Strong analytical skill using SQL, Jupyter notebooks, Python, Spark, Presto, etc. ', ' Experience in pipeline development and analytics using tools like Spark, SQL, Notebooks, Python, etc. is preferred. ', 'The day-to-day activities:', ' Bachelor in Computer Science, or equivalent  At least 5+ years of experience in commercial software development in large distributed systems  Strong knowledge in computer science fundamentals: data structures, algorithms, distributed systems, and asynchronous architectures  Hands-on developer who has built backend services that handle high volume traffic  Strong understanding of system performance and scaling  Expert in at least 1 of the following languages: Go, C++, Java. Expertise with multiple languages is strongly preferred  Excellent written and verbal communication skills; sharp analytical abilities with proven design skills; able to think critically about growth and stability  Experience in Ads is strongly preferred.  Experience in tech leading projects is a big plus.  Experience in launching ML models with modern frameworks, e.g., TensorFlow, in production is a plus.  Experience in pipeline development and analytics using tools like Spark, SQL, Notebooks, Python, etc. is preferred. ', ' Hands-on developer who has built backend services that handle high volume traffic ', ' V itally important skills here:', 'Requirements : ', ' Excellent written and verbal communication skills; sharp analytical abilities with proven design skills; able to think critically about growth and stability ', ' Hands-on in designing and launching online services with scalability and latency constraints ', ' Evaluate and integrate 3rd party services for various purposes, etc. ', 'Culture:', ' Humility - ', ' Experience in launching ML models with modern frameworks, e.g., TensorFlow, in production is a plus. ', ' Hands-on in designing and launching online services with scalability and latency constraints  Write high quality code on daily basis  Strong leadership to drive projects from end to end and to deal with cross-team dependencies.  Strong analytical skill using SQL, Jupyter notebooks, Python, Spark, Presto, etc.  Experiences in Ads ', ' Collaborate across stakeholders such as data scientists, application developers, and department heads to deliver technical solutions that meets their unique needs ', ' Honour - ', ' .', ' Bachelor in Computer Science, or equivalent ', ' Create and integrate ad placements to GrabAds ecosystem. ', ' Expert in at least 1 of the following languages: Go, C++, Java. Expertise with multiple languages is strongly preferred ', ' Heart - ', ' Participate in interview loops to help hire the best engineers in the industry ', ' Participate in code and design reviews to maintain our high development standards ', ' Experiences in Ads ', ' Strong understanding of system performance and scaling ', 'Requirements', ' Write code, unit/integration tests, and design/technical documents, etc. ', ' Experience in Ads is strongly preferred. ', ' Create and maintain GrabAds backend systems such as ads serving, logging, user datastore, personalization service, analytics pipelines, business dashboard, etc.  Evaluate and integrate 3rd party services for various purposes, etc.  Create and integrate ad placements to GrabAds ecosystem.  Evaluate technology stacks for increasing performance and scalability.  Collaborate across stakeholders such as data scientists, application developers, and department heads to deliver technical solutions that meets their unique needs  Write code, unit/integration tests, and design/technical documents, etc.  Participate in code and design reviews to maintain our high development standards  Participate in interview loops to help hire the best engineers in the industry  Take initiatives to grow GrabAds business. ', 'Get to know the team:', ' Strong knowledge in computer science fundamentals: data structures, algorithms, distributed systems, and asynchronous architectures ', ' Strong leadership to drive projects from end to end and to deal with cross-team dependencies. ', ' At least 5+ years of experience in commercial software development in large distributed systems ', ' Write high quality code on daily basis ', ' Evaluate technology stacks for increasing performance and scalability. ', ' Experience in tech leading projects is a big plus. ', ' Hunger - ']

', "Possess expertise in process and data modeling, architectural development methodologies, IT planning methodologies and extensive knowledge of the enterprise's business and decision-making processes.", 'Major Responsibilities', 'Creates new opportuities for the use of new technology. ', 'Schedule', 'Job Posting', 'Leads the team that determines how existing applications, legacy systems, databases, Web interfaces and/or hardware logic, which may be currently operating on multiple platforms, work together to meet the new and emerging enterprise requirements. ', ' Responsible for leading a team of staff for developing and deploying complex integrated solutions aimed at modernizing, consolidating and coordinating the independently designed applications within and across the enterprises of core systems. Leads the team that determines how existing applications, legacy systems, databases, Web interfaces and/or hardware logic, which may be currently operating on multiple platforms, work together to meet the new and emerging enterprise requirements. Oversees the team/staff that develops methods to efficiently reuse existing components. Controls and work directs activities of the staff. Conceive, plan and implement original approaches to solve complex problems of diverse scope. Prepare and present technical concepts to internal audiences. Works with operations staff to define an operational framework that defines, develops and implements delivery systems, systems management, policies and security frameworks to ensure delivery of knowledge and information to appropriate groups. Regarded as an expert in development with good software engineering practices. Plans and organizes the development of technical support standards, evaluates software and system problems and potential solutions to application systems requirements. Will have demonstrated ability to solve complex application and data-related problems and be experienced in resolving issues relating to data security and integrity of controls. Initiates and develops concepts to solve extremely complex situations with little or no precedent. Creates new opportuities for the use of new technology. Provides conceptual guidance to other senior and high level technical experts. Performs systems design and analysis, developes codes and testing to ensure successful and seamless communication among the various IT systems, users and applications components. Advanced professional level role. Works on projects that may span a broad range of systems and enterprisewide complex components. Requires in-depth knowledge across multiple technical environments and possesses increased level of business knowledge. Works on major projects providing subject matter expertise and technical direction to more junior technical staff and may be technical leader of advanced or complex projects. Lead responsibilities include directing, monitoring and assigning work to those on the team. Provides technical work guidance or mentoring. May provide input to the managers/supervisor on staff performance.', 'Conceive, plan and implement original approaches to solve complex problems of diverse scope. ', 'May provide input to the managers/supervisor on staff performance.', 'Makes complex IT and business decisions.', 'Provides technical work guidance or mentoring. ', 'Job Summary', 'Initiates and develops concepts to solve extremely complex situations with little or no precedent. ', 'Advanced professional level role. Works on projects that may span a broad range of systems and enterprisewide complex components. ']

job_text: ['', 'Named one of the Best Places to Work by Albuquerque Business First', ' This position will work closely with other members of the Ardent technology team to support the overall mission of the company and its’ strategic business initiatives.', 'Senior Network Engineer Education And Experience Requirements', ' ', "Named to Modern Healthcare's 100 Best Places to Work five times since 2008", 'Minimum of 5 years’ experience working in Information Systems, preferably in the health care industry.', 'Primary responsibilities include designing, maintaining and monitoring the data network infrastructure for Ardent Health Services. ', 'Minimum of 5 years’ experience with Cisco routing, switching and wireless products. Experience with frame-relay or equivalent packet switched technologies.', 'This encompasses updating network documentation, conducting utilization studies and the establishment of fault notification procedures in addition to collaborating with the senior engineering staff to complete enterprise network objectives.', ' Named Top Workplace by Albuquerque Journal, 2013, 2014, and 2015', 'Cisco Certified Network Administrator certification or a minimum of 10 years’ experience directly supporting and implementing network infrastructure in a corporate environment. ', 'Project Management in a Healthcare Environment Vendor Supervision and Coordination Design and Implement Network Infrastructure Services.', ' Why Lovelace?', 'Required-Associates’ degree in Information Systems / Computer Science or equivalent technical training.', 'Senior Network Engineer Responsibilities', "Named one of the 150 Great Places to Work in Healthcare by Becker's Hospital Review", ' Experience with static and dynamic routing protocols i.e., OSPF, EIGRP. Experience with LAN and WAN packet analyzers.', 'Lovelace is a drug-free employer with smoke free campuses.', 'Senior Network Engineer, Network, Full-Time, DaysWe are looking for a Senior Network Engineer to join our Network Team in Albuquerque, NM.', 'Required-Associates’ degree in Information Systems / Computer Science or equivalent technical training.Experience with Windows 2000 Server. Experience with static and dynamic routing protocols i.e., OSPF, EIGRP. Experience with LAN and WAN packet analyzers.Experience with DNS, DHCP, WINS. Knowledge of 100/1000 base Ethernet and virtual local area networks (VLAN’s). Experience with the TCP/IP protocol stack, VLSM and route summarization. Understand Construction DrawingsMust have good communication skills both oral and written. Must display the ability to be a team player and work well with employees at all levels. Support Market IT Management as a Knowledge and Solutions Expert when addressing Division and Hospital Leadership to discuss Network related issues and initiatives.Minimum of 5 years’ experience working in Information Systems, preferably in the health care industry.Minimum of 5 years’ experience with Cisco routing, switching and wireless products. Experience with frame-relay or equivalent packet switched technologies.Project Management in a Healthcare Environment Vendor Supervision and Coordination Design and Implement Network Infrastructure Services.Cisco Certified Network Administrator certification or a minimum of 10 years’ experience directly supporting and implementing network infrastructure in a corporate environment. ', 'Primary responsibilities include designing, maintaining and monitoring the data network infrastructure for Ardent Health Services. This encompasses updating network documentation, conducting utilization studies and the establishment of fault notification procedures in addition to collaborating with the senior engineering staff to complete enterprise network objectives. This position will work closely with other members of the Ardent technology team to support the overall mission of the company and its’ strategic business initiatives.', "Named one of the 150 Great Places to Work in Healthcare by Becker's Hospital ReviewNamed one of the Best Places to Work by Albuquerque Business First Named Top Workplace by Albuquerque Journal, 2013, 2014, and 2015Named to Modern Healthcare's 100 Best Places to Work five times since 2008", 'Must have good communication skills both oral and written. Must display the ability to be a team player and work well with employees at all levels. ['', 'Here at Lacework, we are looking for a Staff Software Engineer - Backend who is excited about building an industry leading, next generation Cloud Security System. This is a unique and rare opportunity to get in on the ground floor and help shape our technologies, products and business.', 'Lacework supports Green Card and H-1B sponsorship. We also have an office in Vancouver and sponsor Canadian work permits/permanent residence.', 'Strong experience in Java application development. Experience with multi-threading a plus.', 'Write functional specs, design specs and participate in code reviews', 'Lacework is an Equal Opportunity Employer. It is the policy of Lacework to provide equal employment opportunity to all persons, regardless of age, race, religion, color, national origin, sex, political affiliations, marital status, non-disqualifying physical or mental disability, age, sexual orientation, membership or non-membership in an employee organization, or on the basis of personal favoritism or other non-merit factors, except where otherwise provided by law.', 'Must have demonstrated ability to design for scalability, performance and reliability.', 'The Role:', 'Qualifications:', 'Track record for being detail-oriented with a demonstrated ability to self-motivate and follow-through on projects\xa0', 'Build state of the art threat detection systems', '10+ years of experience in software development.Proven experience as software architect.Ms/Phd in computer science or similarStrong experience in Java application development. Experience with multi-threading a plus.Experience developing RESTful web services and using frameworks like dropwizard, spring, spring boot.Must have experience with Metadata driven design and development.Must have demonstrated ability to design for scalability, performance and reliability.Must have knowledge of relational database engines like MySQL, Postgres, SQLServer, Oracle etc. Experience with Snowflake is a plusWorking knowledge/experience with AWS-stackTrack record for being detail-oriented with a demonstrated ability to self-motivate and follow-through on projects\xa0Demonstrated ability to achieve stretch goals in a highly innovative and fast paced environment', 'Staff Software Engineer - Backend', 'Must have knowledge of relational database engines like MySQL, Postgres, SQLServer, Oracle etc. Experience with Snowflake is a plus', 'Must have experience with Metadata driven design and development.', 'Cloud\xa0computing is revolutionizing IT and forcing organizations to rethink their approach to\xa0cloud\xa0security. Lacework is at the forefront of this transformation. We enable security teams to effectively secure public and private clouds – AWS, Azure or collocations – by eliminating repetitive, manual and labor-intensive security tasks. ['', 'From rendered reports sent via Slack for easy mobile consumption to Google sheets integrations to allow for flexible reporting for end users, you’ll be working across our entire technology stack to find places where we can use data to improve our business. Our users range from extremely technical (providing us with models to run, and wanting tables or files in return) to less technical (providing inputs via a UI or spreadsheet and expecting results displayed in-line or in a report). This is an opportunity to exercise your technical skills with a highly skilled team from a variety of diverse backgrounds while helping every aspect of our business to be more efficient and more data-driven.', '4+ years working directly as a member of a technical team, preferably developing/supporting/innovating for a consumer-facing analytics product.BS degree in information management, computer science, math, statistics, or equivalent technical field.', '\xa0', 'Data Processing:', 'Languages: Python, SQL, Typescript, C#', 'STARZ is an Equal Opportunity Employer. This means that all applicants will receive consideration for employment regardless of gender, age, race, national origin, disability, color, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local law. In addition, STARZ will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities.', 'Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into customer acquisition, retention, behavior and other key business performance metrics', 'equired Skills', 'Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using cloud-native technologies', 'Identify, design and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.', 'Data Processing: Spark, Spark Streaming, Kafka, Kinesis, Pandas, Airflow', 'The STARZ Data Products & Engineering team is seeking a data engineer who’s passionate about drawing a thin line from data to insight and exposing that insight to internal users to support important business decisions. You’ll be building data pipelines, crafting our data processing framework, and helping us to integrate disparate signals into a clear picture of where the organization is at and where we can go. We’re building out a system of experimentation so teams can use that picture to form hypotheses, test them, and easily see the results.', 'Database Systems: Snowflake, Redis, Aurora, DynamoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server', 'Responsibilities', 'Develop, test and maintain optimal data processing pipelines and related architectures, ensuring the overall solution will support business requirements', 'Starz (www.starz.com), a Lionsgate company (NYSE: LGF.A, LGF.B), is a leading global media and entertainment company that produces and distributes premium streaming content to worldwide audiences across subscription television platforms. Starz is home to the flagship domestic STARZ® brand, STARZ ENCORE, 17 premium pay TV channels and the associated on-demand and online services, including the highly rated STARZ app. With the launch of the STARZPLAY international premium streaming platform and STARZ PLAY Arabia, Starz is expanding its global footprint in a growing number of territories. Sold through multichannel video distributors, including cable operators, satellite television providers, telecommunications companies, and other online and digital platforms, Starz offers subscribers job_title: Software Engineer, Embedded Systems, Devices & Services
job_text: ['', 'Experience designing and developing for multiprocessor SOCs. ', 'Write robust, reliable, efficient, and testable low-level software to interface with sensors, displays, wireless chipsets, and other peripherals. ', 'Architect, design, and develop software for embedded processors within next generation immersive computing products. ', 'Optimize and tune system power and performance across the stack and enable hardware by bringing up the operating system and devices.', 'Write factory tests to ensure hardware is functioning correctly on the assembly line, and work closely with chipset vendors and contract manufacturers. ', 'Experience with bare-metal or RTOS-based microcontroller development.', 'Responsibilities', 'Work closely with other teams on solving cross-functional problems to create compelling experiences on highly-customized hardware platforms.', 'Performance analysis and optimization experience in the domains of embedded systems or machine learning.', ' Experience designing and developing for multiprocessor SOCs.  Experience with Graphics Programming.  Experience with of one or more of the following: microcontrollers, SoC, DSP, device drivers, hardware bringup, power management, ARM processors, performance optimization, file systems, bootloading, JTAG debuggers, firmware, or hardware/software integration. Performance analysis and optimization experience in the domains of embedded systems or machine learning. Experience working with chipset vendors and/or contract manufacturers.  Ability to work across multiple teams.  ', 'Software development experience in C or C++.', 'Experience working with chipset vendors and/or contract manufacturers. ', 'About The Job', 'Experience with Graphics Programming. ', ' Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience.  6 years of work experience in Embedded Systems development, or 1 year of experience in Embedded Systems development with an advanced degree. Experience with bare-metal or RTOS-based microcontroller development. Software development experience in C or C++. ', 'Ability to work across multiple teams. ', '6 years of work experience in Embedded Systems development, or 1 year of experience in Embedded Systems development with an advanced degree.', 'Experience with of one or more of the following: microcontrollers, SoC, DSP, device drivers, hardware bringup, power management, ARM processors, performance optimization, file systems, bootloading, JTAG debuggers, firmware, or hardware/software integration.', 'Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience. ', ' Architect, design, and develop software for embedded processors within next generation immersive computing products.  Write robust, reliable, efficient, and testable low-level software to interface with sensors, displays, wireless chipsets, and other peripherals.  Optimize and tune system power and performance across the stack and enable hardware by bringing up the operating system and devices. Work closely with other teams on solving cross-functional problems to create compelling experiences on highly-customized hardware platforms. Write factory tests to ensure hardware is functioning correctly on the assembly line, and work closely with chipset vendors and contract manufacturers.  ']

The responsibilities of this role do not include: Financial accountability (e.g., does not involve budgeting responsibility).', ' Unit tests own code to verify the stability and functionality of a feature.', " Analytical Skills - The ability to collect information and identify fundamental patterns/trends in data. This includes the ability to gather, integrate, and interpret information from several sources. Building Trusting Relationships - The ability to build trusting, collaborative relationships and rapport with different types of people and businesses. This includes delivering on commitments and maintaining confidential information, as well as being approachable, showing interest in the other person, and relating well to people regardless of personality or background. Communication - The ability to convey information clearly and accurately, as well as choosing the most effective method of delivery (e.g., email, phone, face-to-face). This includes using a technically sound communication style both verbally and in writing. Creating the New and Different - The ability to be creative. This includes the ability to produce breakthrough ideas, being a visionary, managing innovation, seeing multiple futures, having broad interests and knowledge, and gaining support in order to translate new ideas into solutions. This also includes the ability to plan and implement unconventional ideas and speculate about alternative futures without all of the data. Decision-Making - The ability to make quick, accurate decisions. This includes the ability to weigh alternatives and take into account the impact of the decisions on people, equipment, or other resources. Demonstrating Personal Flexibility - The ability to demonstrate resourcefulness and resilience in the face of change, obstacles, and adversity. This includes adapting to competing demands and shifting priorities. This also includes improving adaptability, pursuing new skills and knowledge, and regularly seeking feedback from others. Getting Organized - The ability to be organized, resourceful, and planful. This includes the ability to leverage multiple resources to get things done and lay out tasks in sufficient detail. This also includes the ability to get things done with fewer resources and in less time, work on multiple tasks at once without losing track, and foresee and plan around obstacles. Software Optimization - Knowledge of techniques and approaches to optimize software for specific hardware platforms. This includes basic practices in software optimization and the interaction between software and the hardware platform. Taking Initiative - The ability to attack work activities with drive and energy, understanding the impact of work on key metrics, and making decisions that are in the company's best interest. This includes not being afraid to initiate action before all the facts are known, and driving value-added work tasks to completion. Technical Documentation - Ability to appropriately document software and/or hardware specifications to promote knowledge transfer to other engineers. Software Engineering - Knowledge of the overall process for developing new software. This includes knowledge of the roles and responsibilities of software engineering and other functions, major phases, checkpoints and deliverables. This also includes the ability to identify common issues and considerations for bringing a new product to the marketplace. Time Management - The ability to quickly prioritize mission-critical from less important or trivial work activities. This includes sensing what the next most useful thing is to work on, and focusing on the critical few tasks that add value while putting aside or delaying the rest. Troubleshooting - The ability to detect malfunctions in daily operations, including scheduling issues and process problems, and determining root causes and appropriate solutions for operating errors. This also includes the ability to detect malfunctions or the need for repair and adjustment to various types of equipment and implement corrective actions and track their success.", ' 1+ years of work experience in a role requiring interaction with senior leadership (e.g., Director level and above).', ' Continuous communication which includes the comprehension of information with colleagues, customers, and vendors both in person and remotely.', ' 2+ years Software Engineering or related work experience.', ' Completing tasks with multiple steps that can be performed in various orders; some planning and prioritization must occur to complete the tasks effectively; mistakes may result in some rework.', ' Getting Organized - The ability to be organized, resourceful, and planful. job_title: Data Scientist - Research and Economics, Special Projects
job_text: ['', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Passion for Uber!', 'Exposure to a unique set of projects: your work will influence some of the most pressing policy issues across the company and around the world', 'Conduct careful statistical and econometric analysis in support of our policy priorities, collaborating with international teams to develop research that speaks to their local contexts', 'Experience in policy research, particularly background in developing and bringing quantitative evidence to bear on public policy and legal strategiesExcellent project management skills and the ability to develop and maintain collaborative and productive research relationships with other teams around the companyPassion for Uber!', 'Experience in data science, with a demonstrable ability to use tools such as SQL, Python, and R to work efficiently at scale', 'Join an encouraging, inclusive company and team that will be invested in you and your professional growth and success!', 'Ensure alignment between policy research and business strategy, building on a rich understanding of - and relationships across - policy, product, legal, data science, and operationsConduct careful statistical and econometric analysis in support of our policy priorities, collaborating with international teams to develop research that speaks to their local contextsPresent economic reasoning and analytical results to internal audiences (e.g., our leadership team) and external audiences (e.g., policy partners)', 'Excellent project management skills and the ability to develop and maintain collaborative and productive research relationships with other teams around the company', "What You'll Do", "What You'll Get", 'Experience in policy research, particularly background in developing and bringing quantitative evidence to bear on public policy and legal strategies', 'A degree in Economics, Statistics, Math, or another quantitative field; candidates with a relevant PhD and/or extensive experience will be evaluated (and compensated) commensurate with their education and experienceExperience in data science, with a demonstrable ability to use tools such as SQL, Python, and R to work efficiently at scaleExperience in economics research, with a track record of working independently and executing a research plan with minimal oversight', 'Be part of the technology company whose platform is used globally by over 4 million people to earn money and over 100 million people to move around their cities', 'Ensure alignment between policy research and business strategy, building on a rich understanding of - and relationships across - policy, product, legal, data science, and operations', 'Experience in economics research, with a track record of working independently and executing a research plan with minimal oversight', 'Be part of the technology company whose platform is used globally by over 4 million people to earn money and over 100 million people to move around their citiesExposure to a unique set of projects: your work will influence some of the most pressing policy issues across the company and around the worldJoin an encouraging, inclusive company and team that will be invested in you and your professional growth and success!', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Present economic reasoning and analytical results to internal audiences (e.g., our leadership team) and external audiences (e.g., policy partners)', 'About The Role', 'A degree in Economics, Statistics, Math, or another quantitative field; candidates with a relevant PhD and/or extensive experience will be evaluated (and compensated) commensurate with their education and experience']

['', 'Day 1 benefit coverage for health, dental, and vision', "You've had exposure to modeling pipelines and analysis workflows.", 'An expert in data engineering using tools like Spark, Pandas, Airflow, Luigi, etc.', "You have 5+ years of experience as a data engineer coding in Python and using SQL.Experience in a fast-paced consumer finance or fintech environment is strongly preferred.You have familiarity with Google Cloud and data warehousing technologies like Snowflake.An expert in data engineering using tools like Spark, Pandas, Airflow, Luigi, etc.You love empowering and enabling others to be able to answer questions efficiently.You can communicate with a cross functional team and articulate ideas to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.A self starter who searches out problems and can work with Eng/Business management to prioritize.You've had exposure to modeling pipelines and analysis workflows.People management experience is a plus!\xa0", 'Work directly with the team of data analysts and other business teams to understand our analytics goals and pain points.', 'People management experience is a plus!\xa0', 'You love empowering and enabling others to be able to answer questions efficiently.', "We're Brigit, a financial health app for the everyday American. By using cash flow data to automate finances, not only do we help people today, but also empower them to start saving for tomorrow and permanently transform their financial future. Brigit analyzes data from billions of individual bank transactions and formulates a deep understanding of each member’s cash-flow mismatches and spending habits. Using that data, we're able to send no-fee predictive advances and help millions of Americans avoid late payment fees, predatory overdraft fees, and interest rates. Our initial product is focused on disrupting the predatory $44 Billion payday loan and overdraft market and our future products will continue to empower and improve the lives of over 100M underserved Americans!", 'A self starter who searches out problems and can work with Eng/Business management to prioritize.', '401k participation', 'Experience in a fast-paced consumer finance or fintech environment is strongly preferred.', 'You have 5+ years of experience as a data engineer coding in Python and using SQL.', '\ufeffWhat You Have', 'Work directly with the team of data analysts and other business teams to understand our analytics goals and pain points.Lay the groundwork for our ETL infrastructure, setting up tools like Airflow and Spark to enable the rest of the team to contribute data pipelines, for us to be able to monitor data reliability and quality and grow our data footprint sustainably.Monitor and manage our ETL pipelines, train other engineers and data analysts to contribute to our data infrastructure.Work closely with the Co-founder and CTO to build a first class data organization.', 'Our team is small, nimble and customer centric. If autonomy, ownership and having a meaningful say in the direction of the Company you work for is important to you - apply today!', "We’re hiring a Senior Data Engineer to join our team responsible for building Brigit’s data platforms.\xa0You'll work closely with our Data Scientists, Engineers, and Product Managers as a thought partner, technical leader and resource. This is a unique opportunity to help build the data strategy and architecture at a data driven startup that’s changing the world of fintech.", 'Your Role', 'Monitor and manage our ETL pipelines, train other engineers and data analysts to contribute to our data infrastructure.', 'Offer competitive paid parental leave policy', 'Competitive compensation package with stock options at a high-growth startup', 'Competitive compensation package with stock options at a high-growth startupDay 1 benefit coverage for health, dental, and vision401k participationOffer competitive paid parental leave policy', 'Our Benefits & Team ', 'You have familiarity with Google Cloud and data warehousing technologies like Snowflake.', "What You'll Do ", 'You can communicate with a cross functional team and articulate ideas to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.', 'Work closely with the Co-founder and CTO to build a first class data organization.', 'Lay the groundwork for our ETL infrastructure, setting up tools like Airflow and Spark to enable the rest of the team to contribute data pipelines, for us to be able to monitor data reliability and quality and grow our data footprint sustainably.']

['', '\xa0', 'STScI has most staff working virtually from home during the COVID-19 crisis through June 2021.The safety of our staff and community is our top priority. Please note that due to the proximity to JWST launch (October 2021) with\xa0the nature of the Systems Engineering work focuses in preparedness for launch and operations – some support for critical activities is expected on-site in our Baltimore facility. There are strict protocols for reducing risk implemented and continue to be followed.', 'We are seeking Systems Engineers to join our growing Systems Engineering, Integration & Test and Flight Operations (SEITO) Division. Our systems engineers support all phases of the Systems Development Lifecycle (SDLC) and may serve in a variety of roles to support System Design, Product Realization, and Technical Management, using the NASA Systems Engineering Handbook as a guide. We look at all facets of a System (or System of Systems) to include people, process, and product.', 'We will interview and screen candidates virtually. Offers of employment can be extended and new hires will on-board virtually. We will then ship systems to you to enable working from home but employees are required to be resident in the Maryland area within a limited timeframe from the start of employment.', 'Systems Engineering fundamentals knowledge (preferably aerospace related)', 'Named one of the best places to work by Baltimore Magazine', 'Direct Link to Job Posting: https://recruiting2.ultipro.com/SPA1004AURA/JobBoard/93330e50-7b3a-4ba8-94f2-6f32360aa4e1/Opportunity/OpportunityDetail?opportunityId=693f4a52-fdf1-4b1e-a7f5-754b75ea4cc2', 'AURA, as a leader in the astronomical community, is committed to diversity and inclusion. AURA develops and supports programs that advance our organizational commitment to diversity, broaden participation, and encourage the advancement of diversity throughout the workforce. Learn more at www.aura-astronomy.org/diversity.asp', 'Knowledge of current Systems Engineering tools and methodologies', 'Outstanding benefits including generous annual PTO: 24 vacation days, 3 personal days, and 12 sick days. Explore our benefits: http://www.stsci.edu/opportunities/benefits', 'To Apply: Share your experience by completing an online application. Please upload one cover letter and resume on one PDF document for review. Applications received by January 8, 2021 will receive full consideration. Applications received after this date will be considered until the position is filled.', 'You have ability to plan, prioritize, schedule, and maintain multiple demands', 'STScI sees the diversity of our staff as a strategic priority in our desire to create a first-rate community. We reflect that deep commitment in strongly encouraging women, minorities, veterans and disabled individuals to apply for these opportunities.', "Bachelor's Degree in Aerospace, Software Engineering, or Systems Engineering, or another technically related field and a minimum of 3 years of Systems Engineering experience.", 'US Citizenship or Permanent Residence in order to meet ITAR requirements', 'Systems Engineering fundamentals knowledge (preferably aerospace related)Strong analytical, organizational, and problem-solving skillsExcellent written and verbal communication skillsKnowledge of current Systems Engineering tools and methodologies“Big Picture” thinkingYou have ability to plan, prioritize, schedule, and maintain multiple demandsYou have ability to establish and maintain effective professional working relationshipsUS Citizenship or Permanent Residence in order to meet ITAR requirements', 'We are looking for candidates with varying levels of experience that possess the following experience and/or attributes:', 'As a recipient of U.S. Government funding, AURA is considered a government contractor and is subject to Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action regulations. As an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer, AURA and all of the centers, do not discriminate based on race, sex, color, age, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity/gender identity expression, lawful political affiliations, veteran status, disability, and/or any other legally protected status under applicable federal, state, and local equal opportunity laws. The statements below as well as the requests for self-identification are required pursuant to these regulations. We encourage your participation in meeting these federal reporting requirements that are included for protection and to assist us in our record keeping and reporting. Your responses are kept strictly confidential.', 'Explore all career opportunities through our website at: www.stsci.edu.opportunities', 'Named one of the best places to work by Baltimore MagazineOutstanding benefits including generous annual PTO: 24 vacation days, 3 personal days, and 12 sick days. Explore our benefits: http://www.stsci.edu/opportunities/benefitsGreat work/life balance', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills', '\xa0The Space Telescope Science Institute (STScI) is at the forefront of space borne scientific exploration through its operation of NASA’s flagship class missions including the Hubble (in-flight), James Webb (nearing flight), and Nancy Grace Roman (in-development) space telescopes.', 'Please note that due to the proximity to JWST launch (October 2021) with\xa0the nature of the Systems Engineering work focuses in preparedness for launch and operations – some support for critical activities is expected on-site in our Baltimore facility.', 'You have ability to establish and maintain effective professional working relationships', 'STScI is located on the Johns Hopkins University Homewood campus in Baltimore, Maryland. An easy commute from the rolling hills of Maryland horse country, the campus is minutes from the lively downtown cultural center and the Chesapeake Bay.', 'You will collaborate with a team that is passionate about the work they do in support of space science around the world. STScI offers an excellent and generous benefits package, tuition reimbursement, flexible work schedules, and a stimulating and diverse work environment. Relocation assistance may be available. Explore our benefits: http://www.stsci.edu/opportunities/benefits', '“Big Picture” thinking', 'About you:', 'Great work/life balance', 'Veterans, disabled individuals or wounded warriors needing assistance with the employment process can contact us at careers@stsci.edu. job_title: Data Solutions Manager (Remote Working, Funded Training for Cloud Certifications)
job_text: ['', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Apply good interpersonal and presentation skills to working in a fast-paced environment across multinational teams', 'Io-Tahoe enables enterprise customers to automatically discover, catalog, manage and drive business value from data wherever it is held. In doing so Io-Tahoe enables enterprise customers to automate workflows including Data Migrations, Data Quality, Data Governance and self-service Data Analytics. ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Provide programming and best practice consultation directly to our clients and partners for the integration of our Enterprise Data Automation products and services with large, complex datasets. \xa0\xa0\xa0Drive the partnership with other teams to understand client requirements, communicate product improvements, and assist with all client development needs. \xa0\xa0\xa0Adopt and embrace our cultural and innovative best practices and solutions in order to quickly and accurately identify and address highly technical problems. \xa0\xa0\xa0Be solution focused, able to quickly and accurately perform detailed and meaningful diagnostic work and troubleshooting, developing additional tools where you see a need internally or for our clients.', 'Io-Tahoe also provides an intuitive user experience designed to help technical and non-technical people collaborate.\xa0Our team with a deep understanding of data challenges, giving us first-hand insight and appreciation into our customers’ diverse and complex data needs. ', 'Data Solutions Manager', '\xa0\xa0\xa0At least one of Python, Go, Kotlin, Java, C++, scripting languages for manipulating data structures', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Provide programming and best practice consultation directly to our clients and partners for the integration of our Enterprise Data Automation products and services with large, complex datasets. ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Provide timely and informative feedback to the Enterprise Data Automation Product teams.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Drive the partnership with other teams to understand client requirements, communicate product improvements, and assist with all client development needs. ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Work closely with technical and data operations teams at client companies to understand their requirements and help them to build out solutions using our Data Automation Technologies.\xa0\xa0\xa0Actively identify potential areas of improvement or gaps in internal tools & monitoring systems and propose solutions.\xa0\xa0\xa0Apply good interpersonal and presentation skills to working in a fast-paced environment across multinational teams\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaborate with peers, sales, technical account managers and service delivery teams to drive critical client
