job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Bloomberg Query Language, Continuous Integration
job_text: ['', 'Our team is responsible for developing a low-latency analytics platform and screening engine. We are also working to define and build a domain-specific query language (BQL). This language allows users to express complex analytics and quantitative models for execution on the platform. ', "If this sounds like you, please apply! We'll be in touch if we think you're a match.", ' - Design and develop CI tooling based around Jenkins, Maven, Docker, and Github- Influence and contribute to the design of firm wide CI/CD systems- Collaborate with a team of highly motivated software engineers to drive an innovative culture- Think critically about the "bigger picture", take calculated risks and come up with creative solutions', 'As a member of the continuous integration and developer experience team, you will ensure our codebase remains stable and help increase the efficiency and development of new features. You will automate code and project management to reduce duplication of efforts and minimize time between implementation and deployment.', ' - Advanced Python coding skills with a focus on scripting and extensible frameworks- 5+ years of experience with Continuous Integration and Deployment, as well as IOC frameworks like Spring- Experience integrating Jenkins with existing in-house workflows- Experience with Persistence Frameworks, AVRO/JSON and RESTful services- Experience with scalable build and deployment systems (ability to build scalable systems for large computes on big data)', 'Bloomberg is an equal opportunities employer, and we value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', ' - Experience with Docker, Artifactory, and JIRA- Experience working in a test-driven development and agile environment', "Bloomberg runs on data. It's our business and our product. From the biggest banks to the most elite hedge funds, financial institutions need timely, accurate data to capture opportunities and evaluate risk in fast-moving markets. Enabling clients to access Bloomberg's data and perform custom analytics, the Bloomberg Query Language (BQL) and Analytics platform is at the forefront of innovation for our business."]

['', 'None required.', 'Strong communication skills, including the ability to speak clearly to a group of people', 'This means that the product manager must bring to the product team a solid knowledge of the various business aspects, including marketing, legal, compliance, customer service, finance, and privacy, along with industry trends and competitive landscape. The product manager must also provide a deep knowledge of our users and customers, and identify how to measure our customers’ engagement with our products. Finally, the product manager is expected to know enough about the technology to help make tradeoffs against other areas of the products, alongside their engineering counterparts.', 'What You Will Do', 'Required Credential(s):', 'Understanding of an agile approach/mindset to product development', 'Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience.Demonstrated understanding of the techniques and methods of modern product discovery and product delivery.2 years working on technology-powered products as either a product manager, product designer, engineer, data analyst, data scientist, or user researcher. Successful history of developing and delivering successful technology products to the market Demonstrated ability to learn multiple functional areas of business - engineering, design, finance, sales, or marketing.Experience working on cross functional teamsDemonstrated ability to figure out solutions to hard problems with many constraints, using sound judgement to assess risks, and to lay out your argument in a well-structured, data-informed, written narrative.Proven ability to engage with engineers, designers, and company leaders in a constructive and collaborative relationship.Understanding of an agile approach/mindset to product developmentStrong communication skills, including the ability to speak clearly to a group of peopleKnowledgeable on technology trends, excited to help craft the future of healthcareAbility have a short term in depth focus and long term strategic vision for product', 'Job Description', '2 years working on technology-powered products as either a product manager, product designer, engineer, data analyst, data scientist, or user researcher. ', 'Knowledgeable on technology trends, excited to help craft the future of healthcare', 'Demonstrated ability to figure out solutions to hard problems with many constraints, using sound judgement to assess risks, and to lay out your argument in a well-structured, data-informed, written narrative.', 'Equal Employment Opportunity', 'Demonstrated understanding of the techniques and methods of modern product discovery and product delivery.', 'What You Will Need', 'E-Verify Statement', 'Diverse Perspectives', 'Why Join Ascension?', ' While each member of the product team may be accountable for a specific risk, we look for product managers that understand that consistent innovation is the result of each member of the product team contributing their passion and ideas. The product manager must collaborate closely with all members of the teams to discover effective solutions, and then work together to deliver those solutions to the market.', ' We staff our product teams with the skills necessary to come up with effective solutions that are valuable (our customers choose to buy or use), viable (the solution works within the many constraints of the business), usable (the user can figure out how to use) and feasible (our engineers have the skills and technology to implement).', ' While we empower our product teams to figure out the best solutions to the problems that need to be solved, we also hold those teams accountable to the results. Shipping is necessary, but not sufficient. We look for product managers that are not afraid of signing up for results, even when this means they have to work through others to achieve the necessary results.', 'W', ' None required.', "High school diploma/GED with 2 years of experience, or Associate's degree, or Bachelor's degree required", 'Product Manager', 'Ability have a short term in depth focus and long term strategic vision for product', 'Work Experience:', 'Proven ability to engage with engineers, designers, and company leaders in a constructive and collaborative relationship.', 'Licenses/Certifications/Registration:', 'Desired Knowledge, Experience And Traits', 'Experience working on cross functional teams', 'Education:', ' This job, as with the other roles on the product team, is an individual contributor role. You will need to be able to influence your teammates, as well as colleagues, stakeholders, and key executives, through your use of leadership skills, data, storytelling, and logic.', 'Demonstrated ability to learn multiple functional areas of business - engineering, design, finance, sales, or marketing.', 'Successful history of developing and delivering successful technology products to the market ', 'The Ascension Studio builds solutions that transform the way Ascension delivers healthcare to millions. We empower our product teams to solve hard problems - customer problems and business problems - in ways that our customers love, yet work for our business. These teams are cross-functional and durable, generally comprising a product manager, a product designer, and several engineers.', ' While the product designers ensure usability and the engineers ensure feasibility, the product manager must understand the entire solution, constantly optimizing between different areas to ensure that solution delivers the maximum value over time.', 'We Are Hiring', '3 years of experience required. 5 years of experience preferred. 1 year of leadership or management experience preferred.', 'Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience.', "DiplomaHigh school diploma/GED with 2 years of experience, or Associate's degree, or Bachelor's degree required"]

job_title: Principal Software Engineer (L5), Platform Engineering - Containers
job_text: ['', '  You are a software engineering leader that is passionate, empathetic and loves to teach others.   You have a strong product and architectural vision and a demonstrated ability to communicate, advocate, and execute on that vision.   You have demonstrated experience leading teams, mentoring junior engineers, and teaching proven practices that help teams grow.   You have software engineering leadership experience in a large-scale, enterprise environment, leading teams which build and operate mission-critical PaaS or SaaS products.   You’re ready to join a remote-friendly, remote-first team and work across timezones in North America.   You have in-depth, hands-on experience building platforms at scale for containerized workloads, particularly leveraging Kubernetes, including cluster provisioning, operations, workload optimization, and workflow orchestration.   Bachelor’s Degree in CS or demonstrated equivalent experience  ', 'You May Be a Fit If', ' Wear The Customer’s Shoes: Your team will ship great platform features that delight your customers. You will get to know your customers and walk in their shoes. How will you listen to your customers’ challenges, identify opportunities, craft solutions, and deliver the right value at the right time? ', ' Be An Owner & Be Bold: You will be the technical lead responsible and accountable for the well-being, delivery, and growth within the team. How will you develop a culture of personal and team growth that encourages your team members to work together to achieve great outcomes? ', 'Where?', ' Be Inclusive & Empower Others: You will foster the growth of an inclusive, high-performing team. Outside your team, you will champion communities of practice, and can be an expert to lead and mentor when needed. How will you grow your team through teaching and nurturing welcoming, safe spaces where everyone can bring their authentic selves? ', ' You are a software engineering leader that is passionate, empathetic and loves to teach others. ', ' Bachelor’s Degree in CS or demonstrated equivalent experience ', 'Who?', ' You have demonstrated experience leading teams, mentoring junior engineers, and teaching proven practices that help teams grow. ', ' Write It Down: You will communicate effectively to executives, to your peers, and internally among your team. Are you able to distill complex thoughts and concepts simply? Are you articulate and concise in written and verbal communication? Will you communicate with empathy and understanding even in stressful situations? ', 'Because you belong at Twilio. ', '  Be Inclusive & Empower Others: You will foster the growth of an inclusive, high-performing team. Outside your team, you will champion communities of practice, and can be an expert to lead and mentor when needed. How will you grow your team through teaching and nurturing welcoming, safe spaces where everyone can bring their authentic selves?   Be An Owner & Be Bold: You will be the technical lead responsible and accountable for the well-being, delivery, and growth within the team. How will you develop a culture of personal and team growth that encourages your team members to work together to achieve great outcomes?   No Shenanigans: Great technical leads consistently display good judgment. They are intellectually honest, transparent, and work together with others by fostering an authentic, inclusive environment. How will you serve as a model for fair decision-making within and beyond your team?   Wear The Customer’s Shoes: Your team will ship great platform features that delight your customers. You will get to know your customers and walk in their shoes. How will you listen to your customers’ challenges, identify opportunities, craft solutions, and deliver the right value at the right time?   Write It Down: You will communicate effectively to executives, to your peers, and internally among your team. Are you able to distill complex thoughts and concepts simply? Are you articulate and concise in written and verbal communication? Will you communicate with empathy and understanding even in stressful situations?   Draw The Owl: You’ll forge the vision for how containers and Kubernetes make an impact at Twilio. There’s no instruction book, it’s yours to write. You’ll figure it out, ship it, and iterate. You’ll invent the future, but you won’t wing it.  ', ' You’re ready to join a remote-friendly, remote-first team and work across timezones in North America. ', ' You have a strong product and architectural vision and a demonstrated ability to communicate, advocate, and execute on that vision. job_title: Staff Software Engineer II, Salesforce (US Remote)
job_text: ['', 'Valassis offers a generous total rewards benefits package that includes medical, dental and vision coverage, 401K matching and generous PTO allowance. A wide variety of additional benefits like life insurance, employee assistance and pet insurance are also available, not to mention smart and friendly coworkers!', 'Provide meaningful code and design reviews', 'Qualifications', 'Who You Are', 'Demonstrated ability to work independently and as a party of a team', 'Driven. You have capability and passion for both front-end and back-end disciplines of software engineering.Technical chops. You know the Salesforce eco-system in-depth and understand how to use the platform effectively. In addition, you will be familiar with services leveraged by cloud technologies such as databases, queues, and asynchronous/parallel operations. Bonus points if you hold a Salesforce technical certification.Productive. You believe in automation and writing tests for your own code as a way of maintaining high quality in your products. You love writing things that "just work" - things that are robust, scalable, and perform well.A Team Player. You enjoy collaborating, learning from or teaching others so we can all become better developers.', 'Demonstrated experience with one or more object-oriented or functional programming languages', 'At least 5 years of relevant development experience', 'Productive. You believe in automation and writing tests for your own code as a way of maintaining high quality in your products. You love writing things that "just work" - things that are robust, scalable, and perform well.', 'A Team Player. You enjoy collaborating, learning from or teaching others so we can all become better developers.', '#VALIND #VALGD #LI-JM1', 'Collaborate with the entire engineering team to solve complex problemsDesign and develop robust & scalable solutions around the Salesforce CRM platformContribute to our team’s growing set of development tools and processesLead initiatives that cross functional and team boundariesProvide meaningful code and design reviewsWork with product stakeholders to define the future of the Salesforce platformLeave the codebase better than you found it', 'Responsibilities', 'Lead initiatives that cross functional and team boundaries', 'Technical chops', 'Integration experience with web services and micro-service architectures', 'Preferred Skills', 'Experience working with all aspects of the Salesforce platform, including APIs and 3rd-party related components', 'You will want to draw on your architectural skills and experience to evaluate advantages and trade-offs in finding robust and scalable solutions to business problems. Whether it is leveraging the abilities of the SFDC environment, build vs. buy decisioning, or defining a custom solution – you can provide the necessary depth of understanding and analysis to make the right decision at the right time.', 'Staff Software Engineer II, Salesforce', 'Ability to learn and apply new technologies quicklyExperience working with all aspects of the Salesforce platform, including APIs and 3rd-party related componentsDemonstrated experience with one or more object-oriented or functional programming languagesIntegration experience with web services and micro-service architecturesDemonstrated ability to work independently and as a party of a teamExperience with agile development methodologiesSalesforce Technical Architect certification a plus', 'Experience with agile development methodologies', "At least 5 years of relevant development experienceBachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related discipline with significant computer courseworkExcellent object-oriented or functional programming skillsExcellent cross-team communicator with technical and non-technical team membersPrior experience with Salesforce system management and oversight", 'Excellent object-oriented or functional programming skills', 'Driven', 'What You Will Be Doing…', 'Collaborate with the entire engineering team to solve complex problems', 'Leave the codebase better than you found it', 'Excellent cross-team communicator with technical and non-technical team members', 'Productive', 'Prior experience with Salesforce system management and oversight', 'Contribute to our team’s growing set of development tools and processes', 'Driven. You have capability and passion for both front-end and back-end disciplines of software engineering.', 'What’s in it for you?', 'Design and develop robust & scalable solutions around the Salesforce CRM platform', "Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related discipline with significant computer coursework", 'You will be responsible for designing, implementing and maintaining all aspects of the Salesforce platform as well as external integrations with multiple Salesforce APIs. You will work with native Salesforce platform components in front-end and back-end use case scenarios. And you will execute your work following best practices for software engineering in development, testing, build and release management.', 'Work with product stakeholders to define the future of the Salesforce platform', 'Who We Are', 'We are seeking an outstanding senior-level software engineer to design, implement and maintain world-class sales and business process execution with the Salesforce CRM platform.', 'Salesforce Technical Architect certification a plus', "Valassis, a Vericast business, is the leader in marketing technology and consumer engagement. We work with over 60,000 companies and brands in a wide array of industries, partnering to anticipate consumer intent, inspire action, and create demand. NCH Marketing Services, Inc. and Clipper Magazine are Valassis subsidiaries, and RetailMeNot Everyday™ is its consumer brand. It's signature Have You Seen Me?® program delivers hope to missing children and their families. Follow Valassis on LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook and Twitter. At Valassis, we don’t just accept differences - we celebrate them, we support them, and we thrive on them for the benefit of our employees, our clients and our community. Valassis considers applicants for all positions without regard to race, color, creed, religion, national origin or ancestry, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, disability, genetic information, veteran status, or any other classifications protected by law. In addition, Valassis will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities by contacting us at: recruiting@valassis.com. EEO is the law. To review your rights under Equal Employment Opportunity please visit: https://www.dol.gov/ofccp/regs/compliance/posters/pdf/eeopost.pdf", 'Ability to learn and apply new technologies quickly', 'A Team Player', 'Technical chops. You know the Salesforce eco-system in-depth and understand how to use the platform effectively. In addition, you will be familiar with services leveraged by cloud technologies such as databases, queues, and asynchronous/parallel operations. Bonus points if you hold a Salesforce technical certification.']

['', 'In-depth experience with continuous integration and continuous deployment pipelines.', '8+ years hands-on experience with developing SaaS based software products and solutions for service-oriented deployments in public (AWS, GCP, Azure, etc.) or private clouds.', 'Experience with monitoring tools such as Graphite, Grafana and Prometheus.', 'Prior experience with RDBMS systems and NoSQL databases.', 'Responsibilities', 'Work closely with engineering teams, product management and operations to provide platform and infrastructure features and components to support Qualys’ business objectives.', 'Built a data platform from the ground up.', 'Java programming skills including object-oriented design, prototyping, development, testing, profiling, etc.', 'Strong in data structures and algorithms.', 'Experience with HashiCorp technologies such as Consul, Vault, Terraform and Vagrant.', 'Description', 'BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Applied Math or related field.', 'Experience with container and orchestration technologies such as Docker, Kubernetes etc.', 'Exposure to Maven, Ant or Gradle for builds. ', 'Co-develop with a strong sense of ownership Qualys’ big-data platform that scales to meet/exceed the demands of processing over a 100 million transactions and terabytes of data per day. Architecture, performance, scalability, high availability and security will be your primary goals for delivering a first-rate experience to our customers.', 'Produce high quality software following good architecture and design principles that you and your team will find easy to work with in the future.', '8+ years hands-on experience with developing SaaS based software products and solutions for service-oriented deployments in public (AWS, GCP, Azure, etc.) or private clouds.Prior experience with RDBMS systems and NoSQL databases.Data platform design / build utilizing Cassandra, Redis, Elasticsearch, Kafka, Ceph, Flink, Spark or similar technologiesStrong analytical and debugging skills.Java programming skills including object-oriented design, prototyping, development, testing, profiling, etc.Knowledge of JVM concepts like garbage collection, heap, stack, profiling, class loading, etc.Strong in data structures and algorithms.Ability to clearly articulate and communicate technical concepts within and across teams.BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Applied Math or related field.', 'Requirements', 'Knowledge of JVM concepts like garbage collection, heap, stack, profiling, class loading, etc.', 'Built a data platform from the ground up.Experience with applying data encryption and data security standards.Experience with container and orchestration technologies such as Docker, Kubernetes etc.Experience with monitoring tools such as Graphite, Grafana and Prometheus.Experience with HashiCorp technologies such as Consul, Vault, Terraform and Vagrant.Experience with configuration management tools such as Chef, Puppet or Ansible.In-depth experience with continuous integration and continuous deployment pipelines.Exposure to Maven, Ant or Gradle for builds. ', 'Data platform design / build utilizing Cassandra, Redis, Elasticsearch, Kafka, Ceph, Flink, Spark or similar technologies', 'Experience with configuration management tools such as Chef, Puppet or Ansible.', 'Strong analytical and debugging skills.', 'Experience with applying data encryption and data security standards.', 'Co-develop with a strong sense of ownership Qualys’ big-data platform that scales to meet/exceed the demands of processing over a 100 million transactions and terabytes of data per day. Architecture, performance, scalability, high availability and security will be your primary goals for delivering a first-rate experience to our customers.Work closely with engineering teams, product management and operations to provide platform and infrastructure features and components to support Qualys’ business objectives.Produce high quality software following good architecture and design principles that you and your team will find easy to work with in the future.', 'Ability to clearly articulate and communicate technical concepts within and across teams.', 'Bonus Points If You Have']

['', 'Overview', 'Benefits', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Understanding of Development environments using RubyMine\xa0', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Full Medical, Dental, and Vision Benefits', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience configuring builds in Jenkins and using it to drive CI best practices, run tests etc.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Proficient in linux\xa0', 'SubjectWell is a venture-backed technology company on an unstoppable mission to disrupt the antiquated $100 billion-dollar clinical trial patient recruitment sector. Almost all clinical trials fall behind schedule, leaving patients unable to access the most promising treatments and pharmaceutical and biotech companies unable to quickly carry their innovations to market. SubjectWell was founded by two entrepreneurs on their third successful startup, to unlock the potential of a true marketplace for clinical trials. We leverage proven data science and performance marketing techniques to hit a hard reset to the massive patient recruitment challenge that sits at the critical nexus of speeding delivery of the best therapeutics to the world.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Familiarity with Java Script and Ruby a plus', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Create detailed, comprehensive and well-structured tests', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Estimate, prioritize, plan and coordinate testing activities', '\ufeffResponsibilities', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Hands-on experience with both white box and black box testing\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Austin, Texas based or willing to relocate', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Identify, record, document thoroughly and track bugs using Pivotal Tracker', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Develop and apply testing processes for new and existing products to meet client needs', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Proven work\xa0experience in software quality assurance with 7-10+ years of experience testing web-based SaaS applications.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Paid holidays', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Paid time off', 'About the position', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaborate with internal teams (e.g. developers and product managers) to identify system requirements', 'This position will monitor all stages of software development to identify and resolve system malfunctions to meet quality standards.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Track quality assurance metrics, like defect densities and open defect counts', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to work comfortably with github projects managing branches, merges etc.\xa0', 'SubjectWell has a newly created position for a Senior Quality Assurance (QA) Engineer to develop and execute exploratory and automated tests to ensure product quality.\xa0\xa0You will be working with a team of 5-6 other senior level developers/engineers to deliver weekly functional releases in a very collaborative environment. This position is based in our Austin, Texas office (post-COVID).', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0401(k)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Solid knowledge of SQL and scripting using MySQL databases', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Stay up-to-date with new testing tools and test strategies', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Exposure to and working knowledge of Tableau reports/extracts', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Company stock options', 'Requirements', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with performance and/or security testing is a plus', 'About SubjectWell', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Proven work\xa0experience in software development teams working closely with developers on a daily basis to understand testing scenarios', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Monitor debugging process results', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Manage and deploy builds on test/staging environments for testing releases before deploying to Production', 'The responsibilities include designing and implementing tests, debugging and defining corrective actions, writing test automation, investigating unit test failures and managing CI deployments among other tasks.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Casual office', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design, develop and execute automation scripts using open source tools such as python, selenium etc.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools and processes', 'The Senior QA Engineer\xa0role plays an important part in our company’s product development process. Our ideal candidate will be responsible for conducting tests before product launches to ensure software runs smoothly and meets client needs. If you hold an engineering background and enjoy providing end-to-end solutions to software quality problems, we’d like to meet you.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Hands-on experience with automated testing tools such as python, allure, selenium WD etc.', "Here's your chance to really make a difference, both in your career and in the lives of millions."]

We expect the candidate to take full ownership of the improvements, regularly communicating with multiple engineering teams, proactively identifying, prioritizing, and solving their common productivity issues."]

['', 'Participate in the review, design, development, implementation and maintenance of Cloud based and backend solutions, systems and applications.\xa0\xa0\xa0Analyze requirements and prepare detailed technical design documents.\xa0Perform unit testing and complex debugging. Participate in production releases and troubleshoot production issues\xa0Interact with and collaborate across diverse teams consisting of technical and non-technical personnel.\xa0Document designs, processes, work instructions, etc.\xa0Lead external partner development and QA resources\xa0\xa0Web development skills in newer versions of Angular, TypeScript, ASP.NET MVC, JQuery, RESTful API (about 3-5 years)\xa0Backend development skills in .NET Core 2.1, SQL\xa0Experience building and maintaining solutions hosted in MS Azure.\xa0Should have experience with SQL.\xa0Should have experience writing unit tests using MS Test and Jasmine frameworks.\xa0Should have used source control,and should be exposed to continuous integration principles.\xa0Should have worked in Agile mode\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Should have used source control,and should be exposed to continuous integration principles.\xa0', 'Analyze requirements and prepare detailed technical design documents.\xa0', 'Design, implement, and deliver technical platforms for several business applications spanning veterinary customers, pharmacy, warehouse/supply chain and customer service\xa0Contribute to the adoption of development best practices and new technologies\xa0Understand Covetrus products from both a technical and business perspective in order to develop and troubleshoot problems in a rapid and productive manner\xa0Create working software based on an understanding of business and technical priorities', 'This full-time position provides:', 'Should have experience with SQL.\xa0', '\ufeffCovetrus is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, color, religion, national origin, disability, protected Veteran status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law', 'Should have worked in Agile mode\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'EDUCATION & EXPERIENCE', 'Participate in the review, design, development, implementation and maintenance of Cloud based and backend solutions, systems and applications.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Bachelor’s degree in software engineering or computer science and/or related years of experience\xa0Minimum of 3 years of experience in object-oriented software design and development\xa0Minimum of 3 years development experience in .Net technologies and frameworks\xa0', 'Minimum of 3 years of experience in object-oriented software design and development\xa0', 'Backend development skills in .NET Core 2.1, SQL\xa0', 'Medical, dental, vision, and other insurance options401(k) with company matchEmployee Stock Purchase PlanProgressive Flexible Time Off (FTO) and Paid Time Off (PTO) plansPaid holidaysGrowth opportunities and more!', 'Perform unit testing and complex debugging. Participate in production releases and troubleshoot production issues\xa0', 'The physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions. Normal office environment with extensive use of computer.\xa0', 'Interact with and collaborate across diverse teams consisting of technical and non-technical personnel.\xa0', 'Design, implement, and deliver technical platforms for several business applications spanning veterinary customers, pharmacy, warehouse/supply chain and customer service\xa0', 'ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Create working software based on an understanding of business and technical priorities', 'Employee Stock Purchase Plan', 'Lead external partner development and QA resources\xa0\xa0', 'SUMMARY', 'Experience building and maintaining solutions hosted in MS Azure.\xa0', ' Software Engineer', 'Should have experience writing unit tests using MS Test and Jasmine frameworks.\xa0', 'Paid holidays', 'Medical, dental, vision, and other insurance options', 'Understand Covetrus products from both a technical and business perspective in order to develop and troubleshoot problems in a rapid and productive manner\xa0', 'Covetrus is a global animal-health technology and services company dedicated to empowering veterinary practice partners to drive improved health and financial outcomes. We’re bringing together products, services, and technology into a single platform that connects our customers to the solutions and insights they need to work best. Our passion for the well-being of animals and those who care for them drives us to advance the world of veterinary medicine. Covetrus is headquartered in Portland, Maine, with more than 5,000 employees, serving over 100,000 customers around the globe.\xa0', 'Minimum of 3 years development experience in .Net technologies and frameworks\xa0', 'The role of the Software Engineer is responsible for the development and maintenance of various Cloud and .Net related applications across business units. This position will contribute to the development, enhancement and maintenance of new and existing software solutions utilizing industry best practices in accordance with the organizations development lifecycle (SLDC) methodology. The development is focused on cloud solutions using Angular, MVC, ASP.NET and Azure services with significant backend .NET Core 2.1 and SQL processes.', 'Bachelor’s degree in software engineering or computer science and/or related years of experience\xa0', 'Progressive Flexible Time Off (FTO) and Paid Time Off (PTO) plans', 'PHYSICAL DEMANDS/ WORK ENVIRONMENT:', 'Contribute to the adoption of development best practices and new technologies\xa0', '401(k) with company match', 'Growth opportunities and more!', 'Web development skills in newer versions of Angular, TypeScript, ASP.NET MVC, JQuery, RESTful API (about 3-5 years)\xa0', 'COMPETENCIES', 'Document designs, processes, work instructions, etc.\xa0']

['', ' Create and implement test strategies, test plans, manual test cases, and automated test scripts for backend data validation. ', 'Experience with the Requirements analysis, Test Case management and Defect Tracking tools, for example Jira, qTest, etc.5+ years of experience with writing SQL (preferably PL/SQL) and ETL, stored procedures validation experience in large data warehouse settings.Understanding and experienced with Flat Files, ETL backend testing, and source target Mapping.Must have foundational understanding of data modeling, quality and metadata, etc.', 'Must have foundational understanding of data modeling, quality and metadata, etc.', 'Willingness to learn new technologies, research solutions to new and complex challenges, share lessons learned, and collaborate with the team on projects.', 'Critical Skills', ' Develop scripts to automate the backend data workflow for data integrity and accuracy across different data sources and among all data staging schemas. ', ' Create and execute efficient database queries to support, perform, or validate test cases to compare backend data with dashboard visualization metrics created in BO and Tableau ', 'Must be familiar and experienced with cloud computing, AWS data warehouse technology (Redshift), Aurora & PostgreSQL databases, cloud-based data migration services, AWS Data Lake, and other rational and non-rational (DynamoDB) databases.', ' Update and maintain SQL scripts and test cases as applications and business rules change and identify areas of improvement ', 'Experience with the Requirements analysis, Test Case management and Defect Tracking tools, for example Jira, qTest, etc.', 'Demonstrate excellent communication skills including the ability to summarize status and progress, raise concerns about risks or dependencies, and discuss team strategy with both internal and external stakeholders.Willingness to learn new technologies, research solutions to new and complex challenges, share lessons learned, and collaborate with the team on projects.', ' Develop SQL and Unix scripts for test data generation or test harness automation for iterative test cycles. ', ' McKesson is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action employer. ', '5+ years of experience with writing SQL (preferably PL/SQL) and ETL, stored procedures validation experience in large data warehouse settings.', 'Current Need', 'Strong background in SDLC, agile (scrum) development methodology, test scenarios identification, database automation script development, and execution and report analysis.Must be familiar and experienced with cloud computing, AWS data warehouse technology (Redshift), Aurora & PostgreSQL databases, cloud-based data migration services, AWS Data Lake, and other rational and non-rational (DynamoDB) databases.', ' Works in parallel with the business SMEs and BA staff to create thorough, accurate, and comprehensive SQL test queries and scripts. ', 'Primary Responsibilities', 'Minimum Requirements', 'Education', ' Write complex SQL queries to pull data residing in multiple databases, including SQL Server, Oracle, and other platforms. ', ' Explore and understand the Enterprise Data Warehouse (EDW) and bigdata architecture. ', ' Ensure the program performance meets service level agreements, with proper change management and configuration management. ', 'Strong background in SDLC, agile (scrum) development methodology, test scenarios identification, database automation script development, and execution and report analysis.', 'Additional Skills', 'Understanding and experienced with Flat Files, ETL backend testing, and source target Mapping.', ' Validate ETL and database procedures along with possible outcomes. ', ' Create and implement test strategies, test plans, manual test cases, and automated test scripts for backend data validation. Collect requirements and analyze and create test cases and procedures for system, backend, functional, and regression testing. Work with software developers, business analysts, and project managers to analyze test results and debug problems.  Works in parallel with the business SMEs and BA staff to create thorough, accurate, and comprehensive SQL test queries and scripts.  Validate the excellence, quality, consistency, security and performance of large quantity of data transformation through ETL and Business Intelligence.  Validate ETL and database procedures along with possible outcomes.  Validate integrity and accuracy of ETL data flow across multiple data tiers satisfying the business logics and meeting performance goals.  Develop SQL and Unix scripts for test data generation or test harness automation for iterative test cycles.  Develop scripts to automate the backend data workflow for data integrity and accuracy across different data sources and among all data staging schemas.  Conduct front-end data validation, API, stored procedures, and REST and web service testing.  Write complex SQL queries to pull data residing in multiple databases, including SQL Server, Oracle, and other platforms.  Update and maintain SQL scripts and test cases as applications and business rules change and identify areas of improvement  Create and execute efficient database queries to support, perform, or validate test cases to compare backend data with dashboard visualization metrics created in BO and Tableau  Evaluate comprehensive visualization reports (BO and Tableau) that verify and validate functional and non-functional system requirements.  Explore and understand the Enterprise Data Warehouse (EDW) and bigdata architecture.  Ensure the program performance meets service level agreements, with proper change management and configuration management. ', 'Summary', 'Demonstrate excellent communication skills including the ability to summarize status and progress, raise concerns about risks or dependencies, and discuss team strategy with both internal and external stakeholders.', ' Evaluate comprehensive visualization reports (BO and Tableau) that verify and validate functional and non-functional system requirements. ', ' Must be authorized to work in the U.S, now or in the future, without support from McKesson. Relocation is NOT budgeted for this position. ', 'Join us at McKesson!', ' Conduct front-end data validation, API, stored procedures, and REST and web service testing. ', ' Validate the excellence, quality, consistency, security and performance of large quantity of data transformation through ETL and Business Intelligence. ', ' Validate integrity and accuracy of ETL data flow across multiple data tiers satisfying the business logics and meeting performance goals. ', '4 years degree or equivalent work experience', 'Collect requirements and analyze and create test cases and procedures for system, backend, functional, and regression testing.', ' Work with software developers, business analysts, and project managers to analyze test results and debug problems. ']

['', 'Expeto is an equal opportunity employer. Should you require accommodation in any aspect of our selection process, please contact our recruitment team at careers (at) expeto (dot) io.', 'Broad experience in JVM and distributed systems.', '“People want what we do. They just don’t know that it’s possible.”', 'Advanced capabilities in Kotlin, Java, Clojure, Javascript, and/or Python.', 'An advanced degree in Software Engineering or related discipline.', 'As a result of the rapid adoption of our product in the market, we’re currently looking to add a few experienced Software Engineers that have “been there and done that” within the networking, telco, 4G, 5G, and/or IoT space, to help us continue the rapid evolution of our PaaS offering. \xa0', 'Why should you join our team? \xa0', 'Experience using Linux, Docker, and associated tools and technologies.', 'If you want to help us work smarter and faster than the giants of the private mobile networking and telco world AND be on the cutting edge of IoT…', 'Although we’re a fully remote team, our preference is to hire in Canada and/or the USA at this time.\xa0Our engineers are at the top of their field, we provide them with immense challenges to solve, and we compensate accordingly.', 'At least 5 years of software development experience, preferably including large-scale telecommunications and/or networking development (SDN and NFV).', 'An advanced degree in Software Engineering or related discipline.At least 5 years of software development experience, preferably including large-scale telecommunications and/or networking development (SDN and NFV).Broad experience in JVM and distributed systems.Advanced capabilities in Kotlin, Java, Clojure, Javascript, and/or Python.Experience using Linux, Docker, and associated tools and technologies.Experience with agile development, continuous delivery, and deployment automation.', 'If you’d like to be considered to join our team, here’s what we’re hoping to see in you:', 'At Expeto Wireless, we’re solving technical challenges that the networking and telco industry didn’t realize were solvable.\xa0', '“There are not many software engineering positions where you get to do heart surgery in a sense. The big carrier networks are closed. You get walls upon walls of security around that stuff. There are very few people who actually get the keys to the kingdom. That’s our gig. We are doing that heart surgery and playing around with stuff that very few people get to do.”', 'If you feel the above resonated with you, and you have what it takes to join our team, reach out, and apply today.', 'We asked a few of our engineers that exact question and here’s what they had to share:', '“Everyone wants to be a hacker. It is the ones that are actually getting into that code or those APIs, creating them and writing them. That’s what developers want to get at. That’s what we do.”', 'Our software integrates mobile networks and IoT applications onto a single platform specifically designed for the large enterprise market and we believe that harnessing data from connected devices around the world will unlock insights that shape business strategy and help companies make better, more informed decisions to ensure a sustainable future.', 'Experience with agile development, continuous delivery, and deployment automation.']

['', 'Experience in systems administration – specifically hardening – using Microsoft Group Policy Objects (GPO)', 'Position Requirements', "Kinney Group is a solutions-oriented professional services consulting firm specializing in automation and analytics to harness the power of IT in the cloud to improve lives. Security is in Kinney Group's DNA, enabling the company to integrate the most advanced automation, analytics, and infrastructure technologies as an optimized solution powering IT-driven mission and business processes in the cloud for federal agencies and Fortune 1000 companies. We are an elite team with a unique combination of credentials for strict security environments who serve our customers with an unexpected experience. We specialize in Splunk, AppDynamics, Puppet, and VMware to serve our customers as they journey through digital transformation.\xa0\xa0", 'Prefer experience in software update management using Microsoft Software Installation (MSI) Technology', 'More about Kinney Group', 'The Splunk Development Engineer should have experience with client/server communications privacy using private key infrastructure (PKI)', 'Splunk experience including, but not limited to, Splunk Administration; Splunk Search Processing language; Splunk Reporting and Dashboard Creation', 'The Splunk Deployment Engineer should be versed in linux scripting (SH, BASH, KSH) with at least two (2) years experience with these technologies.\xa0', 'Logistics', 'The Splunk Development Engineer should have experience in Windows scripting (batch, VBScript, Powershell) with at least two (2) years experience with these technologies.\xa0', 'Prefer experience working with Windows System Center Configuration Manager (SCCM)', 'Experience in application load balancing in Splunk and/or using DNS and Load Balancing Services (such as F5)', 'This role is based in Tampa, FL and will be required to be on-site.', 'Experience must include using regex (regular expressions) with a scripting language.\xa0Experience with perl regular expressions are preferred, but use of regex objects in any scripting language (bash, python, c++, ruby, etc.) is acceptable.', 'The Splunk Development Engineer should have at least two (2) years of hands-on experience in IT systems administration on Windows or UNIX platforms (RH Linux, SUSE Linux, HP-UX, Solaris or equivalent.) Must include specific expertise executing program installation and configuration from the command line.', 'Our colleagues subscribe to a shared ethos and purpose for the company to achieve clarity and organizational health.\xa0This translates across every customer touch point within the organization.\xa0We offer compelling work as well as leadership commitment to ongoing training and development.\xa0\xa0', 'Splunk Architect certification preferred', 'Kinney Group, Inc is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer.', 'The Splunk Development Engineer should have at least two (2) years of hands-on experience in IT systems administration on Windows or UNIX platforms (RH Linux, SUSE Linux, HP-UX, Solaris or equivalent.) Must include specific expertise executing program installation and configuration from the command line.The Splunk Development Engineer should have experience with client/server communications privacy using private key infrastructure (PKI)Excellent troubleshooting skills and strong technical learning aptitude required.Experience must include using regex (regular expressions) with a scripting language.\xa0Experience with perl regular expressions are preferred, but use of regex objects in any scripting language (bash, python, c++, ruby, etc.) is acceptable.Splunk experience including, but not limited to, Splunk Administration; Splunk Search Processing language; Splunk Reporting and Dashboard CreationThe Splunk Development Engineer should have experience in Windows scripting (batch, VBScript, Powershell) with at least two (2) years experience with these technologies.\xa0Prefer experience working with Windows System Center Configuration Manager (SCCM)Prefer experience in software update management using Microsoft Software Installation (MSI) TechnologyExperience in systems administration – specifically hardening – using Microsoft Group Policy Objects (GPO)Experience in application load balancing in Splunk and/or using DNS and Load Balancing Services (such as F5)The Splunk Deployment Engineer should be versed in linux scripting (SH, BASH, KSH) with at least two (2) years experience with these technologies.\xa0', 'Excellent troubleshooting skills and strong technical learning aptitude required.', 'Attaining the professional services revenue goals of the engineering team by demonstrating sound decision making, disciplined technical execution and domain expertise, and a relentless focus on customer experience will be critical to your position. Kinney Group will invest in training and development for team members to maintain current in new technology and tools, which serve our current and future commercial and Federal customers. While this role does not require specific Splunk training or knowledge, we will provide preferential consideration for candidates who have worked with Splunk previously.\xa0', 'Active TS/SCI security clearance', 'Splunk Architect certification preferredActive TS/SCI security clearance', 'As the Splunk Development Engineer, you will be a Splunk deployment expert for Kinney Group customers and prospects. Your role as Splunk Development Engineer is responsible for architecting, deploying and configuring Splunk products on behalf of Kinney Group customers. A background in System Administration, Security, consulting, and troubleshooting will prepare you well for this opportunity. It’s important you focus on core Splunk installations and gathering Splunk data across the enterprise, to feed into core Splunk and Splunk Apps. Additionally, as Splunk Development Engineer you will play a central role in expanding the Kinney Group IT Operations and Analytics practice.']

This Candidate will interact with other department/vendors on eliciting software requirements and work in a cross-functional environment with controls, calibration, and systems engineers.', '3 years of experience with embedded C/C++ software (hand-coding)', 'Experience using data acquisition tools', 'Experience with NXP Cobra-55 MPC5xxx family of automotive microprocessors', 'A minimum of a Bachelor of Science in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering or equivalent (Materials /Chemical/ Civil/ Aerospace/Computer/Computer Science or equivalent) from an ABET accredited university', 'Experience in Vector SLP communication stack configurations and implementation of CAN/LIN/XC', 'Experience with Vector CANoe/CANAnlayzer', 'Basic Qualifications:', ' Strong communication skills, both verbal and written', ' Experience in software verification / validation including white box, black box and gray box testing', 'Ability to adapt to a changing environment with minimal effect on productivity', 'embedded C/C++ software (hand-coding)']

['', 'Here at eBay, we love creating opportunities for others by connecting people from widely diverse backgrounds, perspectives, and geographies. So, being diverse and inclusive isn’t just something we strive for, it is who we are, and part of what we do each and every single day. We want to ensure that as an employee of eBay, no matter who you are, you feel safe, included, and that you have the opportunity to bring your unique self to work. To learn about eBay’s Diversity & Inclusion click here: https://www.ebayinc.com/our-company/diversity-inclusion.', 'Benefits', "This is a very important and impactful role for our team's 2021 roadmap. The work and deliverables will directly increase developer velocity and reduce feature time to market. Developer and release velocity is one of the top priority initiatives for eBay with direct VP and ELT visibility. This role will be working on the key native mobile solutions for that initiative.", 'We follow agile practices and focus on continual improvement in our practices, driven from the ground up. We expect you to advocate for improvements in code and culture, and to support your colleagues in the same.', "As part of the team, you'll also share your knowledge with the wider team as well as learning about and contributing to our core web experience.", '2+ years of experience in designing, building, refactoring and releasing native apps.', 'Experience with TDD, pairing, code reviews, and other techniques to maintain high-quality code and resiliency.', 'Job Description', 'Proven experience with Java/Kotlin on Android or Objective-C/Swift on iOS.', 'We’re looking for a motivated Senior Android or iOS Software Engineer , with interest in developing on both platforms, to help us build the next generation of our tooling and CI/CD pipeline at eBay. Together, we will impact and delight our internal users as well as millions of our customers.', '2+ years of experience working to build tooling support for a shippable main CI/CD pipeline', 'Expertise in Android Studio or Xcode', 'Job Requirements', 'Expertise in Gradle or iOS Xcode build system', 'You will be a member of our native architecture agile team, building native app experiences and tools for internal and external customers.', 'Interest in leaning and working on both native platforms', 'Experience in Agile/Scrum methodologies and working in Agile teams is desirable', 'Partner and collaborate with other organizations throughout eBay.', 'Expertise in Android Studio or XcodeExpertise in Gradle or iOS Xcode build systemInterest in leaning and working on both native platforms2+ years of experience working to build tooling support for a shippable main CI/CD pipeline2+ years of experience in designing, building, refactoring and releasing native apps.Experience in Agile/Scrum methodologies and working in Agile teams is desirableAble to own a feature of an iOS or Android application and develop it fully.Proven experience with Java/Kotlin on Android or Objective-C/Swift on iOS.Experience with TDD, pairing, code reviews, and other techniques to maintain high-quality code and resiliency.', 'Help us design and build the next generation of our build and CI/CD pipeline at eBay.We follow agile practices and focus on continual improvement in our practices, driven from the ground up. We expect you to advocate for improvements in code and culture, and to support your colleagues in the same.Work well with team members and other teams, dividing up workload appropriately.Partner and collaborate with other organizations throughout eBay.', 'eBay is a global commerce leader where you can influence how the world buys, sells, and gives. You’ll be part of a work culture that’s been genuinely committed to diversity and inclusion since its founding twenty five years ago. Here, you can be yourself, do your best work, and have a meaningful impact on people across the globe. We seek people with drive, ideas, and a passion for helping small businesses succeed to help shape the future of eBay—does this sound like you? If so, we’d love to talk to you!', 'Job Functions', 'Work well with team members and other teams, dividing up workload appropriately.', 'Benefits are an essential part of your total compensation for the work you do every day. Whether you’re single, in a growing family, or nearing retirement, eBay offers a variety of comprehensive and competitive benefit programs to meet your needs. Including maternal & paternal leave, paid sabbatical, and plans to help ensure your financial security today and in the years ahead.', 'Able to own a feature of an iOS or Android application and develop it fully.', 'Help us design and build the next generation of our build and CI/CD pipeline at eBay.']

['', 'Embedded systems programming in C, C++, assembly, and software support using C#, Python, and Java. ', '\xa0', ' ', 'You are confident in your technical skills, and your ability to add value to high profile and mission critical product design challenges. You are comfortable with client-facing activities and have great interpersonal skills. You have excellent writing and presentation skills – both used frequently for client presentations and in-person meetings. You are comfortable with ambiguity and complexity, because sometimes that leads to the most unique, unexpected design solutions. You want to work in an environment where things move quickly, and you’re happy to adapt as a project evolves. You can work on-site in our Philadelphia office, and you are willing to travel occasionally. You are confident that you will be a trusted peer to your colleagues, and a valuable asset to Bresslergroup. ', '\xa0 ', 'You are confident. ', 'More About You', 'You have at least a bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science or Engineering, Robotics, or some other related discipline. Advanced degrees are a plus but not mandatory. You have at least 2 years of experience working in software and preferably firmware development. Ideally, you have worked in a consulting environment for at least 2 years and are familiar with the way such firms operate. You have familiarity with various certification bodies for the devices you develop – FCC, CE, IEC, and others. You have experience working in multidisciplinary teams, and an understanding of what those disciplines do and how it affects your work and the project.\xa0 ', 'Work closely with electrical engineers and interaction designers to gracefully resolve technical roadblocks and contribute to broad problem solving and design efforts. ', 'You are curious. ', 'Please send your resume and portfolio to career@bresslergroup.com!', 'Key Responsibilities ', 'Functional test and debug using lab equipment such as oscilloscopes, multimeters, spectrum analyzers and signal generators ', 'You have a passion for embedded software and firmware development, and your past work experience and side projects strongly demonstrate this passion. You are highly skilled in designing system architecture, IP selection, requirements specification, and low-level embedded firmware development. You are proficient in C and C++ for embedded development, proficient in Python for rapid prototyping, and proficient in C# or Java for development of test and other general-purpose software. You can apply your systems engineering knowledge to the design of consumer, commercial, industrial, and medical device products. You are familiar with prototype design, low-level debugging, requirements management, verification, traceability, system documentation, and failure analysis. ', 'Your Team ', 'As an Embedded Software Engineer, you will work alongside electrical engineers, designers, and researchers in a dynamic development environment. You will participate in the daily activities of the Electrical and Software Engineering teams, to create meaningful solutions to challenging product design problems. You will participate in the specification and design of medical devices, consumer products, and commercial products by taking an active role in ideation, architecture, component selection and software and firmware development. Your energy and enthusiasm drives our Electrical and Software Engineering teams continue to grow and improve their capabilities ', 'Participate in the development of hardware drivers for peripherals, such as sensors, short and long range wireless modems, and more. ', 'At Bresslergroup, we are a motivated lot of thinkers, makers, and problem solvers. We challenge and inspire each other every day. We are curious, clever, and confident, and we look for the same in those we work with. Our work is driven by discovering insights into how our users interact with products in the real world, and our solutions are focused on seamlessly blending digital and physical layers of the experience. With six disciplines under one roof, we work in multidisciplinary teams whose combined research, creative, and technical expertise add value throughout a collaborative product-development process. This is how we remain reliably innovative. ', 'You are confident.', 'Your Team', 'More About You ', 'Are you an embedded software engineer looking for a new challenge? Bresslergroup is looking for a talented software engineer to provide embedded firmware development for a variety of consumer products and medical devices.\xa0', 'Your Purpose ', 'You like to explore new territories and to learn from others. You are passionate about emerging technology in product design and electrical engineering and interested in new ways of designing every day things. You can successfully lead clients through the full product development process, from brainstorming and conception, through testing, tooling, and production. You have a keen understanding of electrical and software engineering tools and methods and strive to find ways to improve them. ', 'Software project architecture, design, development, verification and project management ', 'Are you an embedded software engineer looking for a new challenge? Bresslergroup is looking for a talented software engineer to provide embedded firmware development for a variety of consumer products and medical devices.\xa0 ', 'Your Purpose', 'Embedded firmware development for a variety of consumer, industrial, and medical devices ', 'You are clever. ', 'Key Responsibilities']

building highly available applications on top of them.', 'A BS, MS, or PhD in computing.', 'Increasing the efficiency of the warehouse by helping users keep the highest value data by improving our Streamline the creation of new data sets with accessible frameworks and Domain Specific Languages (DSL). Improve the data quality and reliability of the pipelines (monitoring and failure detection). ', 'Skilled at crafting and building robust backend data services (distributed systems, concurrency models, microservices).', 'Expertise in object-oriented and/or functional programming languages (e.g. Python, Java/Scala).', 'Strong dedication to code quality, automation and operational excellence: unit/integration tests, scripts, workflows.', 'Supply reusable backend abstractions to ingest or access data sets (batch or low latency APIs).', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related field, or equivalent training, fellowship, or work experience.", 'Automate and handle the lifecycle of data sets (schema evolution, metadata store, change and backfill management, deprecation and migration).', 'Excellent written and verbal communication and social skills; able to effectively collaborate with partners.', 'Deep understanding of polyglot data persistence (relational, key/value, document, column, graph).', 'What You Should Have', 'Improve the data quality and reliability of the pipelines (monitoring and failure detection).', '7+ years of experience working with Big Data technologies (e.g. Hadoop, Hive, Spark, Presto, Kafka, etc).', 'Optimize the end-to-end workflow of data users at Slack (from crafting libraries to providing abstractions used to define jobs, schedule data pipelines or access data assets).', " 7+ years of experience working with Big Data technologies (e.g. Hadoop, Hive, Spark, Presto, Kafka, etc). job_title: Technical Support Engineer - Veeam Backup for Microsoft Office 365
job_text: ['Provide technical support and in-depth troubleshooting for Veeam Software’s clients (B2B) via telephone, email, and web conferencing.', 'Act as a technical focal point in relationships to fellow IT professionals.', 'Veeam Backup for Microsoft Office 365 (VBO365) is a comprehensive solution intended to back up and recover data of Microsoft Office 365, on-premises Microsoft Exchange, and on-premises Microsoft SharePoint organizations, including Microsoft OneDrive for Business. The VBO365 Technical Support Engineer is a trusted role providing technical assistance to fellow IT professionals, using broad and in-depth troubleshooting skills and product knowledge to solve challenging technical issues.', 'We are therefore looking for candidates that will offer support for Veeam Backup for Microsoft Office 365.', 'Research and troubleshoot customer problems and inquiries.', 'Contribute to documentation to build Veeam’s knowledge base.', 'Proactively stay up to date with all the latest technologies concerning Veeam’s products and the underlying technologies.', 'Technical documentation of all customer interactions accurately and within SLA in our CRM tool.', 'Provide technical support and in-depth troubleshooting for Veeam Software’s clients (B2B) via telephone, email, and web conferencing.Act as a technical focal point in relationships to fellow IT professionals.Research and troubleshoot customer problems and inquiries.Update and work assigned cases in a timely manner.Technical documentation of all customer interactions accurately and within SLA in our CRM tool.Contribute to documentation to build Veeam’s knowledge base.Proactively stay up to date with all the latest technologies concerning Veeam’s products and the underlying technologies.', 'Update and work assigned cases in a timely manner.', 'Responsibilities include, but are not limited to;\xa0']

['', 'BS in Computer Science or equivalent', 'Design and develop highly available database architecture and data models', 'Ensure that the platform meets business requirements and industry practices for data quality, security and privacy', 'Proactively identify areas for optimization and troubleshoot application slowness and database performance issues to provide appropriate solution', 'Experience with migrating mission critical database environments from one platform to another', 'Summary:', 'Strong ability to analyze and optimize complex SQL queries', 'We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer IV - Database to help transform database layer of critical product line. This role involves working with other architects, engineering managers and technical leads to modernize database layer for a SAAS enterprise product. This is a unique opportunity to be part of a growing product line with wealth of history and excellent opportunity to transform the tech stack. If you have experience and passionate about data, transactional databases and cloud, we would love to hear from you.', 'What You Get To Do In This Role', 'Required Qualifications:', 'Strong technical skills with a proven record of architecture and design experience in building large scale distributed systems/databases', 'Experience working with high availability, disaster recovery and server tuning strategies', 'Improve service availability, performance, and scalability through tuning, automation, tools, and process', 'Assist with on-premise legacy solutions as needed, refactor legacy solutions into cloud-based solutions, and manage data migrations', 'Be part of a team of super-smart engineers building the next-gen database platform', 'POSITION CAN BE BASED IN SAN JOSE/PORTLAND', 'Analyze use cases to optimize data model and data integrations for multiple products', 'Experience with software development methodologies and programming languages such as Java, RESTful API', '8+ years of experience in relational databases preferably PostgreSQL, data modeling and schema design', 'Work closely with application development teams to ensure database changes adhere to best practices and are appropriately prioritized and scheduled.', 'Hands-on experience in designing transactional databases, Cloud environments such as AWS, streaming data solutions like Kafka', 'Experience in Shell/Perl/Python Scripting', 'Develop and implement policies and procedures, including those for database standards, database backup and recovery, disaster recovery, and service levels', 'Hands-on experience with NoSQL databases like DynamoDB']

['Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science5+ years of relevant software engineering experience3+ years of active and recent Java+Spring experience (other languages and frameworks are a bonus)2+ years of Angular experience (enough to knowledgeably influence Angular codebase evolution)', '2+ years of Angular experience (enough to knowledgeably influence Angular codebase evolution)', '\xa0', '3+ years of active and recent Java+Spring experience (other languages and frameworks are a bonus)', 'You are a candidate with a proven track record of building scalable data processing applications. Specifically, you have:', 'LDAP, OAuth, SAML, JWT', 'We are a scrum shop and happy to teach and mentor if you don’t have previous scrum experience.\xa0If you do have scrum experience, then you’ll be happy to know that we do full scrum, complete with sprint planning, review, retrospectives, daily scrums, backlog refinement, and planning poker. We also embrace XP development methodologies and put great value on XP development principles.', 'CI/CD with Jenkins', 'Mongo', 'Clarabridge supports your autonomy, independence, and growth. As a purely commercial firm, there are no timecards or clearances, and we offer unlimited PTO and flexible work arrangements. Professional development opportunities include conference travel and dedicated time for independent projects. Perks include free coffee, sodas, and snacks, a pool table, waffle Fridays, a gym, and proximity to the Wiehle Avenue Metro station. Finally, as a member of an engineering team at a medium-size company, you will be able to have significant direct impact on technology and customers and will help shape the direction of our product at Clarabridge.', 'Unit, integration, acceptance, and performance testingCI/CD with JenkinsMongoLDAP, OAuth, SAML, JWTDocker (k8s a plus)', 'About us:', '5+ years of relevant software engineering experience', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science', 'Y', 'As a Lead Engineer on the Studio scrum development team, you will be leading a talented group of front end and back end developers in the creation of the next versions of our powerful-but-user friendly analysis software.\xa0The technology stack is comprised of many open-source technologies including Java, Mongo, Angular, Jenkins, Spring, and others.\xa0This is a hands-on, deeply technical role that includes architecture, design, and implementation responsibilities.\xa0Depending on your background and interests, this role could include people management responsibilities in addition to technical leadership, but that is not a requirement.\xa0There is lots of opportunity for growth, mentoring, collaboration across teams, and influence on broader technical initiatives as well.', 'Additionally, you have experience in at least a few of the following areas:', 'About the role:', 'About you:', '.', 'About the team:', 'Unit, integration, acceptance, and performance testing', 'Docker (k8s a plus)']

['', 'Acting as engineering lead for new customer launches, write and/or guide engineers to build SDK (Software Developers Kit) which can be used by a third party.', 'Experience working in a CI/CD environment', 'What is this role about?', ' Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Mathematics, or related field required. Master’s degree preferred. 8-12 years product development experience Deep understanding of computer science fundamentals, such as data structures, (trees, graphs, hash tables); understanding of functioning and implementation of basic algorithms, such as sorts, searching, and the capability to explain performance characteristics using Big-O Notations. Capability to debug moderately complex problems and analyze logs in production systems and to read existing code. Deep understanding of various data storage options, such as relational, no-SQL, etc. Excellent scripting skill in Shell, Python, or Ruby Excellent skills in languages, such as C, C++, Java, Golang, .net Core Ability to be on call on a rotating basis for the services owned by the team. Preferred: Strong leadership skills with capability to lead a team of engineers Experience in developing products in an Agile development environment Experience working in a CI/CD environment Understanding of Git and development activities such as merge and conflict resolution of code Understanding and experience in Docker, Kubernets, and AWS cloud services ', 'Experience in developing products in an Agile development environment', 'Mentor lower level software engineers, while coaching and influencing the performance and progression of others on the team significantly, and in some cases across teams.', 'What does a “Day-in-the-Life” look like?', 'Capability to debug moderately complex problems and analyze logs in production systems and to read existing code.', 'Strong leadership skills with capability to lead a team of engineers', ' Write documentation and automated tests for code to be written. Implement functionality for automated tests that will successfully pass and meet coding standards. Debug production issues and create subsequent mitigation plans. Optimize performance of existing implementations. Provide consultation to customers regarding appropriate data structures and make recommendations for the best data storage options. As a component owner, where the component impacts across multiple platforms (5-10 member team), work with customers to obtain their requirements, and deliver the end to end project. Acting as engineering lead for new customer launches, write and/or guide engineers to build SDK (Software Developers Kit) which can be used by a third party. Mentor lower level software engineers, while coaching and influencing the performance and progression of others on the team significantly, and in some cases across teams. Study the architecture and refactor if needed. Implement microservices to solve issues faced by platform. Prioritize tasks with Scrummaster that leads the team to be successful. Bring forward ideas to experiment and work in teams to transform ideas to reality. ', 'Write documentation and automated tests for code to be written. Implement functionality for automated tests that will successfully pass and meet coding standards. Debug production issues and create subsequent mitigation plans. Optimize performance of existing implementations.', 'Prioritize tasks with Scrummaster that leads the team to be successful.', 'Deep understanding of various data storage options, such as relational, no-SQL, etc.', 'Understanding and experience in Docker, Kubernets, and AWS cloud services', 'Provide consultation to customers regarding appropriate data structures and make recommendations for the best data storage options.', 'What do I need to be successful?', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Mathematics, or related field required. Master’s degree preferred.', 'Bring forward ideas to experiment and work in teams to transform ideas to reality.', 'Study the architecture and refactor if needed. Implement microservices to solve issues faced by platform.', 'Understanding of Git and development activities such as merge and conflict resolution of code', 'Deep understanding of computer science fundamentals, such as data structures, (trees, graphs, hash tables); understanding of functioning and implementation of basic algorithms, such as sorts, searching, and the capability to explain performance characteristics using Big-O Notations.', 'Excellent scripting skill in Shell, Python, or Ruby', 'Excellent skills in languages, such as C, C++, Java, Golang, .net Core', 'Preferred:', 'Ability to be on call on a rotating basis for the services owned by the team.', 'As a component owner, where the component impacts across multiple platforms (5-10 member team), work with customers to obtain their requirements, and deliver the end to end project.', '8-12 years product development experience']
