job_text: ['', ' Perform system level profiling of FortiSIEM in large-scale environments and make improvements (e.g. via tools such as OProfile/SystemTap/sysdig/Linux Dtrace)', 'Job Description', ' Deliver top quality, well organized and algorithmically sound code on time', ' Design and implement systems and platforms features such as full-disk encryption, automatic failover of FortiSIEM nodes in High Availability environments', ' BS/MS in computer science or related field, BS with 5+ years of work experience or MS with 3+ years of work experience Strong experience with Linux at the system level including system performance measurement tools such as Oprofile, SystemTap, sysdig, tcpdump etc. Knowledge of Linux distributions such as CentOS, Ubuntu, Debian and their differences in packaging and release, and kernel drivers for specific platforms Experience with distributed, scalable systems and Cloud Platforms is a plus Strong problem-solving skills Working experience with network and system security is a plus Team-oriented, self-motivated, fast learner, and willing to work in a fast paced and cross-site development environment', 'Responsibilities', ' Participate in functional spec, design, and code reviews', ' Design and implement systems and platforms features such as full-disk encryption, automatic failover of FortiSIEM nodes in High Availability environments Make FortiSIEM available on newer cloud platforms – Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud, Oracle Cloud, etc. in addition to maintaining current platforms such as Hardware, VMWare, HyperV, AWS, KVM, etc. Build a new paid AWS Marketplace offering for FortiSIEM, and maintain BYOL offerings for new releases Implement AWS Cloud formation templates for FortiSIEM cluster deployment in AWS Improve automated cluster deployment of FortiSIEM nodes in large scale environments, including auto-scale up and down of cluster Perform system level profiling of FortiSIEM in large-scale environments and make improvements (e.g. via tools such as OProfile/SystemTap/sysdig/Linux Dtrace) Investigate how to make FortiSIEM available on containers such as Docker and Kubernetes Migrate FortiSIEM application from platform or cloud Deliver top quality, well organized and algorithmically sound code on time Work closely with other developers, QA, PM, and support. ['', 'Qualifications', 'Utilize knowledge of national and international procedures and means to maintain traceability conformance.', 'Recommend changes to existing calibration products or processes when needed.', 'Completes other assignments as requested.', 'Must work well with others. Ability to communicate effectively with all levels of the organization.', 'Minimum of three years of Metrology engineering or Quality Assurance Engineering experience required. ASQ Certified Calibration Technician (CCT) or ASQ Certified Quality Engineer (CQE) is desired.', 'Perform data analysis for quality improvement.', ' Use design assurance tools to assist with risk management activities in new product development. Facilitate DFMEA & PFMEA reviews. Assist in the development and implementation of new calibration processes and products. Recommend changes to existing calibration products or processes when needed. Provide guidelines for test method development. Maintain traceability and develops measurement uncertainty analysis where applicable. Support ISO 17025 certification and accreditation requirements. Maintain expertise with respect to the methods and equipment in metrology technical area and industry standard practices.  Utilize knowledge of national and international procedures and means to maintain traceability conformance. Assist with test equipment and process problems relating to measurement techniques, instrument operation, or instrument deficiency. Assist in defining training requirements for new calibration processes. Metrology planning for new product development/qualification. Data collection and analysis for product validation. Perform data analysis for quality improvement. Must work well with others. Ability to communicate effectively with all levels of the organization. Completes other assignments as requested. ', 'Job Summary', 'KNOWLEDGE', 'Fundamental understanding of statistics theory, and practical experience in its application.', 'Demonstrated experience interfacing with customers to resolve technical issues.', ' Fundamental understanding of statistics theory, and practical experience in its application. Knowledge of design and development risk management. Demonstrated experience in trouble shooting problems. Knowledge of ISO 17025, General Requirements for the Competence of Testing and Calibration Laboratories. Demonstrated experience developing defensible measurement uncertainty budgets, determining Test Uncertainty Ratios (TURs), and applying guard banding. Demonstrated ability to understand and interpret technical documents, blueprints, drawings, and schematics. Demonstrated experience interfacing with customers to resolve technical issues. Experience developing calibration or measurement techniques for new or one-of-a-kind instruments, equipment, or measurement systems. Ability to set up, conduct, and report results of proficiency tests and inter-laboratory comparisons. Strong oral and written skills to provide excellent customer service ', 'Knowledge of design and development risk management.', 'Knowledge of ISO 17025, General Requirements for the Competence of Testing and Calibration Laboratories.', 'Maintain traceability and develops measurement uncertainty analysis where applicable.', 'Data collection and analysis for product validation.', 'Demonstrated experience developing defensible measurement uncertainty budgets, determining Test Uncertainty Ratios (TURs), and applying guard banding.', 'Experience developing calibration or measurement techniques for new or one-of-a-kind instruments, equipment, or measurement systems.', 'Metrology planning for new product development/qualification.', 'Maintain expertise with respect to the methods and equipment in metrology technical area and industry standard practices. ', 'Assist with test equipment and process problems relating to measurement techniques, instrument operation, or instrument deficiency.', 'Provide guidelines for test method development.', 'Job Responsibilities', ' Bachelor’s degree in Engineering or Science is required. Minimum of three years of Metrology engineering or Quality Assurance Engineering experience required. ASQ Certified Calibration Technician (CCT) or ASQ Certified Quality Engineer (CQE) is desired. ', 'Use design assurance tools to assist with risk management activities in new product development.', 'Demonstrated experience in trouble shooting problems.', 'Assist in defining training requirements for new calibration processes.', 'Support ISO 17025 certification and accreditation requirements.', 'Demonstrated ability to understand and interpret technical documents, blueprints, drawings, and schematics.', 'Ability to set up, conduct, and report results of proficiency tests and inter-laboratory comparisons.', 'Strong oral and written skills to provide excellent customer service', 'Assist in the development and implementation of new calibration processes and products.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Engineering or Science is required.', 'Facilitate DFMEA & PFMEA reviews.']

Our team embodies a sense of fun and an unwavering commitment to excellence. We share the belief that we can have a good time while still being the best at what we do.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Family discounts on prep programs', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Working with Engineering and Analytics team to design, develop, and implement end-to-end data pipeline and storage systems for customer targeting, messaging, acquisition, and retention.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Partnering with data science and analytics team to explore and integrate new data sources from internal and external sources.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa06 or more years of professional experience in Software Development and/or Data Engineering', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Never Satisfied', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Familiar with RedShift, RDS and distributed processing frameworks and systems', 'Who we are . . .', "·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent experience", '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience working in a cloud environment (AWS preferred)', 'Blueprint Test Preparation is seeking a Senior Database Engineer focusing on our LSAT products and MCAT products. In this role, you will be responsible for driving excellence in the build out of numerous data pipelines, data quality monitors and data preparation for use in analytics and machine learning initiatives.\xa0You’ll socialize the results of these efforts with multiple department to help drive growth and assist our students. This is a full-time position that is based at our new Los Angeles headquarters (remote during COVID-19) and reports to the Director of Engineering.', 'We are seeking future team members who display our values:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to understand and create complex SQL joins', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Proficiency in Python and at least 2 other programming languages', 'Blueprint is the leading boutique provider of LSAT and MCAT test preparation. We offer several prep options for students, including an online self-study program, in-person and live online classroom options, and live online tutoring. We are a founder-led company that started with a simple vision to prep students more effectively than the big companies by making learning more engaging, more entertaining, and more effective. We are educators at heart looking to serve our students better every day. We know what’s at stake and we understand what it takes to help students succeed.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Demonstrating industry best practices for data pipeline software development. This includes the use of project management tracking tools, source control, data cleansing and deployment scripts, etc.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Competitive salary at a fast-growing company', 'We’re excited about you because you have…', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Comprehensive health, dental and vision insurance', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Knowledge of common software design patterns and what problems they are meant to solve', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0401K plan', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Always Learning']

['', 'Experience implementing all types of sorters and goods-to-person systems, including high-density automated storage and retrieval systems (ASRS), carousels and robotic systems\xa0 ', 'Design, plan, source and implement automation solutions, including robotics, conveyors, sorters, scanners, vision systems and PLCs', 'Experience with Programmable Logic Controllers (PLC) and electrical controls of motors, Variable Frequency Drives (VFDs), switches, diverters, spirals and various conveyor components and types ', 'Design startup and ongoing personnel requirements for automation solutions based on product profile and activity levels; identify management and supervisory requirements for operations personnel', 'Identify outbound labeling/documentation requirements; provide annual cost estimates for packing materials and create cartonization tables\xa0 ', 'What you need to succeed at XPO:', 'Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical, Electrical or Industrial Engineering with a focus in Robotics/Automation Engineering\xa0 Availability to travel up to 30% of the time Experience with Programmable Logic Controllers (PLC) and electrical controls of motors, Variable Frequency Drives (VFDs), switches, diverters, spirals and various conveyor components and types Solid knowledge of project management principles with the ability to use discernment within defined practices and procedures\xa0 Demonstrated ability as a collaborative, innovative and strategic thinker who is decisive and results-oriented Ability to handle multiple projects and time demands with a high level of urgency, personal integrity, energy and stamina ', 'Specify packing methods to be used based on mode/method of transportation and product profile; specify containers/cartons and packing (void fill) medium requirements ', 'Identify changes to existing functionality and test IT solutions and functionality; partner with IT team to identify and document new functionality not currently available ', 'Demonstrated ability as a collaborative, innovative and strategic thinker who is decisive and results-oriented ', 'Develop processes and procedures for human interface functionality with automation equipment, along with supporting validation techniques and metrics to ensure successful project completion ', 'Experience with simulation software, 3D modeling/drawing and designing components and system parts ', 'Conduct root cause analyses of labor and/or process inefficiencies through operational data analysis, Pareto charts, process reviews, time studies, statistical reviews, simulation and discussions with operational leadership ', 'Solid knowledge of project management principles with the ability to use discernment within defined practices and procedures\xa0 ', 'Design, plan, source and implement automation solutions, including robotics, conveyors, sorters, scanners, vision systems and PLCsConduct root cause analyses of labor and/or process inefficiencies through operational data analysis, Pareto charts, process reviews, time studies, statistical reviews, simulation and discussions with operational leadership Develop design and equipment specifications for the implementation of automation solutions, including identifying facility design requirements based on activity levels, product envelope, product flow and transportation methods Build layouts and power requirements to accept automation designs; specify material handling and storage equipment solutions\xa0 Design startup and ongoing personnel requirements for automation solutions based on product profile and activity levels; identify management and supervisory requirements for operations personnelDetermine required maintenance support positions for each site depending on equipment functionality and service level requirements for on-site operations; develop preventive maintenance tasks and schedules to mitigate less than 100% uptime operations\xa0 Identify changes to existing functionality and test IT solutions and functionality; partner with IT team to identify and document new functionality not currently available Specify packing methods to be used based on mode/method of transportation and product profile; specify containers/cartons and packing (void fill) medium requirements Identify outbound labeling/documentation requirements; provide annual cost estimates for packing materials and create cartonization tables\xa0 Develop processes and procedures for human interface functionality with automation equipment, along with supporting validation techniques and metrics to ensure successful project completion ', 'Build layouts and power requirements to accept automation designs; specify material handling and storage equipment solutions\xa0 ', 'Determine required maintenance support positions for each site depending on equipment functionality and service level requirements for on-site operations; develop preventive maintenance tasks and schedules to mitigate less than 100% uptime operations\xa0 ', 'Pay, benefits and more. ', 'Software and controls engineering experience ', 'It’d be great if you also have:', 'Be part of something big.', "Bachelor's degree or equivalent related work or military experience 2 years of experience in high-volume operations and distribution-related work Experience implementing all types of sorters and goods-to-person systems, including high-density automated storage and retrieval systems (ASRS), carousels and robotic systems\xa0 Experience with simulation software, 3D modeling/drawing and designing components and system parts Experience with AutoCAD, Microsoft Office, Mini Tab and Six Sigma analysis tools", 'Logistics done differently. ', 'At XPO Logistics, we’re transforming transportation and logistics through technology by investing hundreds of millions of dollars in IT every year. As the Senior Automation Software Engineer, you will have a meaningful role in our future success by analyzing high labor content activities across the company and designing automation to improve operational efficiency and deliver positive Return on Investment (ROI) and Return on Invested Capital (ROIC). This is an exciting opportunity to improve productivity by developing strategies to help people work smarter, ensuring that we stay ahead of our competitors while delighting our customers. We will equip you with the best tools in the industry to grow and develop to a level that will exceed your expectations and help you reach your career goals.', 'Develop design and equipment specifications for the implementation of automation solutions, including identifying facility design requirements based on activity levels, product envelope, product flow and transportation methods ', 'Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical, Electrical or Industrial Engineering with a focus in Robotics/Automation Engineering\xa0 ', 'At a minimum, you’ll need:', '2 years of experience in high-volume operations and distribution-related work ', 'What you’ll do on a typical day:\xa0\xa0 ', 'Ability to handle multiple projects and time demands with a high level of urgency, personal integrity, energy and stamina ', 'We are eager to attract the best, so we offer competitive compensation and a generous benefits package, including full health insurance (medical, dental and vision), 401(k), life insurance, disability and more.', 'Availability to travel up to 30% of the time ', '1st Shift, Monday – Friday, 8:00am – 5:00pm', 'Experience with AutoCAD, Microsoft Office, Mini Tab and Six Sigma analysis tools', "Bachelor's degree or equivalent related work or military experience "]

', 'Background   / Experience ', 'Work   requirements', 'Samsung Semiconductor, Inc. is a world leader in Memory, System LSI and LCD technologies. Especially, SAL is tackling a variety of challenging issues in data center, server, and software infrastructure. SAL is operated like a start-up under Samsung umbrella. We are looking for most passionate and talented engineers who can share our visions and have a journey together. ', 'Collaborate   with universities and international teams ', 'A few   business trips are expected.', 'The   major role of this position is to conduct key research and development   activities for future memory (e.g., Flash, PCM, MRAM), SSD technologies, and   its ecosystem such as operating system (file system, virtual memory, device   driver), database system (relational database, no-sql database), and more   (e.g., storage system). ', 'Work   requirements ', 'Duties   and Responsibilities: ', 'MS +   5 year experience in SSD F/W or PhD in Computer Science or   Computer Engineering \xa0+ 2 year experience in SSD F/W ', 'Occasional extended work hours may be requested as   business needs arise. You are self-driven, but you enjoy sharing and mentoring your team, and when a decision has been made, you’re happy to support it\xa0You’re experienced with cross-platform development, and you have a deep understanding of the\xa0software\xa0development life cycle\xa0You’re confident in your abilities to command and understand application build pipelines and share those with your team in a way they can understand\xa0\xa0You’re experienced in\xa0system\xa0design and development, but you are also a powerful leader, which means you stay accountable for your successes and shortcomings', 'You\xa0will\xa0define the experience of VIZIO\xa0SmartCast\xa0as it evolves into a cohesive smart home experience,\xa0leveraging new technologies and helping define core architecture.\xa0', 'You have outstanding communication, organizational, and problem-solving skills\xa0(edited)', 'About VIZIO:\xa0', 'You have knowledge of professional software engineering practices & best practices for full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management,\xa0test-driven development,\xa0continuous deployments, and agile methodologies.\xa0', 'You have experience with object-oriented design.\xa0', 'We do not accept unsolicited agency resumes. We will not pay fees to any third-party agency, outside recruiter or firm without a mutually agreed-upon contract and will not be responsible for any agency fees associated with unsolicited resumes. Unsolicited resumes will be considered our property and will be processed accordingly.\xa0', 'About You:\xa0', 'Love Kotlin and Looking to use Kotlin Multiplatform to consolidate codebases!', 'VIZIO, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer committed to diversity in the workplace. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regards to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, national origin, protected veteran status, or any other basis protected by applicable law, and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability.\xa0', 'Now we need a brilliant\xa0Senior Software Engineer to join us and own the development of our features through the full-release lifecycle.\xa0', 'You’re experienced in\xa0system\xa0design and development, but you are also a powerful leader, which means you stay accountable for your successes and shortcomings', 'In a year, look forward to:\xa0\xa0', 'Taking\xa0ownership of\xa0releasing\xa0new features that delight our customers and\xa0being\xa0empowered to collaborate so your team can excel.\xa0', 'You have\xa0a BS degree or higher in Computer Science, Engineering or related field.\xa0', 'Experience in Java and/or Kotlin', 'You have\xa0a BS degree or higher in Computer Science, Engineering or related field.\xa0You have\xa05+ years of experience as a Software Engineer\xa0You have experience with object-oriented design.\xa0Experience in Java and/or KotlinLove Kotlin and Looking to use Kotlin Multiplatform to consolidate codebases!You have knowledge of professional software engineering practices & best practices for full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management,\xa0test-driven development,\xa0continuous deployments, and agile methodologies.\xa0You have outstanding communication, organizational, and problem-solving skills\xa0(edited)', 'Directly impacting\xa0the\xa0VIZIO\xa0SmartCast\xa0experience for our customers by incorporating customer feedback in the new features you developed.\xa0', 'You have\xa05+ years of experience as a Software Engineer\xa0', 'We are Beautifully Simple.\xa0\xa0', 'Location: Colorado or Texas ONLY', 'You’re the person your team trusts with their secrets. You know how to be tactful and supportive\xa0\xa0', "Headquartered in Irvine, California, VIZIO is a leading HDTV brand in America and the #1 Sound Bar Brand in America. VIZIO's mission is to deliver high performance, smarter products with the latest innovations at a significant savings that we can pass along to our consumers. Our loyal following and industry-wide praise continues to grow as we redefine what it means to be smart.\xa0", 'About the Team:\xa0', 'Managing\xa0the end-to-end testing of the features you implemented and\xa0sharing\xa0your findings with your team.\xa0Here’s the kind of person you are:\xa0', 'Delivering\xa0features\xa0that\xa0are flexible, cost-effective,\xa0maintainable\xa0and long-lasting,\xa0at-scale.\xa0', 'You’re experienced with cross-platform development, and you have a deep understanding of the\xa0software\xa0development life cycle\xa0', 'Powerful entertainment experiences come from brilliant teams, and at VIZIO, we work together to deliver the latest\xa0SmartCast\xa0TV and Sound Bar Technology across the world. We\xa0are\xa0skilled engineers who care about the people they work with, the work they create, and the teams they nurture.\xa0At VIZIO we’re built around supporting each other in a relaxed, collaborative environment. We’re focused on learning, doing something new and valuable, and encouraging our team to do the same. With flexible work hours, a collaborative open-door environment, and teams who support each other in and out of the office, our work experience becomes meaningful. (And we don’t focus on hierarchy; instead, we work together to create the roles we’re most excited about).\xa0']

job_text: ['', 'Experience with cloud computing APIs (Amazon Web Services preferred).', '8-10\xa0years of development experience including knowledge of Java and related tools such as Spring Framework, Spring Boot, MavenKnowledge of C# and .Net Framework.Experience with cloud computing APIs (Amazon Web Services preferred).Experience with cloud computing services (Amazon Web Services like Lambda, S3, CloudWatch, ECS, and RDS preferred)Hands on experience using and developing REST APIs using micro services architecture.Working knowledge of distributed enterprise architecture.Strong understanding of Git, Bitbucket, Jira, Confluence, Swagger (API documentation).Solid understanding of relational databases (such as MS SQL Server, MySQL and Aurora) concepts.Ability to comprehensively understand data sources, elements and relationships in both business and technical terms.Experience with Agile/Scrum is desired.', 'Ability to comprehensively understand data sources, elements and relationships in both business and technical terms.', '8-10\xa0years of development experience including knowledge of Java and related tools such as Spring Framework, Spring Boot, Maven', 'Strong understanding of Git, Bitbucket, Jira, Confluence, Swagger (API documentation).', 'Must Have:\xa0', 'Hands on experience using and developing REST APIs using micro services architecture.', 'Solid understanding of relational databases (such as MS SQL Server, MySQL and Aurora) concepts.', 'Experience with Agile/Scrum is desired.', 'Working knowledge of distributed enterprise architecture.', 'Senior Software Engineer (Java, AWS, C#)\xa0', 'Experience with cloud computing services (Amazon Web Services like Lambda, S3, CloudWatch, ECS, and RDS preferred)', 'Knowledge of C# and .Net Framework.']

['', 'Ensures the integrity of high availability data center and campus Lan network infrastructure to provide maximum performance in design, implementation, and support.', 'Designs and implements new solutions and continues improvement of the current network and/or systems facilities.', 'Strong automation skill with a variety of tools and scripting languages.', 'Develops and uses automation to complete routine and repeatable tasks.', '\xa0', 'Additional Job Requirements', 'CTG will consider for employment all qualified applicants including those with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the requirements of all applicable local, state, and federal laws.', 'Cloud Network Engineers', " To be successful in this position, the ideal candidate should be a highly motivated, results-driven individual who can create the perfect solution for our client's higher-level needs. The best candidate will also be an excellent listener and communicator, with the ability to explain why their solutions are the best fit for our clients.", ' Kindly forward to any other interested parties. Thank you!', 'CTG (NASDAQ: CTG) has developed a reputation for responsiveness and reliability - traits that our clients say set us apart - since our founding in 1966. As one team, we create and deliver information and technology solutions that make our clients more successful and cultivate a workplace that attracts and develops the best people. Our vision is to be an indispensable partner to our clients and the preferred career destination for information and technology experts. CTG has operations in North America, South America, Western Europe, and India and regularly posts news and other important information online at www.ctg.com.', 'Ability to work independently and professionally within a team environment.', 'Maintains professional skillset by participating in educational opportunities, technical organizations, reading professional publications, and personal use of technology.', ' ', ' CTG’s Benefits Plan allows you to select insurance coverage that best suits your lifestyle, and take part in our savings programs and educational plans. We offer Flexible Spending Accounts, a 401(k) Retirement Plan, and an Employee Stock Purchase plan. Our educational plan comprises access to more than 2,000 web-based technical, professional and business development courses', 'Ability to provide training to team members on technology.', 'Audits, forecasts, and manages capacity of IP addressing, bandwidth forecasting, hardware, software licensing, and hosted devices', 'Coordinates with project management and engineering teams on a regular basis. Supports and manages escalation events. Develops and updates documentation and support materials. Mentors junior engineers and technicians.', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Technologies, Network Engineering, or related field is required.", ' Additional Job Requirements: Mid-level position for the engineering professional. Must have a comprehensive understanding of data center and campus lan networking operations and functions and be familiar with applicable engineering functions, aspects, applicable codes, and standards. Strong understanding of Software Defined Data Center construction and operations. Receives work assignments of a higher level but also receives general guidance, periodic review, and direction from the supervisor. Participates in larger projects and can be counted on to complete specific assigned engineering tasks on time and within budgeted costs. Capable of performing the role of project engineer for small projects; responsible for providing technical direction to junior engineers and technicians. Demonstrated time management skills to smoothly and professionally manage multiple complex projects on time and on budget.', 'A combination of relevant education and/or work experience enough to perform the duties of the job may substitute for the experience and/or education requirement on a year-for-year basis.', 'Minimum qualifications:', 'Experience working with moderate to complex project management within a data center environment or related field.', "Minimum of two years' experience in any combination within the fields listed below:Progressive experience in cloud networking.Experience in cloud network development and internal and multi-cloud networking environments.Experience working with moderate to complex project management within a data center environment or related field.Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Technologies, Network Engineering, or related field is required.A combination of relevant education and/or work experience enough to requisition using the link provided or by going to www.ctg.com/careers and referencing job ID 20204590.', 'Mentors junior engineers and technicians.', 'The Cloud Network Engineer is responsible for function of supporting Data Center, Campus LAN, Internet Edge and Branch Office networks. Works collaboratively with other Cloud Network Engineers, Cloud Systems Engineers, and DevOps Engineers throughout the company to develop, deploy and maintain Hybrid Cloud and SDDC platforms. The Cloud Network Engineer strives to achieve improved deployment frequency for faster time to market, shortened lead time between fixes, and quicker recovery time in the event of a new release failure. This is achieved through the engineering and deployment of physical and virtual networks using Continuous Delivery methodologies, built to scale with efficient repeat-ability and effective reliability.', 'Strong verbal and written communication skills.', "Our culture is a direct result of the people who work at CTG, the values we hold, and the actions we take. In other words, our people are the culture. It's a living, breathing thing that is renewed every day through the ways we engage with each other, our clients, and our communities. Part of our mission is to cultivate a workplace that attracts and develops the best people, reflected by our recognition as a Great Place to Work-certified company across many of our global ['', 'Hundreds of customers across the Global 2000 – including Adobe, AstraZeneca, Box, GameStop, Verizon, and Wendy’s – rely on SnapLogic to connect enterprise data to ensure a compelling return on their application, big data and IoT investments. SnapLogic was founded by data industry veteran Gaurav Dhillon and is backed by blue-chip investors including Andreessen Horowitz, Capital One, Ignition Partners, Microsoft, Triangle Peak Partners, and Vitruvian Partners. Learn more atwww.snaplogic.com.', 'Vibrant Company Culture: We firmly believe that our people are our strongest asset as a company and we never lose sight of that belief. Our work environment, company programs and employee services are all geared to ensure our employees have challenging and meaningful roles along with a great place to do their best work. Our efforts to keep our culture thriving and strong are paying off: for two years’ running, we have been named a\xa0Bay Area Top Workplace\xa0and Mogul recently selected SnapLogic for their list of the\xa0Top 100 Companies for Millenial Women.', 'Become a trusted advisor for the prospect and help define their integration strategy', '\xa0', 'Proven time management & prioritization skills in a dynamic sales environment', 'What We’re Looking For:', 'In-depth understanding of APIs (Rest and SOAP)', 'Design innovative solutions to address challenges and build those solutions on the SnapLogic Intelligent Integration Platform.\xa0Present customized story-driven demonstrations aligned with key business value and solution differentiation.', 'Data integration knowledge and experience is a big PLUS', 'Hot Market: With the proliferation of cloud applications and the increasing need to have a data-driven business, finding an integration technology is top of mind for many companies. According to industry analysts, the Integration Platform as a Service (iPaaS) market grew by 70% in 2017, making it the fastest growth area in the application infrastructure and middleware market.', '5+ years in pre-sales environment at a software vendorAbility to work as part of a team to solve business and technical problems in varied political environmentsSolid verbal, written, presentation and interpersonal communication skillsProven time management & prioritization skills in a dynamic sales environmentExperience in product applications, ability to understand and explain related technical issues, working knowledge of company products, all potential applications and effective communication skills.Excellent hands-on relational database skills (SQL), and cloud computing/web 2.0 technologies.Excellent skills in conducting POC’s and relating the technical value to business value in pre-sales environmentStrong experience with SaaS, cloud computing, web technologiesIn-depth understanding of APIs (Rest and SOAP)Programming or scripting skills (Java, JavaScript, Python)Data integration knowledge and experience is a big PLUSB.S. Earlier this year, SnapLogic celebrated the one-year anniversary of its industry-first artificial intelligence technology, known as Iris AI, which is paving the way for autonomous integration with exciting innovations set to be released over the next 2-3 years.', 'Present SnapLogic Intelligent Integration Platform, including demonstrating deep familiarity with hardware, software, networking and security stack', 'Experience in product applications, ability to understand and explain related technical issues, working knowledge of company products, all potential applications and effective communication skills.', 'Happy Customers: Our customers see unmatched results with the SnapLogic platform. Box connected 24 + apps in months with only 1.5 developers. SnapLogic’s customer retention rate is over 95%, and analysts recognize SnapLogic as an industry leader in customer satisfaction.', 'Ability to work as part of a team to solve business and technical problems in varied political environments', '5+ years in pre-sales environment at a software vendor', 'AI-fueled Product Innovation', 'Discover and analyze individual customer goals and challenges and map those back into the SnapLogic Intelligent Integration Platform solutionsDesign innovative solutions to address challenges and build those solutions on the SnapLogic Intelligent Integration Platform.\xa0Present customized story-driven demonstrations aligned with key business value and solution differentiation.Present SnapLogic Intelligent Integration Platform, including demonstrating deep familiarity with hardware, software, networking and security stackRespond effectively to RFIs and RFPsParticipate in training and certifications to acquire and maintain the knowledge necessary to be effective in roleAttain quarterly and annual objectives that you will define collaboratively with your managerTravel as requiredFunction effectively in a fast-paced high-energy market segment and successfully balance multiple projects in a team-selling environmentBecome a trusted advisor for the prospect and help define their integration strategy', 'Participate in training and certifications to acquire and maintain the knowledge necessary to be effective in role', 'SnapLogic’s\xa0Intelligent Integration Platform\xa0accelerates data flow across applications, databases, data warehouses, big data streams, and IoT deployments – whether on premises or in the cloud. Unlike traditional integration software that requires painstaking, hand-crafted coding by teams of developers, SnapLogic’s simple but powerful platform enables both IT and business users to create quality, scalable data pipelines that get the right data to the right people at the right time.', 'Excellent skills in conducting POC’s and relating the technical value to business value in pre-sales environment', "Hot Market: With the proliferation of cloud applications and the increasing need to have a data-driven business, finding an integration technology is top of mind for many companies. Please do not forward resumes to SnapLogic employees or to any other company location. SnapLogic is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes and will not pay fees to any third-party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with the company. SnapLogic provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, disability, genetic information, marital status, amnesty, or status as a covered veteran in accordance with applicable federal, state and local laws. SnapLogic complies with applicable state and local laws governing non-discrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including, but not limited to, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation, and training. SnapLogic expressly prohibits any form of unlawful employee harassment based on race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, genetic information, disability, or veteran status. Improper interference with the ability of SnapLogic employees to perform their expected job duties is absolutely not tolerated.', 'SnapLogic is the leader in self-service application and data integration. Our mission is to make it fast and easy for users to access, connect and analyze enterprise data to improve business processes, accelerate decision-making, and drive better business outcomes.', 'Discover and analyze individual customer goals and challenges and map those back into the SnapLogic Intelligent Integration Platform solutions', 'Respond effectively to RFIs and RFPs', 'Travel as required', 'Company Momentum', 'Industry Recognition', 'Solid verbal, written, presentation and interpersonal communication skills', "Company Momentum: SnapLogic consistently sees impressive bookings growth year-over-year, recently adding global customers like Emirates, Hewlett Packard Enterprise, PwC, Schneider Electric, Thomson Reuters, and Workday. This individual will participate in video conferencing, phone, email, and in-person direct customer interactions to quickly assess customer needs, demonstrate SnapLogic’s innovative solution, and support customer proof of concept/proof of value engagements, helping support to troubleshoot mission critical issues, documenting product enhancements and defects discovered, and communicating with the product management team. job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Single Sign On & Portal
job_text: ['', "We're looking for talented engineers who want to help us build Clever into something every school, student, and teacher relies on.", 'Things We’re Looking For', '5+ years of experience as a Software Engineer', 'Excellent communication skills', 'Unlimited Paid Time Off', 'Clever Perks', 'Experience working on consumer products (preferred, but not required)', 'Top-notch healthcare, vision, and dental coverage for you and your family', 'An incredible team of fun, bright coworkers', "As an engineer on the SSO and Portal team, you'll join an energetic tight-knit team working on features like:", 'To get a sense of what the Clever engineering team is working on, check out our\xa0engineering blog.', 'Experience with React Native mobile development', 'Clever Badges, QR codes that schools can print and give to kids to login without a password, saving valuable class time', 'A competitive salary and equity package in a well-funded, high-growth company', "Best-in-class mental healthcare service that supports employees' mental and emotional wellness", 'The Clever Portal experience on mobile devices', 'The drive to learn and teach through collaboration and code reviews', 'The APIs and protocols that power secure SSO', 'At Clever, we believe the classrooms we serve and our company’s halls should be spaces that are diverse, equitable, and inclusive. That is why we are committed to building diverse teams, inviting every voice, and creating a safe space for everyone to be their authentic self. By fostering equity and belonging within our circles of influence, we unlock learning for ALL students.', 'You may be a fit for this role if you have:', 'A desire to work in a diverse, fast-paced and highly collaborative team environment', 'Led projects and collaborated with a team to create meaningful impact', 'Unlimited credits for learning on amazon.com and small, local bookstores', 'New\xa0features\xa0and\xa0functionality\xa0in the Clever Portal so teachers can run their classrooms through Clever', "Clever is the fastest growing product in K-12 education; depended on by over 500 software companies and over 60% of America's schools. These organizations rely on Clever to put the best software in the hands of over 20 million students every day. Clever's job is to make this task incredibly simple, despite the complex legacies of the school system.", 'A Day in the Life', 'Architected systems to solve a variety of product needs', 'The Clever Portal experience on mobile devicesNew\xa0features\xa0and\xa0functionality\xa0in the Clever Portal so teachers can run their classrooms through CleverSaved Passwords, the “LastPass” for education, allowing students to easily get logged into any learning applicationThe APIs and protocols that power secure SSOClever Badges, QR codes that schools can print and give to kids to login without a password, saving valuable class time', "A competitive salary and equity package in a well-funded, high-growth companyUnlimited Paid Time OffTop-notch healthcare, vision, and dental coverage for you and your familyBest-in-class mental healthcare service that supports employees' mental and emotional wellnessUnlimited credits for learning on amazon.com and small, local bookstoresAnnual company retreat and quarterly team eventsAn incredible team of fun, bright coworkers", 'Annual company retreat and quarterly team events', 'We work across the full-stack to create products that are robust and delightful for students, educators, and developers to use. Currently we write frontend code in Node.js, TypeScript, and React with Redux and use Go for backend. We also use MongoDB, Postgres, Dynamo, Docker, and many AWS services (ECS, Step Functions, etc).', 'Strong fundamentals in computer science and software engineering', 'Experience with SSO, authentication and authorization technologies (preferred, but not required)', '5+ years of experience as a Software EngineerLed projects and collaborated with a team to create meaningful impactArchitected systems to solve a variety of product needsStrong fundamentals in computer science and software engineeringThe drive to learn and teach through collaboration and code reviewsExcellent communication skillsA desire to work in a diverse, fast-paced and highly collaborative team environmentExperience with React Native mobile developmentExperience with SSO, authentication and authorization technologies (preferred, but not required)Experience working on consumer products (preferred, but not required)', 'Saved Passwords, the “LastPass” for education, allowing students to easily get logged into any learning application']

Certifications with cloud platforms are highly desiredGood understanding on cloud network and security, able to review security architecture in current cloud infrastructure and provide guidanceFamiliarity with cloud operations, experience or ability to respond to operational issuesFamiliarity with containerization technology such as Dockers, Kubernetes is a huge plusA self starter who with experience with multi-functional technical teams and decision makers', 'Familiarity with at least one of the following languages: Go, C, Python, ES6, Typescript', 'Requirements:', 'Familiarity with at least one of the following web frameworks: Django, Flask, Express.js, Koa.js, Go-Gin or equivalent', 'Develop SaaS offerings for TigerGraph Cloud (TigerGraph as a Service).', 'Collaborate with TigerGraph core engine team to develop cloud native TigerGraph', 'Experience or familiarity with AWS, Azure or Google Cloud Platform; Certifications with cloud platforms are highly desired', 'Tigergraph is the only Scalable Enterprise Graph Database system, powered by the first and only native parallel graph technology. We are in an emerging database category and we have been growing rapidly in the past year out of stealth mode. Recent achievement includes receiving a 4.5 out of 5 in InfoWorld’s software review and winning the most disruptive startup in Strata Data conference.', 'Improve on the cloud service offering and provide architecture design enhancement']

While you don’t seek glory or public recognition, you take satisfaction in knowing you’re great at what you do and that you’re an important part of a winning team. ', '4. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0  Maintains work order and inventory database.  Develops reports and spreadsheets from CMMS data and reviews for accuracy and  completeness. Provides reports to Chief Engineer and other administrative  staff as required. ', 'Proven competency in advanced troubleshooting and repair of the majority of CARTI’s clinical equipment. ', 'EDUCATION, CERTIFICATION, LICENSURE and REGISTRATION: ', '\xa0Five years experience component-level troubleshooting and repair of the following: high-energy linear accelerators, multi-leaf collimators, and analog and digital electronic equipment. ', 'Two years experience and proven competency in the troubleshooting and repair of radiotherapy simulators, CT scanners, and digital imaging equipment. ']

job_title: IAM Software Engineer Lead - Identity Access Management
job_text: ['', '10 years in Information Systems including five (5) years experience in a support role working on IAM products (Oracle/SailPoint/ Okta/CA/IBM/CyberArk).', '9. Implement monitoring tool thresholds, conduct proactive event remediation, capacity planning, and optimization.', 'SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS:\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'IAM infrastructure', '8. Schedule and participate in system infrastructure and hardware upgrades, remediation, and health checks.', '1. Administer, configure and support the Oracle Identity Management software systems (Identity Management, Access Management, Privileged Identity/Access Management, Identity Governance, Attestation, Role based access controls, Federation and Incident Response) and applications.', '6. Identify, diagnose, and resolve technical issues in support of the identity access, application and provide solutions/recommendations', "The IAM Software Engineer Lead role is\xa0responsible for administration, maintenance, and ongoing day-to-day operational support including installation, configuration (product and applications), upgrade, migration, patching, troubleshooting and performance tuning of the Identity and Access Management product suite. The Lead IAM Engineer is a subject matter expert who, through independent project engagements and collaboration with business and technology partners, as well as third party vendors, designs and engineers the IAM platforms for the enterprise. This position will serve as subject matter expert (SME) for Oracle Identity Management, Privileged Access Management, and will be responsible for the configuration and maintenance of the product including code management, compilation and deployment across various environments. The Lead IAM SE maintains current knowledge of new products, industry trends and recommends enhancements and purchases that allow us to maintain healthy and functional applications and protect its employee's identities.", 'TYPICAL DUTIES THAT MAY BE PERFORMED', '3. Develop RACI charts or equivalent to assist in development, implementation and ongoing management and governance of IAM infrastructure capabilities, in consultation with his/her director', '5. Create, measure, analyze, and present reports to management representing current application, IDs, and privileged ID onboarding in addition to usage reports.', 'Experience with automating access control processes such as User Provisioning, Onboarding, Role-Based Access Control (RBAC), authorization models, Single Sign-On (SSO), LDAP, Active Directory.', 'Certification in CISSP, CEH or CISM - Preferred', 'Work Experience:\xa0', '10. Develop, maintain, and execute processes and procedures to ensure ongoing Disaster Recovery Readiness.', 'Experience with key Identity governance concepts (Identity Lifecycle, RBAC, SOD, workflow development, birthright access, and privilege access, MFA, Federation and SSO). Working knowledge of PAM, SAML, LDAP, Kerberos, 1Oauth2 and OIDC.', 'Knowledge of IAM and risk management best practices.', '4. Support and maintain the integration of existing and new application with the IAM infrastructure.', '10 years in Information Systems including five (5) years experience in a support role working on IAM products (Oracle/SailPoint/ Okta/CA/IBM/CyberArk).Experience in developing, implementing or designing IAM solutions.Experience with installation, configuration, development, and deployment with Oracle IAM solutions or similar product, and Active Directory.Knowledge of IAM and risk management best practices.Experience with automating access control processes such as User Provisioning, Onboarding, Role-Based Access Control (RBAC), authorization models, Single Sign-On (SSO), LDAP, Active Directory.Experience with key Identity governance concepts (Identity Lifecycle, RBAC, SOD, workflow development, birthright access, and privilege access, MFA, Federation and SSO). Working knowledge of PAM, SAML, LDAP, Kerberos, 1Oauth2 and OIDC.', 'Experience with installation, configuration, development, and deployment with Oracle IAM solutions or similar product, and Active Directory.', '14. Define and maintain appropriate controls and documentation ensuring compliance with regulatory and audit requirements', 'access identity systems and applications', 'Work Experience:', 'MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS:', 'Production Identity Management infrastructure', 'Experience in developing, implementing or designing IAM solutions.', '(Identity Management, Access Management, Privileged Identity/Access Management, Identity Governance, Attestation, Role based access controls, Federation and Incident Response)', "Education/Specialized Training/Licensure:\xa0Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or eqivalent related experience", '2. Develop and maintain security framework to support authentication, federation, and privileged account\xa0management.', '13. Serve as identity access technical liaison and coordinator between the customer departments and IT.', 'Other Skills:\xa0Analytical; Design; Mathematics; Research; Statistical', "12. Recommend Changes for improvement with emphasis on automation and efficiency supporting the organization's strategic and long term goals.", '15. Participate in on call rotation for support of Production Identity Management infrastructure.', '\ufeffIf you meet these criteria, please apply at www.harrishealth.org, job number 152879\xa0', '7. Collaborate with other infrastructure and development teams on shared components or integration points.', 'Communication Skills: Above Average Verbal (Heavy Public Contact);\xa0Exceptional Verbal (e.g., Public Speaking);\xa0Writing/Composing: Correspondence/Reports', 'Work Schedule:\xa0\xa0Flexible; On Call', ' IAM Software Engineer Lead ', 'identity access, application ', '11. Evaluate, plan, and coordinate the implementation of rollouts and resource allocation for access identity systems and applications.', 'Oracle Identity Management software systems']

['', 'Has API development and integration expertise, especially integration experience with HRIS and/or other HR platforms ', "Help build and improve key features and infrastructure to drive Pluto's growth and impact Utilize TypeScript/JavaScript across React/Angular, REST/GraphQL, NodeJS, MongoDB and AWS to build and scale high-quality, secure and privacy-respecting data collection, communication and incident reporting tools for companies and their employees Manage, support and develop a platform to enable rapid iteration and experimentation, leveraging technology to solve multi-faceted data, statistical/analytical, privacy and UX challenges at scale Create and maintain documentation in and for the code as well as critical technical decisions; collaborate in code reviews Implement responsive reporting and analytics tools to improve business intelligence ", 'A nimble and responsive team player who ', 'Has a solid knowledge of algorithms and design patterns ', 'What you’ll be doing', 'Who you are', ' ', 'Has a deep knowledge of JavaScript/TypeScript, React/Angular and NodeJS, as well as of best practices in reusable component structure, REST/GraphQL, data manipulation, maintainable code, etc. (MongoDB experience is a plus, as is AWS infrastructure experience) ', 'Pluto is a mission-driven analytics & communications platform that equips organizations with the tools they need to build diverse, inclusive and equitable workplaces. Our proprietary mix of story-based data collection, anonymous communication and incident reporting with advanced privacy, inclusion and intersectional analytics provides companies with the insights they need to make better decisions. job_text: ['', ' Must have practical experience with working on electronic systems on PCBs and using standard lab equipment such as oscilloscopes, power supplies, digital multi-meters, function generators, electronic loads. Fundamental knowledge of probing techniques is a requirement. ', ' Must be enrolled in an electrical engineering degree program and completed classes in understanding of basic electrical elements such as MOSFETs, capacitors, inductors, resistors etc. ', ' Completion of introductory power electronics classes is preferred. ', ' Collaboratively develop tools to improve post data-collection analysis. For example: create scripts to generate plots and calculate limits from large data sets, and then programmatically upload the results to the web using APIs. A knowledge of python would be key. ', ' Develop and document manual test procedures for validating datasheet parameters using power supplies, oscilloscopes, function generators, and other equipment needed to capture waveforms and collect relevant data. Fundamental knowledge of probing techniques is a requirement.   Experience / Understanding of basic programming techniques, such as C/C++, is required.   Experience (even basic) with lab automation tools such as Labview (other tools are also acceptable) is preferred.   Completion of introductory power electronics classes is preferred. Create PCBs in Altium and help the team standardize a component footprints library. ', 'Job Qualifications', 'Job Posting', ' Experience (even basic) with lab automation tools such as Labview (other tools are also acceptable) is preferred. ']

operations teams as they utilize these foundational data models for management & sales reporting.Performs complex root cause analysis of problems and subsequently, make and implement recommendations to prevent future occurrences.Enable & educate Data Analysts on best practices for reporting and leveraging the new data assets in which the Analytics Engineer creates.Work closely with central touchpoints to keep stakeholders informed throughout projects and provide documentation to enable your deliverables to speak for themselves.', 'Hands-on experience with advanced SQL and\xa0cloud data warehouse like Snowflake\xa0and relational databases\xa0', 'Enable & educate Data Analysts on best practices for reporting and leveraging the new data assets in which the Analytics Engineer creates.', 'You will have the opportunity to take on complex data challenges related to internal reporting and analytics, work with peers to help manage our data infrastructure, and provide leverage to each other and to a network of analysts across Sales, Marketing and Customer.', 'Own and improve key reporting, identifying critical operational questions that can be answered through new data insights.\xa0', 'Experience with object-oriented scripting languages like Python and packages like Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib, ScikitLearn, TensorFlow', 'HubSpot’s Sales Operations Data and Analytics team is a growing team of collaborators, lifetime learners, and data advisors eager to optimize HubSpot’s time-to-insight.\xa0Our mission is to build infrastructure, processes, and good practices that will modernize HubSpot’s data strategy and change the way HubSpot goes to market.\xa0The importance of building a data foundation that scales.\xa0', 'Experience with script based analytic transformation tools like dbt with ability to build CTEs', 'Working iteratively on projects as part of an Agile Scrum team of different functional roles.', 'Strong understanding and analytical skills related to both structured and unstructured datasets', 'Data Management', 'In this role, you’ll get to:', 'We are a growing team of Analytic Engineers who have a laser focus on making their customers successful. You will work cross-functionally across our business, operations, and technical teams to drive change and impact business solutions for the Sales Operations, Analytics and Strategy team.', 'About HubSpot', 'Build out scalable data models to analyze key parts of the HubSpot business.\xa0', 'Ability to participate and contribute to code-management/version control tools like git Enterprise on several peer-reviews, feature branch, resolving conflicts and commits', 'We are looking for people who have:', 'Strong understanding and analytical skills related to both structured and unstructured datasetsExceptional ability to document technical design documents and organizational skillsHands-on experience with advanced SQL and\xa0cloud data warehouse like Snowflake\xa0and relational databases\xa0Experience with object-oriented scripting languages like Python and packages like Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib, ScikitLearn, TensorFlowExperience building user defined functions in either Python or SQLAbility to participate and contribute to code-management/version control tools like git Enterprise on several peer-reviews, feature branch, resolving conflicts and commitsConcept and working knowledge on LookML (views, explore), Looks and DashboardsFamiliarity with data science acumen and common ML algorithms and an eagerness to continue to explore ML implementation.Experience with JSON Flattening and extracting internal elements', 'Translating project requirements into a set of technical sub-tasks that build towards a final deliverable.', 'Support distributed operations teams as they utilize these foundational data models for management & sales reporting.', 'Experience with JSON Flattening and extracting internal elements', 'Exceptional ability to document technical design documents and organizational skills', 'Experience building user defined functions in either Python or SQL', "Confidence can sometimes hold us back from applying for a job. But we'll let you in on a secret: there's no such thing as a 'perfect' candidate. HubSpot is a place where everyone can grow. So however you identify and whatever background you bring with you, please apply if this is a role that would make you excited to come into work every day.", 'Concept and working knowledge on LookML (views, explore), Looks and Dashboards', 'Experience working with complex datasets with computer science fundamentals, including but not limited to the concepts of software development lifecycle (SDLC)Experience building and optimizing data pipeline, architecture and data sets and be able to present visuals utilizing LucidchartsUnderstanding of ETL, ELT with an ability to reverse engineer for existing technical projects to help optimize and provide recommendations with root cause analysis.Experience with script based analytic transformation tools like dbt with ability to build CTEsExposure to data pipeline and workflow management tools like Apache Airflow', 'Performs complex root cause analysis of problems and subsequently, make and implement recommendations to prevent future occurrences.', 'Work closely with central technical teams, Data Analysts, Business Managers, and leadership to collaboratively deliver on projects.', 'Experience working with complex datasets with computer science fundamentals, including but not limited to the concepts of software development lifecycle (SDLC)', 'Collaborate with both technical and non-technical areas of the business, bridging the gap between the business problem and the technical solution.\xa0', 'Working iteratively on projects as part of an Agile Scrum team of different functional roles.Translating project requirements into a set of technical sub-tasks that build towards a final deliverable.Participating in and leading the technical execution of business intelligence and analytics related projects of large scope and complexity.Hands on experience with bug tracking systems and project management, like Jira', 'Headquartered in Cambridge, Massachusetts, HubSpot was founded in 2006. Today, thousands of employees work across the globe remotely and in our offices. Visit our\xa0careers website\xa0to learn more about culture and opportunities at HubSpot.\xa0', 'You can find out more about our company culture in the HubSpot\xa0Culture Code, which has more than 5M views, and learn about\xa0our commitment to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace, too. Thanks to the work of every HubSpotter globally who has helped build our remarkable culture, HubSpot has been named a top workplace by Glassdoor, Fortune, Entrepreneur, and more.', 'Project Management', 'Participating in and leading the technical execution of business intelligence and analytics related projects of large scope and complexity.', 'Experience building and optimizing data pipeline, architecture and data sets and be able to present visuals utilizing Lucidcharts', 'Understanding of ETL, ELT with an ability to reverse engineer for existing technical projects to help optimize and provide recommendations with root cause analysis.', 'Familiarity with data science acumen and common ML algorithms and an eagerness to continue to explore ML implementation.', 'Analytics', 'Define/refine project requirements with business stakeholders.\xa0Participate in key touchpoints to keep stakeholders informed throughout projects and provide documentation to enable your deliverables to speak for themselves.', 'Hands on experience with bug tracking systems and project management, like Jira', 'If you like solving hard problems, become energized in high-pressure situations, and want to work with amazing peers - please apply and come help us make HubSpot an even more successful company.', 'HubSpot (NYSE: HUBS) is a leading customer relationship management (CRM) platform that provides software and support to help businesses grow better. We build marketing, sales, service, and website management products that start free and scale to meet our customers’ needs at any stage of growth. We’re also building a company culture that empowers people to do their best work through our core values of flexibility, autonomy, transparency, and belonging. If that sounds like something you’d like to be part of, we’d love to hear from you.', 'Exposure to data pipeline and workflow management tools like Apache Airflow']

['', ' Work with product management to develop new products and features that improve the MSP experience and ensure reliable and secure data protection for our customers. ', ' Be a positive role model that others want to follow and be inspired by. ', ' Experience with SaaS, SOAP API, RESTful API, and HTTP technologies ', ' Flexible working hours ', ' Fitness reimbursement ', " Datto, the world’s leading provider of IT solutions delivered through managed service providers, is looking for a Sr. Software Engineer to join a growing team. Datto is a creative company at its core and is an exciting and dynamic workplace. We're 100% focused on our managed service provider partners and believe that with the right technology, managed service providers can change how businesses around the world operate. Datto provides data protection, business continuity, networking, business management, and file backup and sync products that empower and protect the clients of our 14,000+ partners. We're headquartered in Norwalk, Connecticut and have 22 offices worldwide. You will report to the Manager of Software Engineering. ", '  Experienced developer with object-oriented design and problem-solving skills   5+ years of experience delivering reliable and maintainable software   Experience developing web applications   Experience with SaaS, SOAP API, RESTful API, and HTTP technologies  ', 'Scala experience or an interest in learning Scala ', ' Free food, drinks, and fresh organic fruit ', '  Comprehensive health-care benefits   Free lunch every Friday   Flexible working hours   Unlimited paid time off   Free food, drinks, and fresh organic fruit   Fitness reimbursement   Charity match program   Education reimbursement   And more!  ', ' 5+ years of experience delivering reliable and maintainable software ', '  Strong written and verbal communication skills with experience explaining technical concepts to all audiences   Functional programming experience   Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or a related discipline, or in lieu of degree 10+ years of relevant experience  Scala experience or an interest in learning Scala  ', ' Passionately promote Datto’s core values. Promote collaboration and team growth. ', ' Strong written and verbal communication skills with experience explaining technical concepts to all audiences ', ' Experienced developer with object-oriented design and problem-solving skills ', ' Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or a related discipline, or in lieu of degree 10+ years of relevant experience ', 'About You', 'You’re customer-focused and take pride in your work.', 'You’re inquisitive', 'At Datto, we believe our employees are our greatest asset and offer all full-time employees a wide-ranging benefits package, including:', 'What You’ll Do', 'Skills You’ll Need', ' Participate in a rotational on-call program and enhance troubleshooting techniques and utilities to ensure quick resolution to service impacting issues ', ' Charity match program ', "  Datto, the world’s leading provider of IT solutions delivered through managed service providers, is looking for a Sr. Software Engineer to join a growing team. Datto is a creative company at its core and is an exciting and dynamic workplace. We're 100% focused on our managed service provider partners and believe that with the right technology, managed service providers can change how businesses around the world operate. Datto provides data protection, business continuity, networking, business management, and file backup and sync products that empower and protect the clients of our 14,000+ partners. We're headquartered in Norwalk, Connecticut and have 22 offices worldwide. You will report to the Manager of Software Engineering.  ", '  Design, test and build our Datto SaaS Protection platform.   Work with product management to develop new products and features that improve the MSP experience and ensure reliable and secure data protection for our customers.   Work with software and hardware teams to improve Datto SaaS Protection system performance, scalability, durability, and security.   Develop advanced telemetry to diagnose and debug problems in the field and improve the quality of our software.   Passionately promote Datto’s core values. Promote collaboration and team growth.   Be a positive role model that others want to follow and be inspired by.   Identify gaps in processes and tasks. Be an advocate of new ideas to drive continuous improvement.   Participate in a rotational on-call program and enhance troubleshooting techniques and utilities to ensure quick resolution to service impacting issues  ', ' And more! ', ' Education reimbursement ', ' Comprehensive health-care benefits ', ' Design, test and build our Datto SaaS Protection platform. ', ' Free lunch every Friday ', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Identify gaps in processes and tasks. Be an advocate of new ideas to drive continuous improvement. ', ' Unlimited paid time off ', 'You enjoy teamwork', ' Work with software and hardware teams to improve Datto SaaS Protection system performance, scalability, durability, and security. ', ' Develop advanced telemetry to diagnose and debug problems in the field and improve the quality of our software. [' Community ', ' Career GrowthAt Boston Scientific, you will find a collaborative culture driven by a passion for innovation that keeps us connected on the most essential level. With determination, imagination and a deep caring for human life, we’re solving some of the most important healthcare industry challenges. Together, we’re one global team committed to making a difference in people’s lives around the world. This is a place where you can find a career with meaningful purpose—improving lives through your life’s work.About The Role  Boston Scientific is seeking a highly motivated and result driven software engineer to join our Coronary Therapies R&D team working on innovative products that sustain and improve the lives of patients around the world.   The successful candidate will participate in medical device software verification and validation in collaboration with cross-functional teams   Testing medical device application requires rigor and attention to detail to meet industry and regulatory standards. We’re looking for a motivated and creative SW application test engineer with a focus on quality who has experience with requirements-based software test automation.  Your Responsibilities Include  Participate in the development, review, execution of manual or automated software tests for a Windows based software application   Design test scenarios following design and requirement documents to ensure intended behavior is verified   Perform software verification and validation activities using mechanical hardware components and electronic equipment   Collaborate with SW developers, system engineers, design assurance, project management, and other Quality team members to identify, report, and troubleshoot defects in a detailed, efficient, and timely manner   Ensure quality of product by following procedures and regulations in test development and execution   Participate in SW test automation framework and tools development   Participate in Agile software development process and work towards achieving individual and team goals   Create project documentation per Quality system requirements   Use issue tracking tools, software version control tools, requirement management tools in day to day work   Coordinate and collaborate with global team members   Continuously improves process and work methodologies by interfacing with peers/cross-functional groups and analyzing activities to improve workflow and work processes.   Develop and follow functional best practices   Direct support personnel and project activities.   Mentor junior engineers in software testing activities/methodologies and domain knowledge.  What We’re Looking For  Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science or related field   5+ years of relevant experience with a BS   3+ years of relevant experience with a MS   3 or more years of test automation experience   Effective communicator and writer   Independent contributor who requires less or little supervision   Proven technical leadership   Experience in Python and any of the following: C#, Java, C++   Experience in design test infrastructure and select tools for implementation   Experience with Windows Operating System   Experience in testing Windows services and desktop applications   Experience in using tools like JIRA, JAMA, bitbucket, Git, TeamCity   Distributed and network programming experiences using WCF, REST, HTTP, and socket is preferred.   Previous medical device experience   Previous experience working in an Agile work environment  About UsAs a global medical technology leader for more than 35 years, our mission at Boston Scientific (NYSE: BSX) is to transform lives through innovative medical solutions that improve the health of patients. If you’re looking to truly make a difference to people both around the world and around the corner, there’s no better place to make it happen.Requisition ID: 472194', ' Previous experience working in an Agile work environment ', 'What We’re Looking For', ' Design test scenarios following design and requirement documents to ensure intended behavior is verified ', '  Participate in the development, review, execution of manual or automated software tests for a Windows based software application   Design test scenarios following design and requirement documents to ensure intended behavior is verified   Perform software verification and validation activities using mechanical hardware components and electronic equipment   Collaborate with SW developers, system engineers, design assurance, project management, and other Quality team members to identify, report, and troubleshoot defects in a detailed, efficient, and timely manner   Ensure quality of product by following procedures and regulations in test development and execution   Participate in SW test automation framework and tools development   Participate in Agile software development process and work towards achieving individual and team goals   Create project documentation per Quality system requirements   Use issue tracking tools, software version control tools, requirement management tools in day to day work   Coordinate and collaborate with global team members   Continuously improves process and work methodologies by interfacing with peers/cross-functional groups and analyzing activities to improve workflow and work processes.
