job_title: Software Engineering Senior Advisor - Cloud Engineer
job_text: ['', 'Experience in building a software ‘product’ which will be transitioned to others for support and further evolution (including documentation, complete tooling/instrumentation, etc.)', 'The Cloud Engineer will be responsible to deliver business needs end to end from requirements to deployment into production, with well architected cloud solution. Through a hands-on engineering approach, this individual will develop patterns, frameworks and applications which enable the building of a data pipeline ecosystem. The applicant will be responsible for peer code reviews,\xa0 The applicant will be responsible to follow software engineering best practices with an automation first approach and continuous improvement mindset. The applicant will also drive reuse, engage in peer code reviews and foster innovation The applicant will ensure adherence to enterprise architecture direction and architectural standards. The applicant should be able to collaborate in a high-performing team environment, and an ability to influence and be influenced by others ', 'Experience in Big Data technologies – Hadoop, Hive, Spark, Mapreduce.', 'Strong expertise with GIT.', 'Job Responsibilities:', 'Skills/qualifications:', 'General Qualifications:', 'The applicant will also drive reuse, engage in peer code reviews and foster innovation', 'Strong oral and written communication skills.', 'Experience creating REST API’s.', "At least 8 plus years of experience in software engineering. Experience with one or more of the following programming scripting languages – Python, JVM-based languages, or Javascript, and ability to pick up new languages. 4+ years of cloud solution engineering and architecture experience (AWS or other) AWS Solution Architect Certification / AWS Developer Certification /\xa0AWS SysOps Certification a plus. Experience in performance tuning and resiliency in Cloud solutions. Deep understanding of all things “database” - schema design, optimization, scalability, etc Strong expertise with GIT. Experience creating REST API’s. Experience in building CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, CloudFormation, Terraform etc.) Experience in Big Data technologies – Hadoop, Hive, Spark, Mapreduce. Proficient in self-testing of applications, unit testing and use of mock frameworks, test-driven development (TDD) Experience in building a software ‘product’ which will be transitioned to others for support and further evolution (including documentation, complete tooling/instrumentation, etc.) Experience with the SCRUM methodology for agile software development. Bachelor's Degree or the equivalence of education and experience ", 'Ability to perform detailed analysis of business problems and technical environments. Strong oral and written communication skills. Strong teamwork and collaboration skills. Ability to think strategically and implement iteratively. Ability to estimate financial impact of design/architecture alternatives.\xa0 ', 'Strong teamwork and collaboration skills.', 'If you require reasonable accommodation in completing the online application process, please email: SeeYourself@cigna.com for support. Do not email SeeYourself@cigna.com for an update on your application or to provide your resume as you will not receive a response.', 'About Cigna', 'Experience in building CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, CloudFormation, Terraform etc.)', 'The applicant will be responsible for peer code reviews,\xa0', 'Proficient in self-testing of applications, unit testing and use of mock frameworks, test-driven development (TDD)', 'Experience with the SCRUM methodology for agile software development.', 'The Cloud Engineer will be responsible to deliver business needs end to end from requirements to deployment into production, with well architected cloud solution.', 'Deep understanding of all things “database” - schema design, optimization, scalability, etc', 'AWS Solution Architect Certification / AWS Developer Certification /\xa0AWS SysOps Certification a plus.', 'Qualified applicants will be considered without regard to race, color, age, disability, sex, childbirth (including pregnancy) or related medical conditions including but not limited to lactation, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, veteran or military status, religion, national origin, ancestry, marital or familial status, genetic information, status with regard to public assistance, citizenship status or any other characteristic protected by applicable equal employment opportunity laws.', 'The applicant will be responsible to follow software engineering best practices with an automation first approach and continuous improvement mindset.', 'Ability to think strategically and implement iteratively. Ability to estimate financial impact of design/architecture alternatives.\xa0', 'Experience with one or more of the following programming scripting languages – Python, JVM-based languages, or Javascript, and ability to pick up new languages.', 'At least 8 plus years of experience in software engineering.', "Bachelor's Degree or the equivalence of education and experience", 'The applicant will ensure adherence to enterprise architecture direction and architectural standards.', 'The applicant should be able to collaborate in a high-performing team environment, and an ability to influence and be influenced by others', 'Ability to perform detailed analysis of business problems and technical environments.', '4+ years of cloud solution engineering and architecture experience (AWS or other)', 'Experience in performance tuning and resiliency in Cloud solutions.', 'Through a hands-on engineering approach, this individual will develop patterns, frameworks and applications which enable the building of a data pipeline ecosystem.']

job_title: Data Solutions Manager (Remote Working, Funded Training for Cloud Certifications)
job_text: ['', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Apply good interpersonal and presentation skills to working in a fast-paced environment across multinational teams', 'Io-Tahoe enables enterprise customers to automatically discover, catalog, manage and drive business value from data wherever it is held. In doing so Io-Tahoe enables enterprise customers to automate workflows including Data Migrations, Data Quality, Data Governance and self-service Data Analytics. ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Provide programming and best practice consultation directly to our clients and partners for the integration of our Enterprise Data Automation products and services with large, complex datasets. \xa0\xa0\xa0Drive the partnership with other teams to understand client requirements, communicate product improvements, and assist with all client development needs. \xa0\xa0\xa0Adopt and embrace our cultural and innovative best practices and solutions in order to quickly and accurately identify and address highly technical problems. \xa0\xa0\xa0Be solution focused, able to quickly and accurately perform detailed and meaningful diagnostic work and troubleshooting, developing additional tools where you see a need internally or for our clients.', 'Io-Tahoe also provides an intuitive user experience designed to help technical and non-technical people collaborate.\xa0Our team with a deep understanding of data challenges, giving us first-hand insight and appreciation into our customers’ diverse and complex data needs. ', 'Data Solutions Manager', '\xa0\xa0\xa0At least one of Python, Go, Kotlin, Java, C++, scripting languages for manipulating data structures', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Provide programming and best practice consultation directly to our clients and partners for the integration of our Enterprise Data Automation products and services with large, complex datasets. ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Provide timely and informative feedback to the Enterprise Data Automation Product teams.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Drive the partnership with other teams to understand client requirements, communicate product improvements, and assist with all client development needs. ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Work closely with technical and data operations teams at client companies to understand their requirements and help them to build out solutions using our Data Automation Technologies.\xa0\xa0\xa0Actively identify potential areas of improvement or gaps in internal tools & monitoring systems and propose solutions.\xa0\xa0\xa0Apply good interpersonal and presentation skills to working in a fast-paced environment across multinational teams\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaborate with peers, sales, technical account managers and service delivery teams to drive critical client on-boarding initiatives, technology partnerships and highly technical projects.\xa0\xa0\xa0Proactively identify ideas to help drive stronger product performance and implement those ideas from start to finish.\xa0\xa0\xa0Provide technical development guidance, leadership and structure to Enterprise Data clients.\xa0\xa0\xa0Cultivate deep technical partnerships with key members of the client development community.\xa0\xa0\xa0Building strong stakeholder relationships with clients, engineering and product development teams to resolve issues or build out enhancements.\xa0\xa0\xa0Administer training to clients for coding to our API during the pre-sale, implementation and adoption phases of an engagement.\xa0\xa0\xa0Support the developer community around our data delivery mechanisms.\xa0\xa0\xa0Provide timely and informative feedback to the Enterprise Data Automation Product teams.\xa0\xa0\xa0Take ownership of complex questions and issues reported by clients as a second tier of technical support via phone calls, ticket systems, email, and in person.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Industry experience with software development Java, C#, C++ and Python.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Competitive pay and comprehensive benefits package including medical/dental/vision insurance', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Proactively identify ideas to help drive stronger product performance and implement those ideas from start to finish.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Cultivate deep technical partnerships with key members of the client development community.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Highly proficient in at least one programming language, e.g., Python, Java, Kotlin, Go, C++, C.', 'Fully Funded Cloud Platform Training and Exams for Certification', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Personal Accountability ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Actively identify potential areas of improvement or gaps in internal tools & monitoring systems and propose solutions.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Provide technical development guidance, leadership and structure to Enterprise Data clients.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong client facing experience, be presentable & able to articulate complex technical concepts to all skill levels.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaboration ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Support the developer community around our data delivery mechanisms.', ' Azure, GCP, AWS or OpenShift ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Adopt and embrace our cultural and innovative best practices and solutions in order to quickly and accurately identify and address highly technical problems. ', 'Required Skills: ', '\xa0', "You'll Need To Have:", '\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong organisational skills, attention to detail and the ability to handle multiple technical streams / lead client engagements whilst collaborating across different teams.', '#KnowYourData', "We'd Love To See:", '\xa0\xa0\xa0Expertise in data manipulation: use of structured data tools (e.g., SQL), & unstructured data tools and platforms (e.g., Hadoop, Spark, NoSQL)', '\xa0\xa0\xa0A proven Data Engineer with a deep understanding of data structures and related programming languages.\xa0\xa0\xa0Highly proficient in at least one programming language, e.g., Python, Java, Kotlin, Go, C++, C.\xa0\xa0\xa0Expertise in data manipulation: use of structured data tools (e.g., SQL), & unstructured data tools and platforms (e.g., Hadoop, Spark, NoSQL)\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with relational and non-relational databases such as Postgres, MySQL, MongoDB, or DynamoDB.\xa0\xa0\xa0Familiarity with visualisation tools (e.g. Grafana, D3, Tableau, PowerBI, Qlik)\xa0\xa0\xa0Demonstrable experience with translating unstructured, complex business problems into practical, powerful data solutions.\xa0\xa0\xa0A passion for keeping up with the latest trends in data science and data engineering.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A curious mind, self-starter and endlessly keen to learn and develop themselves professionally.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Confident to work with clients ranging from developers to CTOs.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent analysis and problem solving skills.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaboration \xa0\xa0\xa0Smart Problem Solving \xa0\xa0\xa0Balanced Judgement \xa0\xa0\xa0Personal Accountability \xa0\xa0\xa0Success Celebration ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaborate with peers, sales, technical account managers and service delivery teams to drive critical client on-boarding initiatives, technology partnerships and highly technical projects.', 'This role is based in the United States and eligibility to work in the United States without visa sponsorship is a pre-requisite to be considered for this role.\xa0NO AGENCIES PLEASE. DIRECT APPLICATIONS ONLY.', 'As a proven and ambitious Data Engineer you will help us build our next-generation platform, alongside a dedicated team. Our team is smart, visionary, supportive and, above all, excited by what we do!', 'P.S. Even if this job is not for you, perhaps you have a friend who’d be a perfect fit. Send them this link. Thanks!', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Familiarity with visualisation tools (e.g. Grafana, D3, Tableau, PowerBI, Qlik)', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Take ownership of complex questions and issues reported by clients as a second tier of technical support via phone calls, ticket systems, email, and in person.', 'You will:', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Balanced Judgement ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Administer training to clients for coding to our API during the pre-sale, implementation and adoption phases of an engagement.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Familiarity with visualisation tools (e.g. Grafana, D3, Tableau, PowerBI, Qlik).', "You're a data engineering professional who is personable, intelligent, analytical and solution driven. You are not afraid of getting your hands dirty and making independent decisions when the situation demands.", 'Io-Tahoe is a global leader in Enterprise Data Automation. Our patent driven technologies significantly reduce the manual effort required for enterprise data users to better know, manage and drive value from their data assets.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience writing readable example code.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Building strong stakeholder relationships with clients, engineering and product development teams to resolve issues or build out enhancements.', 'Python/SQL/Julia/R/Golang/PowerShell/Bash', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Good interpersonal and presentation skills and ability to work in a fast-paced environment across multinational teams.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0The chance to work with a passionate team on solving one of the largest challenges globally', "We're fast paced, innovative and expanding. We have worked hard and smart to become the business we are today. We partner closely with our clients, taking time to understand their unique businesses and individual data and technology needs. ", 'We nurture: ', "We'll Trust You To:", '\xa0\xa0\xa0Rapid growth opportunities', "If the idea of applying technology and data automation techniques to solve complex data problems excites you, keep reading, we'd love to hear from you!", 'About you:', 'About Io-Tahoe', '\xa0\xa0\xa0The ability to communicate complex information to a wide range of skill levels both in verbal and written form.\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent analysis and problem solving skills.\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience writing readable example code.\xa0\xa0\xa0Confident to work with clients ranging from developers to CTOs.', 'Io-Tahoe is an inclusive Equal Employment Opportunity employer that considers applicants without regard to gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, disabled or veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0At least one of Python, Go, Kotlin, Java, C++, scripting languages for manipulating data structures\xa0\xa0\xa0Industry experience with software development Java, C#, C++ and Python.\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience programming in UNIX and/or Windows.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Smart Problem Solving ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0The ability to communicate complex information to a wide range of skill levels both in verbal and written form.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Data Science or related STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, & Mathematics) field.', 'What We Offer', 'Io-Tahoe offers a competitive compensation package and the opportunity to participate in developing impactful data solutions in a rapidly expanding market category. ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A curious mind, self-starter and endlessly keen to learn and develop themselves professionally.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Competitive pay and comprehensive benefits package including medical/dental/vision insurance\xa0\xa0\xa0The chance to work with a passionate team on solving one of the largest challenges globally\xa0\xa0\xa0Dynamic, fun work environment with a highly talented team\xa0\xa0\xa0Rapid growth opportunities', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Success Celebration ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0A passion for keeping up with the latest trends in data science and data engineering.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Work closely with technical and data operations teams at client companies to understand their requirements and help them to build out solutions using our Data Automation Technologies.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Demonstrable experience with translating unstructured, complex business problems into practical, powerful data solutions.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0A proven Data Engineer with a deep understanding of data structures and related programming languages.', 'You’ll be collaborating with high calibre colleagues around the world, offering unparalleled learning and growth opportunities. ', 'Be part of a game-changing organization that encourages outside-the-box thinking and empowerment and is truly shaping the future of the software industry.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience programming in UNIX and/or Windows.', 'The ideal candidate must have or be actively seeking to achieve Public Cloud Certifications with Azure, GCP, AWS or OpenShift and would already have some experience in these technologies.', 'As part of our Data Automation team you will:', '(Remote Working, Funded Training for Cloud Certifications)', '\xa0\xa0\xa0BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Data Science or related STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, & Mathematics) field.\xa0\xa0\xa0Highly proficient in at least one programming language, e.g., Python, Java, Kotlin, Go, C++, C.\xa0\xa0\xa0Expertise in data manipulation: use of structured data tools (e.g., SQL), & unstructured data tools and platforms (e.g., Hadoop, Spark, NoSQL)\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with relational and non-relational databases such as Postgres, MySQL, MongoDB, or DynamoDB.\xa0\xa0\xa0Familiarity with visualisation tools (e.g. Grafana, D3, Tableau, PowerBI, Qlik).\xa0\xa0\xa0Good interpersonal and presentation skills and ability to work in a fast-paced environment across multinational teams.\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong client facing experience, be presentable & able to articulate complex technical concepts to all skill levels.\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong organisational skills, attention to detail and the ability to handle multiple technical streams / lead client engagements whilst collaborating across different teams.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with relational and non-relational databases such as Postgres, MySQL, MongoDB, or DynamoDB.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Be solution focused, able to quickly and accurately perform detailed and meaningful diagnostic work and troubleshooting, developing additional tools where you see a need internally or for our clients.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Dynamic, fun work environment with a highly talented team']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Bloomberg Law Data Services
job_text: ['', 'BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technology field', '3+ years of experience programming in Java 83+ years of experience with relational databases A passion to learn new technologiesExperience with Solr SearchBA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technology field', 'Experience with applying machine learning algorithms to solve complex data mining problems', 'Bloomberg Law is changing the legal industry by delivering the most sophisticated research platform on the market with a focus on automation, analytics and real-time answers. Our goal is to become an indispensable tool for legal professionals by supporting their day-to-day tasks and providing solutions that help them get real-time answers and better serve their clients.', '3+ years of experience programming in Java 8', 'Experience with applying machine learning algorithms to solve complex data mining problemsKnowledge of SparkFamiliarity with Web development (Angular 2, JavaScript, TypeScript, CSS, AJAX, JSON, Bootstrap, Node.js, XML, Servlet)', 'Work directly with product owners and data experts to provide data and build products that our clients use to solve complex problems', 'Work with data analysts to collect insight on possible data collection efficiencies and identify automation potential for manual workflows', 'Knowledge of Spark', 'Familiarity with Web development (Angular 2, JavaScript, TypeScript, CSS, AJAX, JSON, Bootstrap, Node.js, XML, Servlet)', "Within Bloomberg Law, the Data App Services team is hiring!  As part of our team, you will help build a visualization layer on top of the Bloomberg Law data platform, as well as develop the internal tools that our data analysts use to curate our products. You will be given the opportunity to display your creativity and deliver continuous end-user value in an Agile environment. We are self-motivated engineers who like to research, learn, and apply current technologies to build new product features that anticipate our customers' needs.", 'We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', '3+ years of experience with relational databases', 'Work directly with product owners and data experts to provide data and build products that our clients use to solve complex problemsBuild and support a distributed platform supporting all Bloomberg Law dataWork with data analysts to collect insight on possible data collection efficiencies and identify automation potential for manual workflows', ' A passion to learn new technologies', 'Build and support a distributed platform supporting all Bloomberg Law data', 'Experience with Solr Search']

A work experience at ConsenSys is a tremendous reference for your future career. ConsenSys alumni have moved on to become tech entrepreneurs, CEOs, and team leads at tech companies.  The forefront of a revolution. We fundamentally believe blockchain is a next generation of technology that can lay the foundation for a more just and equitable society. You can be a part of building the digital economy of tomorrow and radically transforming our society for the better.  A dynamic startup environment with deep roots. We are one of the earliest blockchain companies and a leader in the space. You’ll join a network of entrepreneurs and technologists that reaches the edge of our ecosystem.  Deep technical challenges. Blockchain technology is just over 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler. There is much to be done before these platforms can scale to the order of millions or billions of users. We are building the tools, infrastructure and applications l that are pushing the technology forward.  Continuous learning and improvements. You’ll be constantly exposed to new concepts, ideas and frameworks from your peers and as you work on different projects — challenging you to stay at the top of your game. job_title: Staff Software Engineer II, Salesforce (US Remote)
job_text: ['', 'Valassis offers a generous total rewards benefits package that includes medical, dental and vision coverage, 401K matching and generous PTO allowance. A wide variety of additional benefits like life insurance, employee assistance and pet insurance are also available, not to mention smart and friendly coworkers!', 'Provide meaningful code and design reviews', 'Qualifications', 'Who You Are', 'Demonstrated ability to work independently and as a party of a team', 'Driven. You have capability and passion for both front-end and back-end disciplines of software engineering.Technical chops. You know the Salesforce eco-system in-depth and understand how to use the platform effectively. In addition, you will be familiar with services leveraged by cloud technologies such as databases, queues, and asynchronous/parallel operations. Bonus points if you hold a Salesforce technical certification.Productive. You believe in automation and writing tests for your own code as a way of maintaining high quality in your products. You love writing things that "just work" - things that are robust, scalable, and perform well.A Team Player. You enjoy collaborating, learning from or teaching others so we can all become better developers.', 'Demonstrated experience with one or more object-oriented or functional programming languages', 'At least 5 years of relevant development experience', 'Productive. You believe in automation and writing tests for your own code as a way of maintaining high quality in your products. You love writing things that "just work" - things that are robust, scalable, and perform well.', 'A Team Player. You enjoy collaborating, learning from or teaching others so we can all become better developers.', '#VALIND #VALGD #LI-JM1', 'Collaborate with the entire engineering team to solve complex problemsDesign and develop robust & scalable solutions around the Salesforce CRM platformContribute to our team’s growing set of development tools and processesLead initiatives that cross functional and team boundariesProvide meaningful code and design reviewsWork with product stakeholders to define the future of the Salesforce platformLeave the codebase better than you found it', 'Responsibilities', 'Lead initiatives that cross functional and team boundaries', 'Technical chops', 'Integration experience with web services and micro-service architectures', 'Preferred Skills', 'Experience working with all aspects of the Salesforce platform, including APIs and 3rd-party related components', 'You will want to draw on your architectural skills and experience to evaluate advantages and trade-offs in finding robust and scalable solutions to business problems. Whether it is leveraging the abilities of the SFDC environment, build vs. buy decisioning, or defining a custom solution – you can provide the necessary depth of understanding and analysis to make the right decision at the right time.', 'Staff Software Engineer II, Salesforce', 'Ability to learn and apply new technologies quicklyExperience working with all aspects of the Salesforce platform, including APIs and 3rd-party related componentsDemonstrated experience with one or more object-oriented or functional programming languagesIntegration experience with web services and micro-service architecturesDemonstrated ability to work independently and as a party of a teamExperience with agile development methodologiesSalesforce Technical Architect certification a plus', 'Experience with agile development methodologies', "At least 5 years of relevant development experienceBachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related discipline with significant computer courseworkExcellent object-oriented or functional programming skillsExcellent cross-team communicator with technical and non-technical team membersPrior experience with Salesforce system management and oversight", 'Excellent object-oriented or functional programming skills', 'Driven', 'What You Will Be Doing…', 'Collaborate with the entire engineering team to solve complex problems', 'Leave the codebase better than you found it', 'Excellent cross-team communicator with technical and non-technical team members', 'Productive', 'Prior experience with Salesforce system management and oversight', 'Contribute to our team’s growing set of development tools and processes', 'Driven. You have capability and passion for both front-end and back-end disciplines of software engineering.', 'What’s in it for you?', 'Design and develop robust & scalable solutions around the Salesforce CRM platform', "Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related discipline with significant computer coursework", 'You will be responsible for designing, implementing and maintaining all aspects of the Salesforce platform as well as external integrations with multiple Salesforce APIs. You will work with native Salesforce platform components in front-end and back-end use case scenarios. And you will execute your work following best practices for software engineering in development, testing, build and release management.', 'Work with product stakeholders to define the future of the Salesforce platform', 'Who We Are', 'We are seeking an outstanding senior-level software engineer to design, implement and maintain world-class sales and business process execution with the Salesforce CRM platform.', 'Salesforce Technical Architect certification a plus', "Valassis, a Vericast business, is the leader in marketing technology and consumer engagement. We work with over 60,000 companies and brands in a wide array of industries, partnering to anticipate consumer intent, inspire action, and create demand. NCH Marketing Services, Inc. and Clipper Magazine are Valassis subsidiaries, and RetailMeNot Everyday™ is its consumer brand. It's signature Have You Seen Me?® program delivers hope to missing children and their families. Follow Valassis on LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook and Twitter. At Valassis, we don’t just accept differences - we celebrate them, we support them, and we thrive on them for the benefit of our employees, our clients and our community. Valassis considers applicants for all positions without regard to race, color, creed, religion, national origin or ancestry, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, disability, genetic information, veteran status, or any other classifications protected by law. In addition, Valassis will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities by contacting us at: recruiting@valassis.com. EEO is the law. To review your rights under Equal Employment Opportunity please visit: https://www.dol.gov/ofccp/regs/compliance/posters/pdf/eeopost.pdf", 'Ability to learn and apply new technologies quickly', 'A Team Player', 'Technical chops. You know the Salesforce eco-system in-depth and understand how to use the platform effectively. In addition, you will be familiar with services leveraged by cloud technologies such as databases, queues, and asynchronous/parallel operations. Bonus points if you hold a Salesforce technical certification.']

['', 'Qualifications', ' Excellent oral and written communication skills', ' Research and implement appropriate machine learning algorithms and tools and develop machine learning applications according to requirements', ' Good understanding software application architecture and develop integration approaches for predictive models', ' Conceptual understanding of – and/or prior experiences related to – data profiling, fuzzy matching, entity resolution, and signal detection theory (specifically with respect to SD theory designing and improving upon systems that monitor, minimize, and ['', "Lacework is looking for a Senior Software Engineer, Platform.\xa0Our team supports the Lacework service, and you will play a key role in building and operating the Lacework Cloud Security Platform, the world's best real-time cloud-native threat detection system.\xa0", 'Proficiency with unit and integration testing paradigms', 'As part of Platform Engineering, you will help build and maintain core foundational services that other teams will build on, bridging the gap between Operations and Engineering. You will work in and around a broad range of technologies and understand the daily friction both engineering and operations face at running a service at scale. You will work across Lacework to eliminate bottlenecks and develop complementary solutions that allow both engineering and operations to move faster.And, importantly,\xa0you enjoy building new systems from the ground up as much as you love tweaking existing systems.', "We'd love to hear from you if these kinds of challenges excite you, and you want your work to make a positive difference in the world!", 'Cloud computing is revolutionizing IT and forcing organizations to rethink their approach to cloud security. Lacework is at the forefront of this transformation. We enable security teams to effectively secure public and private clouds – AWS, Azure, or collocations – by eliminating repetitive, manual, and labor-intensive security tasks. Using Lacework, security teams operate security at the same pace as DevOps, which relies on automated tools to publish daily updates to the cloud.', 'You thrive in open environments that encourage education, cooperation, and teamwork.', '\ufeffAbout Lacework:', 'Build core libraries and frameworks that allow engineers to access our systems and tooling', 'The Role:', 'Qualifications:', 'Automation. Automation. Automation. Design, build and deploy core platform and backend systems that provide critical support for operating microservices at scale.', 'Contribute to monitoring, observability, and stability of existing services', 'We are a small and dynamic team – join us and be part of the three fastest-growing enterprise software markets: cloud, security, and machine learning.', 'Ability to analyze and optimize performance in high-traffic internet applicationsExperience with Java application servers and JVM configurationExperience with monitoring & observability systems like Prometheus or DataDog and tools or frameworks like telegraf and OpenTracingBelieve everything should be "as code."', 'Believe everything should be "as code."', 'Knock down pieces of infrastructure and improve on it to demonstrate resilience', 'Experience with monitoring & observability systems like Prometheus or DataDog and tools or frameworks like telegraf and OpenTracing', 'Preferred:', 'Demonstrate knowledge of cloud architecture security, scaling, and management principles and have experience working with AWS, GCE, or Azure cloud infrastructures', 'Senior Software Engineer, Platform', 'Funded by a tier-one firm and based out of San Jose, CA. Lacework is led by an experienced team who have built large scale systems at Google, Paraccel (Amazon Redshift), Pure Storage, VMware, Oracle, and Juniper networks.\xa0\xa0', 'Experience designing, building, and deploying large scale, distributed production-level services', 'Strong ownership from design through deploy and beyond', 'Experience with Java application servers and JVM configuration', 'Experience designing, building, and deploying large scale, distributed production-level servicesExperience in containerization and familiarity with Linux or similar operating systems\xa0Proficiency with unit and integration testing paradigmsDemonstrate knowledge of cloud architecture security, scaling, and management principles and have experience working with AWS, GCE, or Azure cloud infrastructuresYou thrive in open environments that encourage education, cooperation, and teamwork.', 'Experience in containerization and familiarity with Linux or similar operating systems\xa0', 'Lacework supports Green Card and H-1B sponsorship. We also have an office in Vancouver and sponsor Canadian work permits/permanent residence.Lacework is an Equal Opportunity Employer. It is the policy of Lacework to provide equal employment opportunity to all persons, regardless of age, race, religion, color, national origin, sex, political affiliations, marital status, non-disqualifying physical or mental disability, age, sexual orientation, membership or non-membership in an employee organization, or based on personal favoritism or other non-merit factors, except where otherwise provided by law.', 'Ability to analyze and optimize performance in high-traffic internet applications', 'Automation. Automation. Automation. Design, build and deploy core platform and backend systems that provide critical support for operating microservices at scale.Knock down pieces of infrastructure and improve on it to demonstrate resilienceStrong ownership from design through deploy and beyondContribute to monitoring, observability, and stability of existing servicesBuild core libraries and frameworks that allow engineers to access our systems and tooling']

['', "  BE BOLD Contribute to the R&D roadmap for Programmable Video, including continuous evaluation of industry standards, techniques, tools and trends. Ensure Twilio develops and maintains an industry competitive advantage.   BE AN OWNER Own, operate, and maintain your team’s services in a production environment. Make DevOps a primary concern to ensure services are reliable, scalable, manageable and supportable.   DON'T SETTLE Raise the bar on team performance. Enable feature velocity while maintaining quality by writing unit, functional, load and performance tests.   EMPOWER OTHERS Excel as an engineer and be a productive member of the team where leadership is a behavioral trait, not a title.   Act as an ambassador for Twilio, recruiting and motivating top talent.  ", ' Minimum 5 years hands-on experience developing distributed systems in Java. You have designed and developed horizontally-scalable, resilient and performing-under-load systems in a production environment. ', ' BE AN OWNER Own, operate, and maintain your team’s services in a production environment. Make DevOps a primary concern to ensure services are reliable, scalable, manageable and supportable. ', 'Because you belong at Twilio ', ' Act as an ambassador for Twilio, recruiting and motivating top talent. ', " DON'T SETTLE Raise the bar on team performance. Enable feature velocity while maintaining quality by writing unit, functional, load and performance tests. ", ' Capable of operating from conception through continuous operation of 24x7 services. Ideally, you have experience in a production DevOps environment. Hands on experience with cloud technologies such as Amazon Web Services, OpenStack or Azure is a plus. ', 'Where?', ' This position is for the control plane of the product and therefore does not require experience working with real-time media. ['', ' Serve as a technical expert in the bioinformatics software developed, guiding other staff, researchers, and clients in its use.', ' Excellent collaborator with interdisciplinary teams.', ' Genetics and DNA variation', ' High performance cluster management', 'Working Conditions', ' A minimum 3 years of experience working with next-generation sequencing data and relevant tools for bioinformatics analysis, in either a professional or academic setting.', ' Other duties may be assigned.As a UW employee, you will enjoy generous benefits and work/life programs. For a complete description of our benefits for this position, please visit our website, click here.Minimum Requirements', ' Design, develop, and maintain research-related custom software used in a high-throughput, second-generation DNA sequencing laboratory.  Serve as a technical expert in the bioinformatics software developed, guiding other staff, researchers, and clients in its use.  Dissect and analyze complex research problems using a multitude of programming languages that interact with our existing software architecture.  Participate in developing, implementing and maintaining new workflows for NGS.  Thrive in a fast-paced work environment that requires independent self-direction with an aptitude for team collaboration and open communication.  Provide support in writing manuscripts, abstracts and presentations.  Present analysis findings at group meetings and national conferences, if necessary.  Other duties may be assigned.As a UW employee, you will enjoy generous benefits and work/life programs. For a complete description of our benefits for this position, please visit our website, click here.Minimum Requirements  BS in human genetics, bioinformatics, computer sciences or related field, or equivalent experience.  A minimum 3 years of experience working with next-generation sequencing data and relevant tools for bioinformatics analysis, in either a professional or academic setting.  Good understanding of human genetics.  Strong knowledge of exploratory data analyses.  Ability to utilize computational tools in common scripting languages (e.g. Linux, Perl, Python, and R).  Experience working with high performance computing.  Ability to manage projects and solve problems independently.  Excellent collaborator with interdisciplinary teams.  Strong written and oral communication skills.Desired Requirements  Masters or Ph.D., or foreign equivalent, in human genetics, bioinformatics, computer sciences, or related field  Experience working with command line-based software for genetic analysis and next-generation sequencing protocols (e.g. BWA, GATK, SamTools, BCFtools and shell scripting).  Genetics and DNA variation  High-level computer programming language  High performance cluster management  Linux experience  Analytical and troubleshooting skills for wet-bench laboratory protocols  Knowledge of next-generation (Illumina) DNA sequencing chemistry  Knowledge of laboratory information systems (LIMS) design and implementationWorking ConditionsThe Bioinformatics Analyst position is expected to respond immediately to questions from investigators, teammates, and provide expert technical support for developing or trouble-shooting workflows. On occasion, it will be neceessary to respond immediately to urgent questions from the P.I. and other managers if problems arise that impact the work flow or deadlines for the NWGC production center - these tend to happen on a weekly basis and occasionally require extra hours be worked on a given day.Application ProcessThe application process for UW positions may include completion of a variety of online assessments to obtain additional information that will be used in the evaluation process. These assessments may include Work Authorization, Cover Letter and/or others. Any assessments that you need to complete will appear on your screen as soon as you select “Apply to this position”. Once you begin an assessment, it must be completed at that time; if you do not complete the assessment you will be prompted to do so the next time you access your “My Jobs” page. If you select to take it later, it will appear on your "My Jobs" page to take when you are ready.  Please note that your application will not be reviewed, and you will not be considered for this position until all required assessments have been completed.', ' Design, develop, and maintain research-related custom software used in a high-throughput, second-generation DNA sequencing laboratory.', ' Strong knowledge of exploratory data analyses.', 'Responsibilities', ' Strong written and oral communication skills.Desired Requirements', ' Bioinformatics: (100%)', ' Knowledge of laboratory information systems (LIMS) design and implementationWorking ConditionsThe Bioinformatics Analyst position is expected to respond immediately to questions from investigators, teammates, and provide expert technical support for developing or trouble-shooting workflows. On occasion, it will be neceessary to respond immediately to urgent questions from the P.I. and other managers if problems arise that impact the work flow or deadlines for the NWGC production center - these tend to happen on a weekly basis and occasionally require extra hours be worked on a given day.Application ProcessThe application process for UW positions may include completion of a variety of online assessments to obtain additional information that will be used in the evaluation process. ', 'Familiarity with massively scalable real time and/or batch distributed data processing solutions with modern technologies like Flink, Spark, Kafka, Map/Reduce etc.', 'Branch has raised more than $330M from investors such as NEA, Founders Fund, and Playground Ventures. ', 'Familiarity with cloud infrastructure and deployments.', 'Dedication to deeply learning product functionality and data use cases.', 'Look for opportunities to make the data test automation process easier and smoother for the entire engineering organization.', 'Diversity at Branch ranks in the top 10% for similarly sized companies (by Comparably).', 'Own the Data Quality Automation Framework, including maintenance, metrics generation, data anomaly detection etc. ', 'As a Senior Software Engineer - Data Quality, you’ll get to:', 'Excellent communication and documentation skills.', 'Solid implementation skills using Java/Python or similar.']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Player Platform, Console Experiences
job_text: ['', 'Partner with product owners and technical leads to build and operate features end-to-end', 'Player Platform, Console Experiences', 'Experience shipping applications or games to any of the following platforms: XB1, PS4, Nintendo Switch.', 'Required Qualifications', 'Contribute to architecture and solutions that support integrations with console platforms.', 'Responsibilities', ' Contribute to architecture and solutions that support integrations with console platforms. Collaborate on the architecture of a cross-platform user experience framework. Be an individual contributor on the team building reference designs, tackling challenging and ambiguous technical solutions, conducting design and coding reviews. Implement technical outcomes and tools that create cohesive and natural player experiences for Riot’s games on console. job_title: Principle Software Engineer - Ruby on Rails- ROR  (SaaS + Healthcare IT)- 100% Remote!!!
job_text: ['', 'SaaS + Healthcare IT Domain', ' Principle Software Engineer - (Ruby on Rails/ROR) ,', '100% Remote!!!', 'Our customer is a rapidly\xa0evolving, SaaS based product development company in the Healthcare IT domain,  that provides critical virtual care infrastructure for our clients which include some of the country’s largest health systems.', 'developing applications using platform-as-a-service SDKs and APIs ', 'Principle Software Engineer - Ruby on Rails- ROR', '7-10 years of software industry experience', 'Extensive experience with SQL, DB deployment and optimization (preferably SQL Server & Tableau)\xa0', '(Base salary + standard benefits)', 'Ruby On Rails (ROR)- Servre Side Development Experience.', 'Expertise Required-', 'Healthcare IT (ex: EMR integrations, BI Reporting, HL7, familiarity with client-side architecture in the provider space) ', 'Information Security Principles and Practices ', '!', "They are seeking an exceptional Principle Software Engineer - (Ruby on Rails/ROR) , who will mentor and coach, our customer's diverse development team to build out a high performing engineering culture. ", 'Permanent Role ', "mentor and coach, our customer's diverse development team to build out a high performing engineering culture", '7-10 years of software industry experienceRuby On Rails (ROR)- Servre Side Development Experience.Experience developing applications using platform-as-a-service SDKs and APIs Healthcare IT (ex: EMR integrations, BI Reporting, HL7, familiarity with client-side architecture in the provider space) SaaS development, deployment & monitoring; AWSInformation Security Principles and Practices Extensive experience with SQL, DB deployment and optimization (preferably SQL Server & Tableau)\xa0Demonstrated foundation in Computer Science, with competencies in data structures, algorithms, and software design', 'Permanent Role (Base salary + standard benefits)', '100% Remote!!', 'Experience developing applications using platform-as-a-service SDKs and APIs ', 'rapidly\xa0evolving, SaaS based product development company in the Healthcare IT domain, ', 'critical virtual care infrastructure for our clients which include some of the country’s largest health systems.', 'SaaS development, deployment & monitoring; AWS', 'Demonstrated foundation in Computer Science, with competencies in data structures, algorithms, and software design']

['', 'Join a community.', 'Contribute to documentation and uplifting of partner teams', 'Hands-on experience in Site Reliability and Observability Engineering, debugging, diagnosing and correcting errors and resolving high severity incidents', 'An ability and desire to mentor and coach engineers.', 'Experience building solutions in distributed systems for high volume transaction and/or developing support focused tooling.', ' Responsibilities ', 'You have done hands-on development with cloud infrastructure (AWS, GCE, Azure, Kubernetes, Docker).', 'Work in close collaboration with partner teams to shape the future roadmap to improve reliability and establish strong operational readiness across teams.', 'Stay happy and healthy.', 'Identify areas for improvement across the organization and drive Engineering-wide technical change in the field of Site Reliability.', 'Our day-to- day is driven by helping our product teams create robust software faster.', 'Who We Are ', ' We believe in equality. Rokt is an Equal Opportunity Employer and recognizes that a diverse workforce is crucial to our success as a business. We would love to hear from you - irrespective of socio-economic status or background, age, gender identity, race, religion, sexual orientation, color, pregnancy, carer/family responsibilities, national and social origin, political opinion, marital, veteran, or disability status.', 'Think about systems - edge cases, failure modes, behaviors, specific implementations.', 'Work with the greatest talent in town.', 'See the world!', 'Become a shareholder. All Rokt’stars have stock options. If we succeed, everyone gets to enjoy the upside.', 'Accelerate your career.', 'Become a shareholder.', ' The Role ', 'Participate in system design consulting, and capacity planning.', 'Partner with the broader Rokt organization to build a culture of rigorously learning from incidents.', 'Designing tools to help our entire engineering organization be as productive as possible.', ' Benefits ', 'Share your knowledge by giving brown bags, tech talks, and evangelizing appropriate tech and engineering best practices.', 'At Rokt we encourage autonomy; teams have complete ownership of their systems including building, running and monitoring. As such, you may be required to be on-call and respond to systems alerts should they arise.', 'Systematic problem-solving approach, coupled with effective communication skills and a sense of ownership and drive.', 'Strong software development experience with at least one of the following languages: Python, Java, Go, C# or similar.', 'See the world! Along with our global all-staff events in amazing locations (Phuket, Thailand in January 2020), we also offer generous relocation packages for those interested in moving to another Rokt office. We have cool offices in great cities - Tokyo, New York, Singapore, Boston, Sydney.', 'Experience in Defensive programming, Circuit breakers, Resilience frameworks, Fault tolerance, and self-healing mechanisms of services.', 'Work with the greatest talent in town. Our recruiting process is tough. We hold a high bar because we have a high performing culture - we only want the brightest and the best.', 'Take a break.', 'You have handled multiple on call shifts, and have navigated more than one incident through to the retrospective process.', 'Accelerate your career. Develop through our global training events, ‘Level Up’ investment, online training courses and our fantastic people leaders. Take your career to Rokt’speed - the average time between promotions is 12 months.', 'Stay happy and healthy. Enjoy catered lunch 3 times a week and healthy snacks in the office. Plus, join the gym on us! Access generous retirement plans like a 4% dollar-for-dollar 401K matching plan in the US. In the US, get fully funded premium health insurance for your whole family.', 'Take a break. When you work hard, we know you also need to rest. We offer generous time off and parental leave policies. We also offer a paid Rokt’star Sabbatical for employees who have been with us 3 years or more.', 'Contribute to Root Cause Analysis (RCA) investigations and follow up each incident to ensure the appropriate action items are in place and prioritized.', ' Work with the greatest talent in town. Our recruiting process is tough. We hold a high bar because we have a high performing culture - we only want the brightest and the best. Join a community. We believe the best things happen when we come together to solve complex problems and make meaningful connections with each other through interest groups, sports clubs, and social events. Accelerate your career. Develop through our global training events, ‘Level Up’ investment, online training courses and our fantastic people leaders. Take your career to Rokt’speed - the average time between promotions is 12 months. Take a break. When you work hard, we know you also need to rest. We offer generous time off and parental leave policies. We also offer a paid Rokt’star Sabbatical for employees who have been with us 3 years or more. Stay happy and healthy. Enjoy catered lunch 3 times a week and healthy snacks in the office. Plus, join the gym on us! Access generous retirement plans like a 4% dollar-for-dollar 401K matching plan in the US. In the US, get fully funded premium health insurance for your whole family. Become a shareholder. All Rokt’stars have stock options. If we succeed, everyone gets to enjoy the upside. See the world! Along with our global all-staff events in amazing locations (Phuket, Thailand in January 2020), we also offer generous relocation packages for those interested in moving to another Rokt office. We have cool offices in great cities - Tokyo, New York, Singapore, Boston, Sydney.  We believe in equality. Rokt is an Equal Opportunity Employer and recognizes that a diverse workforce is crucial to our success as a business. We would love to hear from you - irrespective of socio-economic status or background, age, gender identity, race, religion, sexual orientation, color, pregnancy, carer/family responsibilities, national and social origin, political opinion, marital, veteran, or disability status.', 'Introduce best practices into the teams around observability, SLOs and reliability.', 'Join a community. We believe the best things happen when we come together to solve complex problems and make meaningful connections with each other through interest groups, sports clubs, and social events.', 'Strong organizational and interpersonal skills, with experience developing and instilling a culture of operational maturity.', 'Requirements: ', 'Experience working on various monitoring, and alerting tools', ' Our day-to- day is driven by helping our product teams create robust software faster. Introduce best practices into the teams around observability, SLOs and reliability. Work in close collaboration with partner teams to shape the future roadmap to improve reliability and establish strong operational readiness across teams. Participate in system design consulting, and capacity planning. Identify areas for improvement across the organization and drive Engineering-wide technical change in the field of Site Reliability. Share your knowledge by giving brown bags, tech talks, and evangelizing appropriate tech and engineering best practices. Partner with the broader Rokt organization to build a culture of rigorously learning from incidents. Contribute to Root Cause Analysis (RCA) investigations and follow up each incident to ensure the appropriate action items are in place and prioritized. Designing tools to help our entire engineering organization be as productive as possible. Lead development and roll out of new tools, technologies and processes that have high business impact and are used by multiple teams that improve reliability and velocity. Contribute to documentation and uplifting of partner teams ', 'Lead development and roll out of new tools, technologies and processes that have high business impact and are used by multiple teams that improve reliability and velocity.', 'Hands-on experience with cloud infrastructure such as AWS, Google Compute or Azure.', ' Hands-on experience in Site Reliability and Observability Engineering, debugging, diagnosing and correcting errors and resolving high severity incidents Think about systems - edge cases, failure modes, behaviors, specific implementations. Experience building solutions in distributed systems for high volume transaction and/or developing support focused tooling. Strong software development experience with at least one of the following languages: Python, Java, Go, C# or similar. Experience working on various monitoring, and alerting tools You have done hands-on development with cloud infrastructure (AWS, GCE, Azure, Kubernetes, Docker). Hands-on experience with cloud infrastructure such as AWS, Google Compute or Azure. Experience in Defensive programming, Circuit breakers, Resilience frameworks, Fault tolerance, and self-healing mechanisms of services. An ability and desire to mentor and coach engineers. Strong organizational and interpersonal skills, with experience developing and instilling a culture of operational maturity. You have handled multiple on call shifts, and have navigated more than one incident through to the retrospective process. Systematic problem-solving approach, coupled with effective communication skills and a sense of ownership and drive. At Rokt we encourage autonomy; teams have complete ownership of their systems including building, running and monitoring. As such, you may be required to be on-call and respond to systems alerts should they arise. ', 'We believe in equality']

['', 'Experience working in a CI/CD environment', 'Experience in following the process and ability to question the process and recommend changes', 'What is this role about?', 'As a component owner, where the component impacts a single platform, debug and fix hard to reproduce bugs; refactor existing code for performance gains and easy readability; perform design reviews; identify performance bottleneck in design specifications; work with App, Backend, and Frontend teams in writing down APIs; explore existing implementations; optimize performance of existing implementations; and participate in functional automated tests.', 'Solid understanding of various data storage options, such as relational, no-SQL, etc.', 'Experience in developing products in an Agile development environment', 'What does a “Day-in-the-Life” look like?', 'Break down product requirements, drawing on knowledge of algorithms to come up with the correct solution.', 'Solid scripting skill in Shell, Python, or Ruby', 'Job Category', 'Capability to debug moderately complex problems and analyze logs in production systems and to read existing code.', 'Solid skills in languages, such as C, C++, Java, Golang, .net Core', 'Track down hidden performance problems, with or without tools.', 'Find easy ways to debug complex solutions, through reading and understanding code flow in the overall project. Add logs and markers to solve complex (concurrency, multi-threaded) problems.', 'Write documentation and automated tests for code to be written. Implement functionality for automated tests that will successfully pass and meet coding standards. Debug production issues and create subsequent mitigation plans. Optimize performance of existing implementations.', 'Build UML diagrams and sequence diagrams for features before implementation.', 'Prioritize tasks with Scrummaster that leads the team to be successful.', 'Understanding and experience in Docker, Kubernets, and AWS cloud services', 'In-depth understanding of computer science fundamentals, such as data structures, (trees, graphs, hash tables); understanding of functioning and implementation of basic algorithms, such as sorts, searching, and the capability to explain performance characteristics using Big-O Notations.', ' Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Mathematics, or related field required. Master’s degree preferred. 5-8 years product development experience In-depth understanding of computer science fundamentals, such as data structures, (trees, graphs, hash tables); understanding of functioning and implementation of basic algorithms, such as sorts, searching, and the capability to explain performance characteristics using Big-O Notations. Capability to debug moderately complex problems and analyze logs in production systems and to read existing code. Solid understanding of various data storage options, such as relational, no-SQL, etc. Solid scripting skill in Shell, Python, or Ruby Solid skills in languages, such as C, C++, Java, Golang, .net Core Experience in following the process and ability to question the process and recommend changes Ability to be on call on a rotating basis for the services owned by the team. Preferred: Experience in developing products in an Agile development environment Experience working in a CI/CD environment Understanding of Git and development activities such as merge and conflict resolution of code Understanding and experience in Docker, Kubernets, and AWS cloud services ', 'What do I need to be successful?', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Mathematics, or related field required. Master’s degree preferred.', 'Bring forward ideas to experiment and work in teams to transform ideas to reality.', 'Work with product managers and UX designers to deliver most optimal and customer-friendly implementation. Prioritize tasks with the Scrummaster that leads the team to be successful.', 'Understanding of Git and development activities such as merge and conflict resolution of code', '5-8 years product development experience', 'Preferred:', ' Write documentation and automated tests for code to be written. Implement functionality for automated tests that will successfully pass and meet coding standards. Debug production issues and create subsequent mitigation plans. Optimize performance of existing implementations. Find easy ways to debug complex solutions, through reading and understanding code flow in the overall project. Add logs and markers to solve complex (concurrency, multi-threaded) problems. Break down product requirements, drawing on knowledge of algorithms to come up with the correct solution. Work with product managers and UX designers to deliver most optimal and customer-friendly implementation. Prioritize tasks with the Scrummaster that leads the team to be successful. As a component owner, where the component impacts a single platform, debug and fix hard to reproduce bugs; refactor existing code for performance gains and easy readability; perform design reviews; identify performance bottleneck in design specifications; work with App, Backend, and Frontend teams in writing down APIs; explore existing implementations; optimize performance of existing implementations; and participate in functional automated tests. Build UML diagrams and sequence diagrams for features before implementation. Track down hidden performance problems, with or without tools. Prioritize tasks with Scrummaster that leads the team to be successful. Bring forward ideas to experiment and work in teams to transform ideas to reality. ', 'Ability to be on call on a rotating basis for the services owned by the team.']

We work hard to meet our deadlines, but we also know how to celebrate after!', 'Mentor, collaborate with, and build out the rest of the engineering team.', 'We provide virtual free-roam open worlds with all the tools necessary to create custom lessons and worksheets for K12 and higher education science topics. Thus, our platform can easily be integrated into any existing science curriculum. As instructors are becoming accustomed to adopting the technology needed for remote learning, we are seeing a high demand for our platform.', 'What Skills Do You Need to Succeed?', 'What Will You Do?', 'We are a remote-first company. job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Data Exchange Platform
job_text: ['', ' Lead highly impactful initiatives around Data Sharing and Data Exchange in the global Snowflake. job_title: Data Solutions Manager (Remote Working, Funded Training for Cloud Certifications)
job_text: ['', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Apply good interpersonal and presentation skills to working in a fast-paced environment across multinational teams', 'Io-Tahoe enables enterprise customers to automatically discover, catalog, manage and drive business value from data wherever it is held. In doing so Io-Tahoe enables enterprise customers to automate workflows including Data Migrations, Data Quality, Data Governance and self-service Data Analytics. ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Provide programming and best practice consultation directly to our clients and partners for the integration of our Enterprise Data Automation products and services with large, complex datasets. \xa0\xa0\xa0Drive the partnership with other teams to understand client requirements, communicate product improvements, and assist with all client development needs. \xa0\xa0\xa0Adopt and embrace our cultural and innovative best practices and solutions in order to quickly and accurately identify and address highly technical problems. \xa0\xa0\xa0Be solution focused, able to quickly and accurately perform detailed and meaningful diagnostic work and troubleshooting, developing additional tools where you see a need internally or for our clients.', 'Io-Tahoe also provides an intuitive user experience designed to help technical and non-technical people collaborate.\xa0Our team with a deep understanding of data challenges, giving us first-hand insight and appreciation into our customers’ diverse and complex data needs. job_title: Staff Software Engineer II, Salesforce (US Remote)
job_text: ['', 'Valassis offers a generous total rewards benefits package that includes medical, dental and vision coverage, 401K matching and generous PTO allowance. A wide variety of additional benefits like life insurance, employee assistance and pet insurance are also available, not to mention smart and friendly coworkers!', 'Provide meaningful code and design reviews', 'Qualifications', 'Who You Are', 'Demonstrated ability to work independently and as a party of a team', 'Driven. You have capability and passion for both front-end and back-end disciplines of software engineering.Technical chops. You know the Salesforce eco-system in-depth and understand how to use the platform effectively. In addition, you will be familiar with services leveraged by cloud technologies such as databases, queues, and asynchronous/parallel operations. Bonus points if you hold a Salesforce technical certification.Productive. You believe in automation and writing tests for your own code as a way of maintaining high quality in your products. You love writing things that "just work" - things that are robust, scalable, and perform well.A Team Player. You enjoy collaborating, learning from or teaching others so we can all become better developers.', 'Demonstrated experience with one or more object-oriented or functional programming languages', 'At least 5 years of relevant development experience', 'Productive. You believe in automation and writing tests for your own code as a way of maintaining high quality in your products. You love writing things that "just work" - things that are robust, scalable, and perform well.', 'A Team Player. You enjoy collaborating, learning from or teaching others so we can all become better developers.', '#VALIND #VALGD #LI-JM1', 'Collaborate with the entire engineering team to solve complex problemsDesign and develop robust & scalable solutions around the Salesforce CRM platformContribute to our team’s growing set of development tools and processesLead initiatives that cross functional and team boundariesProvide meaningful code and design reviewsWork with product stakeholders to define the future of the Salesforce platformLeave the codebase better than you found it', 'Responsibilities', 'Lead initiatives that cross functional and team boundaries', 'Technical chops', 'Integration experience with web services and micro-service architectures', 'Preferred Skills', 'Experience working with all aspects of the Salesforce platform, including APIs and 3rd-party related components', 'You will want to draw on your architectural skills and experience to evaluate advantages and trade-offs in finding robust and scalable solutions to business problems. Whether it is leveraging the abilities of the SFDC environment, build vs. buy decisioning, or defining a custom solution – you can provide the necessary depth of understanding and analysis to make the right decision at the right time.', 'Staff Software Engineer II, Salesforce', 'Ability to learn and apply new technologies quicklyExperience working with all aspects of the Salesforce platform, including APIs and 3rd-party related componentsDemonstrated experience with one or more object-oriented or functional programming languagesIntegration experience with web services and micro-service architecturesDemonstrated ability to work independently and as a party of a teamExperience with agile development methodologiesSalesforce Technical Architect certification a plus', 'Experience with agile development methodologies', "At least 5 years of relevant development experienceBachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related discipline with significant computer courseworkExcellent object-oriented or functional programming skillsExcellent cross-team communicator with technical and non-technical team membersPrior experience with Salesforce system management and oversight", 'Excellent object-oriented or functional programming skills', 'Driven', 'What You Will Be Doing…', 'Collaborate with the entire engineering team to solve complex problems', 'Leave the codebase better than you found it', 'Excellent cross-team communicator with technical and non-technical team members', 'Productive', 'Prior experience with Salesforce system management and oversight', 'Contribute to our team’s growing set of development tools and processes', 'Driven. You have capability and passion for both front-end and back-end disciplines of software engineering.', 'What’s in it for you?', 'Design and develop robust & scalable solutions around the Salesforce CRM platform', "Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related discipline with significant computer coursework", 'You will be responsible for designing, implementing and maintaining all aspects of the Salesforce platform as well as external integrations with multiple Salesforce APIs. You will work with native Salesforce platform components in front-end and back-end use case scenarios. And you will execute your work following best practices for software engineering in development, testing, build and release management.', 'Work with product stakeholders to define the future of the Salesforce platform', 'Who We Are', 'We are seeking an outstanding senior-level software engineer to design, implement and maintain world-class sales and business process execution with the Salesforce CRM platform.', 'Salesforce Technical Architect certification a plus', "Valassis, a Vericast business, is the leader in marketing technology and consumer engagement. We work with over 60,000 companies and brands in a wide array of industries, partnering to anticipate consumer intent, inspire action, and create demand. NCH Marketing Services, Inc. and Clipper Magazine are Valassis subsidiaries, and RetailMeNot Everyday™ is its consumer brand. It's signature Have You Seen Me?® program delivers hope to missing children and their families. Follow Valassis on LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook and Twitter. At Valassis, we don’t just accept differences - we celebrate them, we support them, and we thrive on them for the benefit of our employees, our clients and our community. Valassis considers applicants for all positions without regard to race, color, creed, religion, national origin or ancestry, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, disability, genetic information, veteran status, or any other classifications protected by law. In addition, Valassis will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities by contacting us at: recruiting@valassis.com. EEO is the law. To review your rights under Equal Employment Opportunity please visit: https://www.dol.gov/ofccp/regs/compliance/posters/pdf/eeopost.pdf", 'Ability to learn and apply new technologies quickly', 'A Team Player', 'Technical chops. You know the Salesforce eco-system in-depth and understand how to use the platform effectively. In addition, you will be familiar with services leveraged by cloud technologies such as databases, queues, and asynchronous/parallel operations. Bonus points if you hold a Salesforce technical certification.']

job_title: Senior Distributed Software Engineer - Big Data Infrastructure
job_text: ['', 'Specifically, We Are Working On', 'If this aligns well with your passion, we would love to hear from you!', 'Elevating the architecture and functionalities of our workflow scheduling engine (called Meson) so we could continue to grow its functionality and scalability to match our growing use cases. ', 'Building an IFTTT service (called Microbots) to help us expand and scale on the usage pattern of event driven architecture.', 'Working with a massive amount of data (100+ PB) that is growing rapidly.Understanding and solving real business needs at large scale by applying your software engineering and analytical problem solving skills.Architecting and building a robust, scalable, and highly available distributed infrastructure.Leading cross-functional initiatives and collaborating with engineers across teams.Sharing our experiences with the open source communities and contributing to Netflix OSS. ', 'Integrating Genie with our virtual execution environment Titus so it can evolve into a distributed big data job execution environment.', 'You are proficient in design and development of RESTful web services. ', 'About You', 'This Would Be Your Dream Job If You Enjoy', 'Building our first version of Data access service to allow different ML applications to access data directly in our data warehouse. ', 'Working with a massive amount of data (100+ PB) that is growing rapidly.', 'You have 5+ years of experience in building large scale distributed applications. ', 'And many more ...', 'Leading cross-functional initiatives and collaborating with engineers across teams.', 'You have a BS/MS/PhD in Computer Science or related field.', 'You are an expert in Java. Python or Scala expertise is a plus.', 'Architecting and building a robust, scalable, and highly available distributed infrastructure.', 'Transitioning our data infrastructure into a more scalable and sustainable event driven architecture. For example, dropping a table in Metacat (our metadata service) would trigger an event to our S3 deletion service to clean up data. Finishing a job in Genie (our job management service) would trigger an event to our scheduler to start the next dependent job. Building an IFTTT service (called Microbots) to help us expand and scale on the usage pattern of event driven architecture.Elevating the architecture and functionalities of our workflow scheduling engine (called Meson) so we could continue to grow its functionality and scalability to match our growing use cases. Integrating Genie with our virtual execution environment Titus so it can evolve into a distributed big data job execution environment.Building our first version of Data access service to allow different ML applications to access data directly in our data warehouse. And many more ...If this aligns well with your passion, we would love to hear from you!', 'You have 5+ years of experience in building large scale distributed applications. You are proficient in design and development of RESTful web services. You are an expert in Java. Python or Scala expertise is a plus.You have a BS/MS/PhD in Computer Science or related field.Most importantly, you are thrilled to help solve our big data challenges while revolutionizing internet TV!', 'Transitioning our data infrastructure into a more scalable and sustainable event driven architecture. For example, dropping a table in Metacat (our metadata service) would trigger an event to our S3 deletion service to clean up data. Finishing a job in Genie (our job management service) would trigger an event to our scheduler to start the next dependent job. ', 'Understanding and solving real business needs at large scale by applying your software engineering and analytical problem solving skills.', 'Sharing our experiences with the open source communities and contributing to Netflix OSS. ', 'Most importantly, you are thrilled to help solve our big data challenges while revolutionizing internet TV!']

['', 'Experience with databases like Postgres, MySQL and familiarity with Redis, Kafka, Memcached, Spark.', " Work on building everything from APIs to backend systems across a range of technologies to support new and improved functionality that meets product needs. Lead the design and implementation of complex systems end to end - be it a new service to power new functionality or data pipelines to ingest large volumes of data or implementing state of the art complex algorithms. Scope, define and lead design and implementation across multi-functional teams. You will often take vague product requirements and be responsible for breaking them down into smaller components displaying committed prioritization and coordination Work collaboratively with product managers, infrastructure, platform and data engineers to refine requirements, architect and implement complex systems. Debug hard problems - that’s a given! When things break -- and they will -- you will find yourself debugging those challenging bugs and will be eager and able to fix things. Mentor other specialists and chip in to the team growth and development. Continuously learn something new, whether it’s a new technology or a quirk of a language we otherwise didn’t know. On occasion, you may find yourself picking up a new language or working with an unfamiliar platform. If this does not intimidate you, and you're eager to dive in and get the job done you will be right at home. ", 'Work on building everything from APIs to backend systems across a range of technologies to support new and improved functionality that meets product needs.', 'Ability to write readable and testable code.', 'In 2020, we are recognized as one of Forbes Best Startups, Great Places to Work, and Bay Area Best Places to Work.', 'We have more than 3 billion monthly users and are partnered with over 50,000 apps.', 'Debug hard problems - that’s a given!
