', ' Professional experience building backend systems and APIs for 7+ years. Strong experience in Java and comfortable diving in to any language or technology. Experience with databases like Postgres, MySQL and familiarity with Redis, Kafka, Memcached, Spark. Experience working with modern cloud based microservice architectures. Good knowledge of concurrency, resiliency and caching. Experience building and debugging complex systems in a team environment. Ability to display a significant ownership of features and systems and pursues a result driven development approach consistent with pragmatism. Passion for building and shipping phenomenal customer facing software. Ability to write readable and testable code. A data first approach to iterative development. High attention to detail and a strong desire to continually improve. ['', 'Understanding of search engine internals and experience with either Solr or Elasticsearch', 'BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technology field', 'Ownership, quality, empathy for our users, team, contributions to database community and a bias for action', '4+ years of professional experience building reliable high performance services using JavaExperience performance engineering low latency servicesUnderstanding of search engine internals and experience with either Solr or ElasticsearchExperience in software instrumentation for monitoring and observabilityBA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technology field', "As a search engineer in the DataHub team, you will build low latency discovery services that scale to address needs of financial datasets at Bloomberg. You will engineer reliable systems, learn unique needs of financial data, innovate on platform services and query patterns. You will also have the opportunity to contribute to open source projects. You'll be surrounded by people who are passionate about distributed computing, and believe that world-class service is critical to customer success. You'll get the chance to work with development teams across Bloomberg and understand their application requirements and build systems together.", 'The DataHub Engineering team provides a distributed platform for hosting datasets, complete with managed data stores, search, discovery, batch analytics and real-time stream processing capabilities. Our goals: ensure high quality content, which is indispensable to financial markets, is cataloged, standardized, discoverable, distributed and accessible in one place.', '4+ years of professional experience building reliable high performance services using Java', 'Bloomberg is an equal opportunities employer, and we value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'The ideal candidate is an innovative problem solver who enjoys working in multiple roles and thrives in a fast-paced, collaborative environment. You are curious, kind, continually learning, and happy to share what you learn. You enjoy pursuing complex issues to their root cause. You love search engine internals, performance at scale and engineering for reliability.', 'Experience in software instrumentation for monitoring and observability', 'Experience performance engineering low latency services']

As a leading national provider of IT staffing and solutions, ConsultNet delivers exceptional services to startup, midmarket and Fortune 1000 companies across North America. Since 1996, we've partnered with clients to create rewarding opportunities for our consultants, successfully building teams that have surefire results. job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Player Platform, Riot SDK
job_text: ['', 'Senior Software Engineer on the Player Platform SDK', 'Console, Mobile and PC development environments', "Work with game team's technical leads in wholly understanding development needs and challenges when working with central technologies at Riot", 'Significant hands-on experience with two or more of the following programming languages: C/C++, Java, C#, Objective-C/Swift.', 'Experience working with one or more of the following platforms: iOS, Android, Macintosh', 'Required Qualifications', 'Responsibilities', 'Partner with project leads and quality leads in defining and grooming high-level user stories', ' Experience working with one or more of the following platforms: iOS, Android, Macintosh Experience working with Unity 3D or Unreal Engine Experience defining and delivering technical solutions to technical customers/users ', "Lead a process in defining technical outcomes, tools and solutions that create cohesive and natural developer experiences for Riot's game developers", ' Console, Mobile and PC development environments Game engine middleware such as Unity 3D, Unreal Engine and internal Riot game engines 1st party and 3rd party technologies and SDKs  ', ' BS in Computer Science or equivalent years of job experience across software 7+ years of experience in a software engineering role (i.e. software, systems, architecture) Experience shipping multiple games to at least one of the following platforms: XBox One, PS4, Nintendo Switch Significant hands-on experience with two or more of the following programming languages: C/C++, Java, C#, Objective-C/Swift. ', 'Experience defining and delivering technical solutions to technical customers/users', 'Game engine middleware such as Unity 3D, Unreal Engine and internal Riot game engines', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Contribute to architecture and solutions that support integrations with console platforms', 'Our Perks', '1st party and 3rd party technologies and SDKs ', '7+ years of experience in a software engineering role (i.e. software, systems, architecture)', 'BS in Computer Science or equivalent years of job experience across software', 'Experience working with Unity 3D or Unreal Engine', "It's our policy to provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and members of Riot Games, Inc. Riot Games makes reasonable accommodations for handicapped and disabled Rioters and does not unlawfully discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, handicap, veteran status, marital status, criminal history, or any other category protected by applicable federal and state law, including the City of Los Angeles' Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring Ordinance relating to an applicant's criminal history (LAMC 189.00).", 'Be an individual contributor on the team, where appropriate building reference implementations, tackling challenging and ambiguous technical solutions, and conducting design and coding reviews', 'Experience shipping multiple games to at least one of the following platforms: XBox One, PS4, Nintendo Switch', 'Establish strong connections with engineers on the team, providing engineers with guidance, mentorship, and support', " Contribute to architecture and solutions that support integrations with console platforms Partner with project leads and quality leads in defining and grooming high-level user stories Be an individual contributor on the team, where appropriate building reference implementations, tackling challenging and ambiguous technical solutions, and conducting design and coding reviews Lead a process in defining technical outcomes, tools and solutions that create cohesive and natural developer experiences for Riot's game developers Establish strong connections with engineers on the team, providing engineers with guidance, mentorship, and support Work with game team's technical leads in wholly understanding development needs and challenges when working with central technologies at Riot "]

job_title: Sr. Software Engineer, Platform and API
job_text: ['Experience developing Internet applications', 'Experience in handling customer escalations in a timely manner', 'Responsibilities:', 'Work with Product Management to understand the feature requirements and trade-offs', 'Work with QA to ensure the quality of the features, including the creation and maintenance of test cases', 'Financial/Accounting application experience a plus', 'Work with Product Management to understand the feature requirements and trade-offsWork in agile teams to design and implement scalable and repeatable solutionsCreate functional specifications and designs, and present recommendations to the Architects and leadsWork with QA to ensure the quality of the features, including the creation and maintenance of test cases', '6+ years software engineering development experience', 'Hands-on coding expertise in languages such as Java or PHP', 'Strong SQL skills and understanding of database/data modeling concepts, experience with Oracle is a plus', 'Strong communication skills', 'History of delivering high-quality, well-designed software products', 'Platform and API Software Engineers maintain and extend the Sage Intacct framework that enables third party developers to create new, integrated applications within the Sage Intacct ecosystem. The Sr. Software Engineer will understand and communicate the implications of design decisions and will be responsible for highlighting important or difficult decisions, ensuring that the trade-offs are considered. The Sr. Software Engineer will work closely with the Architects and lead engineers in the team to plan and design the subsystems.', 'BS or MS in Computer Science', 'Requirements:', 'Work in agile teams to design and implement scalable and repeatable solutions', 'Experience in SOAP XML and REST API is desired', 'Strong analysis, problem solving, and troubleshooting skills', 'BS or MS in Computer Science6+ years software engineering development experienceExperience developing application framework and APIsExperience developing Internet applicationsHands-on coding expertise in languages such as Java or PHPExperience in SOAP XML and REST API is desiredStrong SQL skills and understanding of database/data modeling concepts, experience with Oracle is a plusStrong analysis, problem solving, and troubleshooting skillsHistory of delivering high-quality, well-designed software productsExperience in handling customer escalations in a timely mannerFinancial/Accounting application experience a plusFamiliarity with CI tools (Jenkins)Strong communication skills', 'Create functional specifications and designs, and present recommendations to the Architects and leads', 'Familiarity with CI tools (Jenkins)', 'Experience developing application framework and APIs']

['', 'Experience working in a CI/CD environment', 'What is this role about?', 'Experience in developing products in an Agile development environment', 'What does a “Day-in-the-Life” look like?', 'Work with team to establish benchmark around the work done in App or in Backend. Determine where the bottlenecks are and how to implement better solutions.', ' Write documentation and automated tests for code to be written. Implement functionality for automated tests that will successfully pass and meet coding standards. Debug production issues and create subsequent mitigation plans. Optimize performance of existing implementations. Look at non-familiar code and identify issues, while improving overall quality of system, and helping team members with debugging issues. Build the right data structures, add indices to fix performance issues, and determine data structures that perform best with respect to third party integrations. As a component owner, where the component impacts across multiple platforms (1-5 member team), refactor critical components of code, write easily extendable code, convert abstract engineering goals into actionable items and deliver it, code complex problems, dispatch algorithms, and make improvements to automation infrastructure. Identify platform quirks and hidden methods that can slow down or boost performance. Provide quick fixes to performance issues. Mentor lower level software engineers, while coaching and influencing the performance the performance and progression of others on the team. Work with team to establish benchmark around the work done in App or in Backend. Determine where the bottlenecks are and how to implement better solutions. You have the skills to retrieve, combine, and analyze data from a variety of sources and structures. You know understanding the data is often the key to great data science. ', " At least 3 years' experience in Python, Scala, or R ", 'The Ideal Candidate Is', ' A leader. ', " At least 3 years' experience with SQL ", ' Flex your interpersonal skills to translate the complexity of your work into tangible business goals', 'Preferred Qualifications', " Statistically-minded. You have experience with clustering, classification, sentiment analysis, time series, and deep learning. job_title: Data Solutions Manager (Remote Working, Funded Training for Cloud Certifications)
job_text: ['', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Apply good interpersonal and presentation skills to working in a fast-paced environment across multinational teams', 'Io-Tahoe enables enterprise customers to automatically discover, catalog, manage and drive business value from data wherever it is held. In doing so Io-Tahoe enables enterprise customers to automate workflows including Data Migrations, Data Quality, Data Governance and self-service Data Analytics. ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Provide programming and best practice consultation directly to our clients and partners for the integration of our Enterprise Data Automation products and services with large, complex datasets. \xa0\xa0\xa0Drive the partnership with other teams to understand client requirements, communicate product improvements, and assist with all client development needs. \xa0\xa0\xa0Adopt and embrace our cultural and innovative best practices and solutions in order to quickly and accurately identify and address highly technical problems. \xa0\xa0\xa0Be solution focused, able to quickly and accurately perform detailed and meaningful diagnostic work and troubleshooting, developing additional tools where you see a need internally or for our clients.', 'Io-Tahoe also provides an intuitive user experience designed to help technical and non-technical people collaborate.\xa0Our team with a deep understanding of data challenges, giving us first-hand insight and appreciation into our customers’ diverse and complex data needs. ', 'Data Solutions Manager', '\xa0\xa0\xa0At least one of Python, Go, Kotlin, Java, C++, scripting languages for manipulating data structures', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Provide programming and best practice consultation directly to our clients and partners for the integration of our Enterprise Data Automation products and services with large, complex datasets. ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Provide timely and informative feedback to the Enterprise Data Automation Product teams.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Drive the partnership with other teams to understand client requirements, communicate product improvements, and assist with all client development needs. ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Work closely with technical and data operations teams at client companies to understand their requirements and help them to build out solutions using our Data Automation Technologies.\xa0\xa0\xa0Actively identify potential areas of improvement or gaps in internal tools & monitoring systems and propose solutions.\xa0\xa0\xa0Apply good interpersonal and presentation skills to working in a fast-paced environment across multinational teams\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaborate with peers, sales, technical account managers and service delivery teams to drive critical client on-boarding initiatives, technology partnerships and highly technical projects.\xa0\xa0\xa0Proactively identify ideas to help drive stronger product performance and implement those ideas from start to finish.\xa0\xa0\xa0Provide technical development guidance, leadership and structure to Enterprise Data clients.\xa0\xa0\xa0Cultivate deep technical partnerships with key members of the client development community.\xa0\xa0\xa0Building strong stakeholder relationships with clients, engineering and product development teams to resolve issues or build out enhancements.\xa0\xa0\xa0Administer training to clients for coding to our API during the pre-sale, implementation and adoption phases of an engagement.\xa0\xa0\xa0Support the developer community around our data delivery mechanisms.\xa0\xa0\xa0Provide timely and informative feedback to the Enterprise Data Automation Product teams.\xa0\xa0\xa0Take ownership of complex questions and issues reported by clients as a second tier of technical support via phone calls, ticket systems, email, and in person.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Industry experience with software development Java, C#, C++ and Python.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Competitive pay and comprehensive benefits package including medical/dental/vision insurance', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Proactively identify ideas to help drive stronger product performance and Enterprise Data clients.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong client facing experience, be presentable & able to articulate complex technical concepts to all skill levels.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaboration ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Support the developer community around our data delivery mechanisms.', ' Azure, GCP, AWS or OpenShift ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Adopt and embrace our cultural and innovative best practices and whilst collaborating across different teams.', '#KnowYourData', "We'd Love To See:", '\xa0\xa0\xa0Expertise in data manipulation: use of structured data tools (e.g., SQL), & unstructured data tools and platforms (e.g., Hadoop, Spark, NoSQL)', '\xa0\xa0\xa0A proven Data Engineer with a deep understanding of data structures and related programming languages.\xa0\xa0\xa0Highly proficient in at least one programming language, e.g., Python, Java, Kotlin, Go, C++, C.\xa0\xa0\xa0Expertise in data manipulation: use of structured data tools (e.g., SQL), & unstructured data tools and platforms (e.g., Hadoop, Spark, NoSQL)\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with relational and non-relational databases such as Postgres, MySQL, MongoDB, or DynamoDB.\xa0\xa0\xa0Familiarity with visualisation tools (e.g. States without visa sponsorship is a pre-requisite to be considered for this role.\xa0NO AGENCIES PLEASE. DIRECT APPLICATIONS ONLY.', 'As a proven and ambitious Data Engineer you will help us build our next-generation platform, alongside a dedicated team. Our team is smart, visionary, supportive and, above all, excited by what we do!', 'P.S. Even if this job is not for you, perhaps you have a friend who’d be a perfect fit. Send them this link. Thanks!', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Familiarity with visualisation tools (e.g. Grafana, D3, Tableau, PowerBI, Qlik)', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Take ownership of complex questions and issues reported by clients as a second tier of technical support via phone calls, ticket systems, email, and in person.', 'You will:', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Balanced Judgement ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Administer training to clients for coding to our API during the pre-sale, implementation and adoption phases of an engagement.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Familiarity with visualisation tools (e.g. Grafana, D3, Tableau, PowerBI, Qlik).', "You're a data engineering professional who is personable, intelligent, analytical and solution driven. You are not afraid of getting your hands dirty and making independent decisions when the situation demands.", 'Io-Tahoe is a global leader in Enterprise Data Automation. Our patent driven technologies significantly reduce the manual effort required for enterprise data users to better know, manage and drive value from their data assets.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience writing readable example code.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Building strong stakeholder relationships with clients, engineering and product development teams to resolve issues or build out enhancements.', 'Python/SQL/Julia/R/Golang/PowerShell/Bash', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Good interpersonal and presentation skills and ability to work in a fast-paced environment across multinational teams.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0The chance to work with a passionate team on solving one of the largest challenges globally', "We're fast paced, innovative and expanding. We have worked hard and smart to become the business we are today. We partner closely with our clients, taking time to understand their unique businesses and individual data and technology needs. ", 'We nurture: ', "We'll Trust You To:", '\xa0\xa0\xa0Rapid growth opportunities', "If the idea of applying technology and data automation techniques to solve complex data problems excites you, keep reading, we'd love to hear from you!", 'About you:', 'About Io-Tahoe', '\xa0\xa0\xa0The ability to communicate complex information to a wide range of skill levels both in verbal and written form.\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent analysis and problem solving skills.\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience writing readable example code.\xa0\xa0\xa0Confident to work with clients ranging from developers to CTOs.', 'Io-Tahoe is an inclusive Equal Employment Opportunity employer that considers applicants without regard to gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, ethnicity, disabled or veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0At least one of Python, Go, Kotlin, Java, C++, scripting languages for manipulating data structures\xa0\xa0\xa0Industry experience with software development Java, C#, C++ and Python.\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience programming in UNIX and/or Windows.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Smart Problem Solving ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0The ability to communicate complex information to a wide range of skill levels both in verbal and written form.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Data Science or related STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, & Mathematics) field.', 'What We Offer', 'Io-Tahoe offers a competitive compensation package and the opportunity to participate in developing impactful data solutions in a rapidly expanding market category. ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A curious mind, self-starter and endlessly keen to learn and develop themselves professionally.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Competitive pay and comprehensive benefits package including medical/dental/vision insurance\xa0\xa0\xa0The chance to work with a passionate team on solving one of the largest challenges globally\xa0\xa0\xa0Dynamic, fun work environment with a highly talented team\xa0\xa0\xa0Rapid growth opportunities', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Success Celebration ', '\xa0\xa0\xa0A passion for keeping up with the latest trends in data science and data engineering.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Work closely with technical and data operations teams at client companies to understand their requirements and help them to build out solutions using our Data Automation Technologies.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Demonstrable experience with translating unstructured, complex business problems into practical, powerful data solutions.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0A proven Data Engineer with a deep understanding of data structures and related programming languages.', 'You’ll be collaborating with high calibre colleagues around the world, offering unparalleled learning and growth opportunities. ', 'Be part of a game-changing organization that encourages outside-the-box thinking and empowerment and is truly shaping the future of the software industry.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience programming in UNIX and/or Windows.', 'The ideal candidate must have or be actively seeking to achieve Public Cloud Certifications with Azure, GCP, AWS or OpenShift and would already have some experience in these technologies.', 'As part of our Data Automation team you will:', '(Remote Working, Funded Training for Cloud Certifications)', '\xa0\xa0\xa0BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Data Science or related STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, & Mathematics) field.\xa0\xa0\xa0Highly proficient in at least one programming language, e.g., Python, Java, Kotlin, Go, C++, C.\xa0\xa0\xa0Expertise in data manipulation: use of structured data tools (e.g., SQL), & unstructured data tools and platforms (e.g., Hadoop, Spark, NoSQL)\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with relational and non-relational databases such as Postgres, MySQL, MongoDB, or DynamoDB.\xa0\xa0\xa0Familiarity with visualisation tools (e.g. Grafana, D3, Tableau, PowerBI, Qlik).\xa0\xa0\xa0Good interpersonal and presentation skills and ability to work in a fast-paced environment across multinational teams.\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong client facing experience, be presentable & able to articulate complex technical concepts to all skill levels.\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong organisational skills, attention to detail and the ability to handle multiple technical streams / lead client engagements whilst collaborating across different teams.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with relational and non-relational databases such as Postgres, MySQL, MongoDB, or DynamoDB.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Be solution focused, able to quickly and accurately perform detailed and meaningful diagnostic work and troubleshooting, developing additional tools where you see a need internally or for our clients.', '\xa0\xa0\xa0Dynamic, fun work environment with a highly talented team']

['', '    Project Leadership experience', '    BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technology field', '    For a front-end engineer, knowledge of various UI frameworks and UX paradigms, JavaScript and HTML. ', "For over 30 years, our clients have relied on our core product, the Bloomberg Terminal, to access the data and analytics they need to make informed investment decisions. We absorb billions of data points from hundreds of financial markets every single day. Our developers build applications that fuel the markets by providing intelligent analytics and transparency to level the playing field. We share a passion for solving today's problems by innovating for tomorrow. Our engineers write high performance, low latency and scalable code using proprietary and open source technologies to develop large-scale systems.", 'Equity Research Engineering designs, builds and supports the market-leading workflow platform used by investment research analysts around the world. By consolidating and analyzing proprietary internal analysis, entitled sell-side Research reports and corporate earning call transcripts we identify personalized and relevant content for each user. Through advanced machine-learning algorithms and NLP techniques, our applications allow users to stay on top of ever evolving themes and sentiment in real-time.', '    5+ years of experience:     For a backend systems engineer, knowledge of object-oriented design, data structures, algorithms and all phases of software development. This experience can be in any object-oriented language but candidates will be working with C++ and/or Java.     For a front-end engineer, knowledge of various UI frameworks and UX paradigms, JavaScript and HTML.     Functional understanding of distributed systems architecture    An aptitude for analytical problem solving    Experience in delivering high performance production quality systems to clients    BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technology field', "If this sounds like you, apply! We'll get in touch if we believe you're a good match and get started with a technical phone interview. ", '    For a backend systems engineer, knowledge of object-oriented design, data structures, algorithms and all phases of software development. This experience can be in any object-oriented language but candidates will be working with C++ and/or Java. ', 'Bloomberg is an equal opportunities employer, and we value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', "Company Financials (COFI) group designs and builds data pipelines and applications to provide clients with robust quantitative financial data that sets the ground work for analytics and research on companies. We focus on delivering a wide array of data that ranges from the historical financial performance of a company to the future projections on the expected growth of various company business lines. Our suite of applications provide insight into understanding the story behind a company's value by identifying trends and studying metrics with transparency back to source documents. Our teams work together in a fast-paced and collaborative environment to deliver this highly visible and critical product.", '    Experience in delivering high performance production quality systems to clients', '    Functional understanding of distributed systems architecture', '    Financial domain knowledge and experience', '    An aptitude for analytical problem solving', '    Financial domain knowledge and experience    Project Leadership experience', 'Stocks and Investors group provides analytics and data that are used by more than 150,000 financial professionals including the front, middle, and back offices of major financial institutions. We cover Equities, Funds, and Indices instruments as well as the core data sets of holdings, classifications, and corporate actions. Our applications are used over a million times a day and our data APIs handle billions of requests.', '    5+ years of experience: ', "Equity Markets Analysis (EQMA) team builds full-stack applications to analyze market trends, compare and contrast companies, evaluate analyst predictions, and refine investment ideas. For example, our clients can see Wall Street analysts' company performance predictions, build an investment model from thousands of pertinent characteristics, and determine its quality by backtesting and comparing results against historical benchmarks. Our platform delivers critical insights based on our clients' current holdings by using data cube technologies on top of many and varied global datasets that we've accrued over 30+ years. Working in EQMA, you'll gain a deep understanding of data modeling and processing, high-performance backend systems architecture, and visual design."]

['', 'Overview', 'Deep knowledge of Linux operating system and proficient in Bash', 'You will enable software engineers across the company to use machine learning solutions.', ' You will design solutions for machine learning infrastructure that will support the current and future needs of our business. Many interesting and unique use cases that require innovation both in the application and infrastructure level, makes this a challenging and dynamic job.  You will apply your system software and machine learning knowledge to build scalable, reliable, and easy-to-use machine learning workflows. You will enable machine learning teams to perform scalable training, evaluation, inference, debugging, monitoring in the cloud and on prem. You will enable software engineers across the company to use machine learning solutions. You will work closely with related teams, including Search, Ads, Personalization & Recommendation and other teams across Instacart to ensure that applications that require ML services work seamlessly. ', 'Experience in using Kubernetes (or similar orchestration platforms), Kafka (or similar streaming platforms), low latency data management systems such as Redis, RocksDB, DynamoDB', 'Working knowledge of complete machine learning lifecycle using frameworks such as Tensorflow, Karas, and Sci-kit Learn', ' Background in Computer Science, Math, Statistics, or a related field. 5+ years of industry experience building ML infrastructure at scale (3+ years for junior level candidates) Proficient in Python or C++. Experience writing and maintaining high-quality production code Deep knowledge of Linux operating system and proficient in Bash Experience in using Kubernetes (or similar orchestration platforms), Kafka (or similar streaming platforms), low latency data management systems such as Redis, RocksDB, DynamoDB Knowledge of machine learning concepts and fundamentals Working knowledge of automation platforms such as Jenkins, Ansible, and Terraform Working knowledge of complete machine learning lifecycle using frameworks such as Tensorflow, Karas, and Sci-kit Learn Experience using AWS and/or other major cloud platforms to build data-intensive infrastructure, specially for machine learning applications  Working knowledge of publicly available ML platforms such as Sagemaker, Kubeflow, and MLflow (Preferred) Contribution to, and interaction with, open source projects in big data and distributed systems is a bonus', 'About You', 'Working knowledge of publicly available ML platforms such as Sagemaker, Kubeflow, and MLflow (Preferred)', 'You will apply your system software and machine learning knowledge to build scalable, reliable, and easy-to-use machine learning workflows.', 'About The Job', '5+ years of industry experience building ML infrastructure at scale (3+ years for junior level candidates)', 'Proficient in Python or C++. Experience writing and maintaining high-quality production code', 'You will design solutions for machine learning infrastructure that will support the current and future needs of our business. Many interesting and unique use cases that require innovation both in the application and infrastructure level, makes this a challenging and dynamic job. ', 'You will enable machine learning teams to perform scalable training, evaluation, inference, debugging, monitoring in the cloud and on prem.', 'Working knowledge of automation platforms such as Jenkins, Ansible, and Terraform', 'Contribution to, and interaction with, open source projects in big data and distributed systems is a bonus', 'Background in Computer Science, Math, Statistics, or a related field.', 'Knowledge of machine learning concepts and fundamentals', 'Experience using AWS and/or other major cloud platforms to build data-intensive infrastructure, specially for machine learning applications ', 'You will work closely with related teams, including Search, Ads, Personalization & Recommendation and other teams across Instacart to ensure that applications that require ML services work seamlessly.']

job_title: Lead Software Engineer, Schedules UI - Tableau
job_text: ['', 'Accommodations  - ', 'Partnering closely with product managers and designers to iteratively create and refine their plans.', 'Coaching and mentoring other engineers.', 'Salesforce.com', 'You’re A Recruiter! Tableau hires company builders, and you will be asked to be on constant lookout for the best talent to bring onboard to help us continue to build one of the best companies in the world!', "You're Self-Motivated. You take initiative and can turn ideas into real features. You enjoy discussing use cases & user flows with product managers & designers, and contributing ideas to those discussions.", 'You’re Respectful. You treat your colleagues with honesty, kindness, and respect and actively do your part to create a positive work environment.', "You're Customer-Focused. You love thinking about how users will use the product, and what problems they might run into.", 'Job Category', 'Some of the things you’ll be doing include …', 'Using the full capabilities of React and Typescript to build a state-of-the-art front end.Occasionally diving into Java codebases to connect different parts of the product.Partnering closely with product managers and designers to iteratively create and refine their plans.Working with the entire team in a collaborative environment where all suggestions are welcomed, and all ideas thoughtfully considered.Encouraging the team constantly improve, from iterating on our agile process to finding ways to reduce our technical debt.Helping maintain high standards for quality and operational excellence across the team.Coaching and mentoring other engineers.Contributing to the design and architecture of the product, from user-level stories to API design and backend architecture.', 'Accommodations ', "You're Experienced. You have a bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience, and professional experience building beautiful & interactive web-based front ends in JavaScript or TypeScript using a modern framework such as React or Vue. If you have experience with Java, C#, or C++, that’s a bonus.You're Customer-Focused. You love thinking about how users will use the product, and what problems they might run into.You’re Quality-Focused. You write code that’s well-tested, performs well, and fails gracefully.You're Self-Motivated. You take initiative and can turn ideas into real features. You enjoy discussing use cases & user flows with product managers & designers, and contributing ideas to those discussions.You’re Collaborative. You enjoy collaborating with, learning from, and teaching others so we all can become better.You’re Respectful. You treat your colleagues with honesty, kindness, and respect and actively do your part to create a positive work environment.You’re Humble. You are unafraid to ask questions when you don’t know the answer, and you approach disagreements with the possibility that you might be wrong.You’re A Recruiter! Tableau hires company builders, and you will be asked to be on constant lookout for the best talent to bring onboard to help us continue to build one of the best companies in the world!", 'You’re Quality-Focused. You write code that’s well-tested, performs well, and fails gracefully.', 'Salesforce.org', 'Contributing to the design and architecture of the product, from user-level stories to API design and backend architecture.', 'You’re Humble. You are unafraid to ask questions when you don’t know the answer, and you approach disagreements with the possibility that you might be wrong.', 'Salesfore.com', 'Who You Are...', 'Job Details', 'Posting Statement', 'What You’ll Be Doing', 'Working with the entire team in a collaborative environment where all suggestions are welcomed, and all ideas thoughtfully considered.', 'Occasionally diving into Java codebases to connect different parts of the product.', 'Helping maintain high standards for quality and operational excellence across the team.', 'You’re Collaborative. You enjoy collaborating with, learning from, and teaching others so we all can become better.', 'Encouraging the team constantly improve, from iterating on our agile process to finding ways to reduce our technical debt.', "You're Experienced. You have a bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience, and professional experience building beautiful & interactive web-based front ends in JavaScript or TypeScript using a modern framework such as React or Vue. If you have experience with Java, C#, or C++, that’s a bonus.", 'Using the full capabilities of React and Typescript to build a state-of-the-art front end.', 'To get the best candidate experience, please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts.']

On occasion, you may find yourself picking up a new language or working with an unfamiliar platform. ', 'Fluency with JavaScript, Node.js.', 'Ability to write readable and testable code.', 'In 2020, we are recognized as one of Forbes Best Startups, Great Places to Work, and Bay Area Best Places to Work.', 'We have more than 3 billion monthly users and are partnered with over 50,000 apps.', ' Branch has raised more than $330M from investors such as NEA, Founders Fund, and Playground Ventures. In 2020, we are recognized as one of Forbes Best Startups, Great Places to Work, and Bay Area Best Places to Work. We have more than 3 billion monthly users and are partnered with over 50,000 apps. ', 'You’ll Be a Good Fit If You Have', "Work with the QA team to ensure the features you're shipping are of high quality, including rolling up your sleeves and writing both unit and integration tests.", 'We are headquartered in Silicon Valley and have presence all over the world.', 'Influence and drive best practices and technical excellence within your team and across the Branch organization.', " Help build and shape the next generation of Branch’s customer-facing tools. Influence and drive best practices and technical excellence within your team and across the Branch organization. Drive UI architecture that optimizes for usability, performance and speed, while supporting rapid experimentation. ", 'A Little Bit About Us', 'Help build and shape the next generation of Branch’s customer-facing tools.', ' Professional experience building web applications for 3+ years. job_title: Senior Software Engineer - Network Management System
job_text: ['', 'Be a team player and work in a highly collaborative environment', 'Experience with Python', 'Experience with microservices architecture and containerization', 'Experience with a relational database (MSSQL, MySQL, etc.)', 'Demonstrate honesty, integrity, and humility. These are our core values', 'Experience with UI design', 'Experience with full-stack development (UI, back-end services, and database)', "At Bloomberg, everything moves at the speed of light, including our employees. Our Internal Applications team builds the solutions that keep our global company running, and we have a tremendous impact on our employees' day-to-day. We are focused on building high-quality and user-friendly systems that help our 20,000 employees around the world do their job in the most efficient manner.", "As a member of our team, you'll have the opportunity to oversee projects from ideation to production rollout. All of our engineers work across a full stack and in an agile environment (Scrum). You'll release code changes every week - sometimes even every day. Along the way, you'll collaborate with various engineering and business teams across the company.", 'Have fun while doing great work!', 'Bloomberg is an equal opportunities employer, and we value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'Be creative, motivated and able to work in all areas of the tech stack', 'Strong analytical and creative problem solving skills', 'Experience with JavaScript', '3+ years of software engineering experience in a strongly-typed object-oriented language (C++, C#, Java)Experience with full-stack development (UI, back-end services, and database)Strong analytical and creative problem solving skillsBA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technology field', 'Experience with software development on a Linux environment', 'Experience with PythonExperience with a relational database (MSSQL, MySQL, etc.)Experience with JavaScriptExperience with microservices architecture and containerizationExperience with software development on a Linux environmentExperience working in an Agile SDLCExperience with UI design', 'Be creative, motivated and able to work in all areas of the tech stackHave strong communication skillsBe a team player and work in a highly collaborative environmentDemonstrate honesty, integrity, and humility. These are our core valuesHave fun while doing great work!', "Bloomberg manages one of the world's largest private data networks to help bring the financial community around the world closer together. This network is how all of our subscribers connect back to our data centers, and serves latency sensitive market data, Terminal services, Electronic Trading Platforms, Enterprise Solutions, news, and video. Our network footprint is constantly growing, and the Networks Applications Team in the Workflow Technologies group is responsible for the tools that help the Network Engineers do their job. We build the tools to help track every piece of our massive network and provide intelligence to help optimize request traffic and provide network load balancing.", 'BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technology field', 'Have strong communication skills', 'Experience working in an Agile SDLC', '3+ years of software engineering experience in a strongly-typed object-oriented language (C++, C#, Java)']

job_text: ['', 'Accommodations  - ', 'Partnering closely with product managers and designers to iteratively create and refine their plans.', 'Coaching and mentoring other engineers.', 'Salesforce.com', 'You’re A Recruiter! Tableau hires company builders, and you will be asked to be on constant lookout for the best talent to bring onboard to help us continue to build one of the best companies in the world!', "You're Self-Motivated. You take initiative and can turn ideas into real features. You enjoy discussing use cases & user flows with product managers & designers, and contributing ideas to those discussions.", 'You’re Respectful. You treat your colleagues with honesty, kindness, and respect and actively do your part to create a positive work environment.', "You're Customer-Focused. You love thinking about how users will use the product, and what problems they might run into.", 'Job Category', 'Some of the things you’ll be doing include …', 'Using the full capabilities of React and Typescript to build a state-of-the-art front end.Occasionally diving into Java codebases to connect different parts of the product.Partnering closely with product managers and designers to iteratively create and refine their plans.Working with the entire team in a collaborative environment where all suggestions are welcomed, and all ideas thoughtfully considered.Encouraging the team constantly improve, from iterating on our agile process to finding ways to reduce our technical debt.Helping maintain high standards for quality and operational excellence across the team.Coaching and mentoring other engineers.Contributing to the design and architecture of the product, from user-level stories to API design and backend architecture.', 'Accommodations ', "You're Experienced. You have a bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience, and professional experience building beautiful & interactive web-based front ends in JavaScript or TypeScript using a modern framework such as React or Vue. If you have experience with Java, C#, or C++, that’s a bonus.You're Customer-Focused. You love thinking about how users will use the product, and what problems they might run into.You’re Quality-Focused. You write code that’s well-tested, performs well, and fails gracefully.You're Self-Motivated. You take initiative and can turn ideas into real features. You enjoy discussing use cases & user flows with product managers & designers, and contributing ideas to those discussions.You’re Collaborative. You enjoy collaborating with, learning from, and teaching others so we all can become better.You’re Respectful. You treat your colleagues with honesty, kindness, and respect and actively do your part to create a positive work environment.You’re Humble. You are unafraid to ask questions when you don’t know the answer, and you approach disagreements with the possibility that you might be wrong.You’re A Recruiter! Tableau hires company builders, and you will be asked to be on constant lookout for the best talent to bring onboard to help us continue to build one of the best companies in the world!", 'You’re Quality-Focused. You write code that’s well-tested, performs well, and fails gracefully.', 'Salesforce.org', 'Contributing to the design and architecture of the product, from user-level stories to API design and backend architecture.', 'You’re Humble. You are unafraid to ask questions when you don’t know the answer, and you approach disagreements with the possibility that you might be wrong.', 'Salesfore.com', 'Who You Are...', 'Job Details', 'Posting Statement', 'Working with the entire team in a collaborative environment where all suggestions are welcomed, and all ideas thoughtfully considered.', 'Occasionally diving into Java codebases to connect different parts of the product.', 'Helping maintain high standards for quality and operational excellence across the team.', 'You’re Collaborative. You enjoy collaborating with, learning from, and teaching others so we all can become better.', 'Encouraging the team constantly improve, from iterating on our agile process to finding ways to reduce our technical debt.', 'What you’ll be doing:', "You're Experienced. You have a bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience, and professional experience building beautiful & interactive web-based front ends in JavaScript or TypeScript using a modern framework such as React or Vue. If you have experience with Java, C#, or C++, that’s a bonus.", 'Using the full capabilities of React and Typescript to build a state-of-the-art front end.', 'To get the best candidate experience, please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts.']

job_title: Software Engineer III - Tech - Sam's Club
job_text: ['', 'Assists in providing guidance to small groups of two to three engineers, including offshore associates, for assigned Engineering projects by proving pertinent documents, directions, examples, and timeline.', 'Troubleshoots business and production issues by gathering information (for example, issue, impact, criticality, possible root cause); performing root cause analysis to reduce future issues; engaging support teams to assist in the resolution of issues; developing solutions; driving the development of an action plan; performing actions as designated in the plan; interpreting the results to determine further action; and completing online documentation.', "Provides support to the business by responding to user questions, concerns, and issues (for example, technical feasibility, implementation strategies); researching and identifying needed solutions; determining implementation designs; providing guidance regarding implications of new and enhanced systems; identifying short and long term solutions; and directing users to appropriate contacts for issues outside of associate's domain.", 'Outlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no minimum qualifications. ', 'Outlined below are the optional preferred qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no preferred qualifications. ', 'Manages small to large-sized complex projects by reviewing project requirements; translating requirements into technical solutions; researching and identifying alternative solutions; determining needed solution based on return on investment and value add to the business; gathering requested information (for example, design documents, product requirements, wire frames); writing and developing code; conducting unit testing; communicating status and issues to team members and stakeholders; collaborating with project team and cross functional teams; identifying areas of opportunity; interpreting information and identifying a solution; ensuring solution is sustainable across implementation and use; troubleshooting open issues and bug-fixes; and ensuring on-time delivery and hand-offs.', "What You'll Do", 'Participates in the discovery phase of small to medium-sized projects to come up with high level design by partnering with the product management, project management, business, and user experience teams.', ' Outlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no minimum qualifications.  ']

job_title: Senior Software Engineer – MARS (Multi Asset Risk Systems)
job_text: ['', "MARS allow our clients to manage and assess their risk by providing them with different tools like stress-testing functionality which models their portfolios behavior under extreme market conditions. Or trying the predict the future based on the past. MARS is used by both external clients and internal clients across Bloomberg in teams which are interested in using the group's risk functionality along with their own data for their clients.", 'Finance experienceExperience in distributed systems, including distributed database and computation softwareA background in finance, math or statistics', 'Finance experience', 'Working knowledge of Python, C++, or Java', 'MARS provides risk calculations and analytics across various asset classes by applying distributed computing techniques that span across hundreds of machines. In addition to expanding our main product offering, our top concern is performance which requires using different methods and technologies to achieve the optimal solution and adding RISK functionality. MARS is using big data software, distributed computing algorithms, dynamic resource allocations, cluster management, grid computing and machine learning among others.', 'What would happen to your investments during a political or economic crisis? You may not be able to predict the future but YOU will be able to get ready for it. This is the essence of the Risk Management science and this is what the team task to do.', 'MARS is a close knit group of 130+ engineers. Working in MARS, let you tackle tough problems alongside some of the brightest engineers and product managers. MARS sits at the intersection of finance and technology where people and machine will challenge your ideas and push your engineering skills to the next level. We dabble in a slew of technologies from big data to a wide variety of programming languages, and gain an understanding of the intricacies of crafting large scale distributed computation systems.', 'The MARS team (Multi Asset Risk System) enables risk professionals to assess and gauge their trading and portfolios holdings against the gathering financial storm.', 'Work directly with product owners to build applications that our clients use to tackle complex problemsTake ownership of technical solutions, development and delivery to productionDevelop in all levels of a web application stack, from the client to server sideWrite production-quality infrastructure software to gather data, automate model training, and run the models at a large scale', 'Develop in all levels of a web application stack, from the client to server side', 'Bloomberg is an equal opportunities employer, and we value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', 'We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request accommodation.', 'Write production-quality infrastructure software to gather data, automate model training, and run the models at a large scale', 'Experience covering the full software development life-cycleWorking knowledge of Python, C++, or Java', 'Experience in distributed systems, including distributed database and computation software', 'Take ownership of technical solutions, development and delivery to production', 'A background in finance, math or statistics', 'Experience covering the full software development life-cycle', 'Work directly with product owners to build applications that our clients use to tackle complex problems']

['', '  Work across the org to plan and execute large, cross-functional initiatives. Work with engineers across the org on project definition, technical specification, task break-down, delivery, monitoring, and maintenance.   Generate simple and elegant designs that are easily deployed and debugged, but anticipate the unhappy path. Write high-quality code that can be easily understood and leveraged by others.   Review others’ work and provide constructive feedback in order to maintain high and consistent quality standards across teams.   Lead and mentor engineers to help them succeed and grow. Provide the right context to engineers and train them to take ownership of their respective pieces of the initiative.   Effectively incorporate needs and opinions from stakeholders, advocate for ideas and initiatives, and create a common understanding where all voices are heard. ', 'Experience in building and scaling node.js applications is a strong plus.', 'Ability to write readable and testable code.', 'In 2020, we are recognized as one of Forbes Best Startups, Great Places to Work, and Bay Area Best Places to Work.', 'We have more than 3 billion monthly users and are partnered with over 50,000 apps.', ' Branch has raised more than $330M from investors such as NEA, Founders Fund, and Playground Ventures. In 2020, we are recognized as one of Forbes Best Startups, Great Places to Work, and Bay Area Best Places to Work. We have more than 3 billion monthly users and are partnered with over 50,000 apps. ', 'You’ll Be a Good Fit If You Have', "Work with the QA team to ensure the features you're shipping are of high quality, including rolling up your sleeves and writing both unit and integration tests.", 'We are headquartered in Silicon Valley and have presence all over the world.', 'Mentor other team members and contribute to team growth.', 'Influence and drive best practices and technical excellence within your team and across the Branch organization.', 'A Little Bit About Us', '5+ years of professional experience building scalable backend systems and API gateways.', 'Strong experience in Java, Node.js and comfortable diving into any language or technology.', 'Help build and shape the next generation of Branch’s APIs and backend systems.', 'Experience with nginx and lua is a strong plus.', 'Experience with databases like Postgres, and familiarity with Redis and Kafka.', 'Experience building and debugging complex systems in a team environment.', 'Branch has raised more than $330M from investors such as NEA, Founders Fund, and Playground Ventures. ', 'Diversity at Branch ranks in the top 10% for similarly sized companies (by Comparably).', ' 5+ years of professional experience building scalable backend systems and API gateways. Strong experience in Java, Node.js and comfortable diving into any language or technology. Strong experience in building and maintaining API gateways. Experience with nginx and lua is a strong plus. Experience in building and scaling node.js applications is a strong plus. Experience with databases like Postgres, and familiarity with Redis and Kafka. Experience working with modern cloud-based microservice architectures. Experience building and debugging complex systems in a team environment. Ability to write readable and testable code. High attention to detail and a strong desire to continually improve. ', 'Strong experience in building and maintaining API gateways.', " Help build and shape the next generation of Branch’s APIs and backend systems. Influence and drive best practices and technical excellence within your team and across the Branch organization. Scope, define and lead design and implementation across multi-functional teams. You will often take vague product requirements and be responsible for breaking them down into smaller components displaying committed prioritization and coordination. Work with the QA team to ensure the features you're shipping are of high quality, including rolling up your sleeves and writing both unit and integration tests. Mentor other team members and contribute to team growth. Learn something new every week, whether it’s a new technology or a quirk of a language we otherwise didn’t know. On occasion, you may find yourself picking up a new language or working with an unfamiliar platform. ['', ' A drive to design scalable distributed systems and complex workflows. Microservices / Distributed architecture Experience with Javascript Experience with a relational SQL database Experience with the latest generation of CI/CD process (github, Jenkins, etc.)', ' 2+ years of professional experience working in a Linux/Unix environment', ' Experience with the latest generation of CI/CD process (github, Jenkins, etc.)', ' Experience with a relational SQL database', 'Bloomberg hosts a large amount of data from 3rd party data providers and exchanges, such as news, equities, research reports, earning & estimates, bonds, FX, derivatives, muni, etc. The Entitlement Applications team supports the Global Data Contributions and Exchanges business.', ' BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technology field', ' 4+ years of professional experience designing, developing, and releasing high-quality software in C++, C#, and/or Python', ' Strong analytical and creative problem-solving skills', 'Bloomberg is an equal opportunities employer, and we value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', ' Microservices / Distributed architecture', 'Adopting the latest industry development and deployment methodologies, we keep bringing new Bloomberg and Open Source technologies onboard. We primarily use C++ and Python in a Linux environment. We use open source technologies such as Redis, Camunda, Splunk, Solr, Postgres. ', ' Collaborate effectively with multiple teams and product stakeholders to deliver products', ' A drive to design scalable distributed systems and complex workflows.', ' Experience with Javascript', "Bloomberg clients need to be permissioned to use 3rd party and exchanges data because different data providers have different policies and rules for who can access their data, which might require data fees. We develop product management and clients access control systems across the Bloomberg Terminal and Enterprise products. We provide systems for the data contributors to manage client entitlements and provide mechanisms for clients to search and enter requests on content. We build applications for internal users to manage products, including onboarding, configuration, contracts & billing, reporting, and business intelligence. We integrate with clients' CRM system directly via REST APIs and FIX Protocol. We develop and maintain a high-performance infrastructure for various Bloomberg applications to query whether a client has access to content on our products. Our applications help our clients stay ahead of the markets in a very dynamic environment.", "To effectively handle the operations of our contributions business, teams need the intelligence, systems, and tools to manage these relationships and drive excellent client service. Our team develops operational intelligence and contract management tools that are responsible for managing the ongoing relationships of Bloomberg contributors and data partners. We build and support applications for internal clients in Content & Entities Business Management (CEBM) department for managing data contributors' onboarding workflows, profiles and relationships, including, coverages, contracts, agreements, commercials, and revenue share. These systems tightly integrate with SAP systems for payment and billing. We also provide business intelligence tools for driving contribution business. ", ' 4+ years of professional experience designing, developing, and releasing high-quality software in C++, C#, and/or Python 2+ years of professional experience working in a Linux/Unix environment Strong analytical and creative problem-solving skills Collaborate effectively with multiple teams and product stakeholders to deliver products BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technology field', 'Please apply if this sounds like something you would be passionate about! ']

['', 'Minimum Qualifications...', "Provides support to the business by responding to user questions, concerns, and issues (for example, technical feasibility, implementation strategies); researching and identifying needed solutions; determining implementation designs; providing guidance regarding implications of new and enhanced systems; identifying short and long term solutions; and directing users to appropriate contacts for issues outside of associate's domain.Manages small to large-sized complex projects by reviewing project requirements; translating requirements into technical solutions; researching and identifying alternative solutions; determining needed solution based on return on investment and value add to the business; gathering requested information (for example, design documents, product requirements, wire frames); writing and developing code; conducting unit testing; communicating status and issues to team members and stakeholders; collaborating with project team and cross functional teams; identifying areas of opportunity; interpreting information and identifying a solution; ensuring solution is sustainable across implementation and use; troubleshooting open issues and bug-fixes; and ensuring on-time delivery and hand-offs.Troubleshoots business and production issues by gathering information (for example, issue, impact, criticality, possible root cause); performing root cause analysis to reduce future issues; engaging support teams to assist in the resolution of issues; developing solutions; driving the development of an action plan; performing actions as designated in the plan; interpreting the results to determine further action; and completing online documentation.Participates in the discovery phase of small to medium-sized projects to come up with high level design by partnering with the product management, project management, business, and user experience teams.Assists in providing guidance to small groups of two to three engineers, including offshore associates, for assigned Engineering projects by proving pertinent documents, directions, examples, and timeline. Demonstrates up-to-date expertise and applies this to the development, execution, and improvement of action plans by providing expert advice and guidance to others in the application of information and best practices; supporting and aligning efforts to meet customer and business needs; and building commitment for perspectives and rationales. Provides and supports the implementation of business solutions by building relationships and partnerships with key stakeholders; identifying business needs; determining and carrying out necessary processes and practices; monitoring progress and results; recognizing and capitalizing on improvement opportunities; and adapting to competing demands, organizational changes, and new responsibilities. Models compliance with company policies and procedures and supports company mission, values, and standards of ethics and integrity by incorporating these into the development and implementation of business plans; using the Open Door Policy; and demonstrating and assisting others with how to apply these in executing business processes and practices.", 'A disciplined approach to development, code review, testing, documentation and code structure in a team environment.', ' Outlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position. ', 'Assists in providing guidance to small groups of two to three engineers, including offshore associates, for assigned Engineering projects by proving pertinent documents, directions, examples, and timeline. Demonstrates up-to-date expertise and applies this to the development, execution, and improvement of action plans by providing expert advice and guidance to others in the application of information and best practices; supporting and aligning efforts to meet customer and business needs; and building commitment for perspectives and rationales. Provides and supports the implementation of business solutions by building relationships and partnerships with key stakeholders; identifying business needs; determining and carrying out necessary processes and practices; monitoring progress and results; recognizing and capitalizing on improvement opportunities; and adapting to competing demands, organizational changes, and new responsibilities. Models compliance with company policies and procedures and supports company mission, values, and standards of ethics and integrity by incorporating these into the development and implementation of business plans; using the Open Door Policy; and demonstrating and assisting others with how to apply these in executing business processes and practices.', 'Extensive understanding of Android framework components and their respective lifecycles combined with a solid knowledge of multithreading, networking, offline storage and performance tuning', 'About You', "What You'll Do", 'Manages small to large-sized complex projects by reviewing project requirements; translating requirements into technical solutions; researching and identifying alternative solutions; determining needed solution based on return on investment and value add to the business; gathering requested information (for example, design documents, product requirements, wire frames); writing and developing code; conducting unit testing; communicating status and issues to team members and stakeholders; collaborating with project team and cross functional teams; identifying areas of opportunity; interpreting information and identifying a solution; ensuring solution is sustainable across implementation and use; troubleshooting open issues and bug-fixes; and ensuring on-time delivery and hand-offs.', 'Experience in good app architecture using design patterns such as MVVM, MVP or Clean', 'Expert level knowledge of Java, Android SDK and Gradle, and experience working with Reactive framework (RxAndroid) and dependency injection (Dagger)', 'A constant desire to improve, learn more and take things to the next level and a passion for adopting the latest features in Android.', "Provides support to the business by responding to user questions, concerns, and issues (for example, technical feasibility, implementation strategies); researching and identifying needed solutions; determining implementation designs; providing guidance regarding implications of new and enhanced systems; identifying short and long term solutions; and directing users to appropriate contacts for issues outside of associate's domain.", 'Troubleshoots business and production issues by gathering information (for example, issue, impact, criticality, possible root cause); performing root cause analysis to reduce future issues; engaging support teams to assist in the resolution of issues; developing solutions; driving the development of an action plan; performing actions as designated in the plan; interpreting the results to determine further action; and completing online documentation.', 'Outlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no minimum qualifications. ', 'Extensive understanding of Android framework components and their respective lifecycles combined with a solid knowledge of multithreading, networking, offline storage and performance tuningExpert level knowledge of Java, Android SDK and Gradle, and experience working with Reactive framework (RxAndroid) and dependency injection (Dagger)Experience with Kotlin is a plus (We are working on brand new apps written in 100% Kotlin)Experience in developing content rich applications including animation and window transition with Material DesignExperience in good app architecture using design patterns such as MVVM, MVP or CleanAbility to build products with focus on testability, someone who loves test coverage (well versed with Mockito and JUnit)A disciplined approach to development, code review, testing, documentation and code structure in a team environment.A constant desire to improve, learn more and take things to the next level and a passion for adopting the latest features in Android.', 'Participates in the discovery phase of small to medium-sized projects to come up with high level design by partnering with the product management, project management, business, and user experience teams.', 'Experience with Kotlin is a plus (We are working on brand new apps written in 100% Kotlin)', 'Ability to build products with focus on testability, someone who loves test coverage (well versed with Mockito and JUnit)', 'Experience in developing content rich applications including animation and window transition with Material Design', 'Outlined below are the optional preferred qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no preferred qualifications. ', 'About Global Tech', 'Additional Job Details']

', 'Demonstrates up-to-date expertise and applies this to the development, execution, and improvement of action plans by providing expert advice and guidance to others in the application of information and best practices; supporting and aligning efforts to meet customer and business needs; and building commitment for perspectives and rationales.', "What You'll Do", 'Additional Preferred Qualifications', 'Development experience with web UI development technologies that include HTML, CSS, JavaScript and AJAX ', 'Outlined below are the optional preferred qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no preferred qualifications.', 'Familiar with service oriented architecture and web services integration (SOAP, WSDL, REST)', 'Models compliance with company policies and procedures and supports company standards of ethics and integrity by incorporating these into the development and implementation of business plans; using the Open Door Policy; and demonstrating and assisting others with how to apply these in executing business processes and practices.', 'Knowledge of one or more of the following: Jelly, JSON, AngularJS, React, React Native', 'Outlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no minimum qualifications. ', '4+ years of experience in design and development of highly scalable applications and platform development.Any development experience in .Net, Java, JavaScriptDevelopment experience with web UI development technologies that include HTML, CSS, JavaScript and AJAX Knowledge of one or more of the following: Jelly, JSON, AngularJS, React, React NativeUnderstanding of client-server calls and callbacks, including AJAX, web hooks, REST and JSONFamiliar with service oriented architecture and web services integration (SOAP, WSDL, REST)2 + years’ experience with ServiceNow implementations and a record of at least 2 successful Phase-1 Deployment as lead', 'Understanding of client-server calls and callbacks, including AJAX, web hooks, REST and JSON', 'Any development experience in .Net, Java, JavaScript', 'Provides and supports the implementation of business solutions by building relationships and partnerships with key stakeholders; identifying business needs; determining and carrying out necessary processes and practices; monitoring progress and results; recognizing and capitalizing on improvement opportunities; and adapting to competing demands, organizational changes, and new responsibilities.', '2 + years’ experience with ServiceNow implementations and a record of at least 2 successful Phase-1 Deployment as lead', 'Manages small to medium-sized complex team projects by reviewing and understanding project requirements; translating requirements into technical solutions; researching and identifying alternative solutions; determining needed solutions based on return on investment and value add to the business; gathering needed information (for example, design documents, product requirements, wire frames); writing and developing code; communicating status and issues to appropriate team members and stakeholders; collaborating with project team and cross-functional teams; identifying areas of opportunity; interpreting information and identifying a solution; ensuring solution is sustainable across implementation and use; and ensuring on-time delivery and hand-offs.', 'Troubleshoots business and production issues by gathering information (for example, issue, impact, criticality); performing root cause analysis to reduce future issues; engaging support teams when needed; developing solutions; driving the development of an action plan; performing actions as designated in the plan; and completing online documentation.', '4+ years of experience in design and development of highly scalable applications and platform development.', 'Provides support to the business for new and existing systems by responding to user questions, concerns, and issues (for example, technical feasibility); researching and identifying needed solutions; determining implementation designs; providing guidance regarding implications of new and enhanced systems; and directing users to appropriate contacts for issues outside of own domain.']
